00307 UINT8 bDefaultTeamRanges[ MAXTEAMS ][ 2 ] = 
00308 {
00309       0,              19,                                                                                             //20  US
00310       20,             51,                                                                                             //32  ENEMY
00311       52,             83,                                                                                             //32    CREATURE
00312       84,             115,                                                                                    //32    REBELS ( OUR GUYS )
00313       116,    MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS - 1,                   //32  CIVILIANS
00314       MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS, TOTAL_SOLDIERS - 1            // PLANNING SOLDIERS
00315 };

00341 UINT8       gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode                 = 0;

00346 
00347 INT32 GetFreeMercSlot(void)
00348 {
00349       UINT32 uiCount;
00350 
00351       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumMercSlots; uiCount++)
00352       {
00353             if(( MercSlots[uiCount] == NULL ) )
00354                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00355       }
00356 
00357       if(guiNumMercSlots < TOTAL_SOLDIERS )
00358             return((INT32)guiNumMercSlots++);
00359 
00360       return(-1);
00361 }
00362 
00363 
00364 void RecountMercSlots(void)
00365 {
00366       INT32 iCount;
00367 
00368       if ( guiNumMercSlots > 0 )
00369       {
00370             // set equal to 0 as a default
00371             for (iCount = guiNumMercSlots - 1; (iCount >=0) ; iCount--)
00372             {
00373                   if ( ( MercSlots[iCount] != NULL ) )
00374                   {
00375                         guiNumMercSlots=(UINT32)(iCount+1);
00376                         return;
00377                   }
00378             }
00379             // no mercs found
00380             guiNumMercSlots = 0;
00381       }
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00385 INT32   AddMercSlot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00386 {
00387       INT32                   iMercIndex;
00388 
00389       if( ( iMercIndex = GetFreeMercSlot() )==(-1) )
00390             return(-1);
00391 
00392       MercSlots[ iMercIndex ] = pSoldier;
00393 
00394       return( iMercIndex );
00395 }
00396 
00397 
00398 BOOLEAN RemoveMercSlot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00399 {
00400       UINT32 uiCount;
00401 
00402       CHECKF( pSoldier != NULL );
00403 
00404       for( uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumMercSlots; uiCount++)
00405       {
00406             if ( MercSlots[ uiCount ] == pSoldier )
00407             {
00408                   MercSlots[ uiCount ] = NULL;
00409                   RecountMercSlots( );
00410                   return( TRUE );
00411             }
00412       }
00413 
00414       // TOLD TO DELETE NON-EXISTANT SOLDIER
00415       return( FALSE );
00416 }
00417 
00418 INT32 GetFreeAwaySlot(void)
00419 {
00420       UINT32 uiCount;
00421 
00422       for(uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumAwaySlots; uiCount++)
00423       {
00424             if(( AwaySlots[uiCount] == NULL ) )
00425                   return((INT32)uiCount);
00426       }
00427 
00428       if(guiNumAwaySlots < TOTAL_SOLDIERS )
00429             return((INT32)guiNumAwaySlots++);
00430 
00431       return(-1);
00432 }
00433 
00434 
00435 void RecountAwaySlots(void)
00436 {
00437       INT32 iCount;
00438 
00439       if ( guiNumAwaySlots > 0 )
00440       {
00441             for (iCount = guiNumAwaySlots - 1; (iCount >=0) ; iCount--)
00442             {
00443                   if ( ( AwaySlots[iCount] != NULL ) )
00444                   {
00445                         guiNumAwaySlots = (UINT32)(iCount + 1);
00446                         return;
00447                   }
00448             }
00449             // no mercs found
00450             guiNumAwaySlots = 0;
00451       }
00452 }
00453 
00454 
00455 INT32   AddAwaySlot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00456 {
00457       INT32                   iAwayIndex;
00458 
00459       if( ( iAwayIndex = GetFreeAwaySlot() )==(-1) )
00460             return(-1);
00461 
00462       AwaySlots[ iAwayIndex ] = pSoldier;
00463 
00464       return( iAwayIndex );
00465 }
00466 
00467 
00468 BOOLEAN RemoveAwaySlot( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00469 {
00470       UINT32 uiCount;
00471 
00472       CHECKF( pSoldier != NULL );
00473 
00474       for( uiCount=0; uiCount < guiNumAwaySlots; uiCount++)
00475       {
00476             if ( AwaySlots[ uiCount ] == pSoldier )
00477             {
00478                   AwaySlots[ uiCount ] = NULL;
00479                   RecountAwaySlots( );
00480                   return( TRUE );
00481             }
00482       }
00483 
00484       // TOLD TO DELETE NON-EXISTANT SOLDIER
00485       return( FALSE );
00486 }
00487 
00488 INT32 MoveSoldierFromMercToAwaySlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00489 {
00490       BOOLEAN fRet;
00491 
00492       fRet = RemoveMercSlot( pSoldier );
00493       if (!fRet)
00494       {
00495             return( -1 );
00496       }
00497 
00498       if ( !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_OFF_MAP) )
00499       {
00500             RemoveManFromTeam( pSoldier->bTeam );
00501       }
00502 
00503       pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
00504       pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_OFF_MAP;
00505       return( AddAwaySlot( pSoldier ) );
00506 }
00507 
00508 
00509 INT32 MoveSoldierFromAwayToMercSlot( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
00510 {
00511       BOOLEAN fRet;
00512 
00513       fRet = RemoveAwaySlot( pSoldier );
00514       if (!fRet)
00515       {
00516             return( -1 );
00517       }
00518 
00519       AddManToTeam( pSoldier->bTeam );
00520 
00521       pSoldier->bInSector = TRUE;
00522       pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_OFF_MAP);
00523       return( AddMercSlot( pSoldier ) );
00524 }
00525 
00526 
00527 
00528 
00529 BOOLEAN InitTacticalEngine( )
00530 {
00531       // Init renderer
00532       InitRenderParams( 0 );
00533 
00534       // Init dirty queue system
00535       InitializeBaseDirtyRectQueue( );
00536 
00537       // Init Interface stuff
00538       InitializeTacticalInterface(  );
00539 
00540       // Init system objects
00541       InitializeGameVideoObjects( );
00542 
00543       // Init palette system
00544       LoadPaletteData( );
00545 
00546       if( !LoadLockTable() )
00547             return(FALSE);
00548 
00549       InitInteractiveTileManagement( );
00550 
00551       // init path code
00552       if (!InitPathAI())
00553       {
00554             return( FALSE );
00555       }
00556 
00557       // init AI
00558       if (!InitAI())
00559       {
00560             return( FALSE );
00561       }
00562 
00563       // Init Overhead
00564       if ( !InitOverhead( ) )
00565       {               
00566             return( FALSE );
00567       }
00568 
00569 #ifdef NETWORKED
00570       if ( !gfAmINetworked )
00571             gfAmIHost = TRUE;
00572 #endif
00573 
00574       return( TRUE );
00575 }
00576 
00577 void ShutdownTacticalEngine( )
00578 {
00579       DeletePaletteData( );
00580 
00581       ShutdownStaticExternalNPCFaces( );
00582 
00583       ShutDownPathAI();
00584       ShutdownInteractiveTileManagement( );
00585       UnLoadCarPortraits( );
00586 
00587       ShutdownNPCQuotes();
00588 
00589 }
00590 
00591 BOOLEAN InitOverhead( )
00592 {
00593       UINT32      cnt;
00594       UINT8       cnt2;
00595 
00596       memset( MercSlots, 0, sizeof( MercSlots ) );
00597       memset( AwaySlots, 0, sizeof( AwaySlots ) );
00598 
00599       // Set pointers list
00600       for( cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
00601       {
00602             MercPtrs[ cnt ] = &Menptr[ cnt ];
00603             MercPtrs[ cnt ]->bActive = FALSE;
00604       }
00605 
00606       memset( &gTacticalStatus, 0, sizeof( TacticalStatusType ) );
00607 
00608       // Set team values
00609       for( cnt = 0; cnt < MAXTEAMS; cnt++ )
00610       {
00611             // For now, set hard-coded values
00612             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bFirstID = bDefaultTeamRanges[ cnt ][0];
00613             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bLastID =  bDefaultTeamRanges[ cnt ][1];
00614             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].RadarColor = bDefaultTeamColors[ cnt ];
00615 
00616             if ( cnt == gbPlayerNum || cnt == PLAYER_PLAN )
00617             {
00618                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bSide = 0;
00619                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bHuman = TRUE;
00620             }
00621             else
00622             {
00623                   if (cnt == MILITIA_TEAM )                 
00624                   {
00625                         // militia guys on our side!
00626                         gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bSide = 0;
00627                   }
00628                   else if ( cnt == CREATURE_TEAM )
00629                   {
00630                         // creatures are on no one's side but their own
00631                         // NB side 2 is used for hostile rebels....
00632                         gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bSide = 3;
00633                   }
00634                   else
00635                   {
00636                         // hostile (enemies, or civilians; civs are potentially hostile but neutral)  
00637                         gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bSide = 1;
00638                   }
00639                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bHuman = FALSE;
00640             }
00641 
00642             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].ubLastMercToRadio = NOBODY;
00643             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bTeamActive = FALSE;
00644             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bAwareOfOpposition = FALSE;
00645 
00646             // set team values in soldier structures for all who are on this team
00647             for ( cnt2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bFirstID; cnt2 <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bLastID; cnt2++ )
00648             {
00649                   MercPtrs[ cnt2 ]->bTeam = (INT8) cnt;
00650             }
00651       }
00652 
00653       // Zero out merc slots!
00654       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ ) 
00655       {
00656             MercSlots[ cnt ] = NULL;
00657       }
00658 
00659       // Set other tactical flags
00660       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags = TURNBASED | TRANSLUCENCY_TYPE; 
00661       gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget = NOWHERE;
00662       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeOfLastInput = GetJA2Clock();
00663       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceDemoOn = GetJA2Clock();
00664       gTacticalStatus.uiCountdownToRestart = GetJA2Clock();
00665       gTacticalStatus.fGoingToEnterDemo               = FALSE;
00666       gTacticalStatus.fNOTDOLASTDEMO                  = FALSE;
00667       gTacticalStatus.fDidGameJustStart               = TRUE;
00668       gTacticalStatus.ubLastRequesterTargetID                           = NO_PROFILE;
00669 
00670       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_PANIC_TRIGGERS; cnt++ )
00671       {
00672             gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ cnt ] = NOWHERE;
00673       }
00674 /*    for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_TOPTIONS; cnt++ ) 
00675       {
00676             gGameSettings.fOptions[ cnt ] = 1;
00677       }
00678 
00679       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_RTCONFIRM ] = 0;
00680       gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_HIDE_BULLETS ] = 0;
00681 */
00682       gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed                  = MAX_REALTIME_SPEED_VAL / 2;
00683 
00684       gfInAirRaid = FALSE;
00685       gpCustomizableTimerCallback = NULL;
00686 
00687       // Reset cursor
00688       gpItemPointer = NULL;
00689       gpItemPointerSoldier = NULL;
00690       memset( gbInvalidPlacementSlot, 0, sizeof( gbInvalidPlacementSlot ) );
00691 
00692       InitCivQuoteSystem( );
00693 
00694   ZeroAnimSurfaceCounts( );
00695 
00696       return( TRUE );
00697 }
00698 
00699 BOOLEAN ShutdownOverhead( )
00700 {
00701       UINT32 cnt;
00702 
00703       // Delete any soldiers which have been created!
00704       for( cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
00705       {
00706             if( MercPtrs[ cnt ] != NULL )
00707             {
00708                   if ( MercPtrs[ cnt ]->bActive )
00709                   {
00710                         DeleteSoldier( MercPtrs[ cnt ] );
00711                   }
00712             }
00713       }
00714 
00715       return( TRUE );
00716 }
00717 
00718 
00719 BOOLEAN GetSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE **ppSoldier, UINT16 usSoldierIndex )
00720 {
00721       // Check range of index given
00722       *ppSoldier = NULL;
00723 
00724       if ( usSoldierIndex < 0 || usSoldierIndex > TOTAL_SOLDIERS-1 )
00725       {
00726             // Set debug message
00727             return( FALSE );
00728       }
00729 
00730       // Check if a guy exists here
00731       // Does another soldier exist here?
00732       if ( MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ]->bActive )
00733       {
00734             // Set Existing guy
00735             *ppSoldier = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ];
00736             return( TRUE);
00737       }
00738       else
00739       {
00740             return( FALSE );
00741       }
00742 
00743 }
00744 
00745 BOOLEAN     NextAIToHandle( UINT32 uiCurrAISlot )
00746 {
00747       UINT32      cnt;
00748 
00749       if (uiCurrAISlot >= guiNumMercSlots)
00750       {
00751             // last person to handle was an off-map merc, so now we start looping at the beginning
00752             // again
00753             cnt = 0;
00754       }
00755       else
00756       {
00757             // continue on from the last person we handled
00758             cnt = uiCurrAISlot + 1;
00759       }
00760 
00761       for ( ; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
00762       {
00763             if ( MercSlots[ cnt ] && ( (MercSlots[ cnt ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum) || (MercSlots[ cnt ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PCUNDERAICONTROL) ) )
00764             {
00765                   // aha! found an AI guy!
00766                   guiAISlotToHandle = cnt;
00767                   return( TRUE );
00768             }
00769       }
00770 
00771       // set so that even if there are no off-screen mercs to handle, we will loop back to
00772       // the start of the array
00773       guiAISlotToHandle = HANDLE_OFF_MAP_MERC; 
00774 
00775       // didn't find an AI guy to handle after the last one handled and the # of slots
00776       // it's time to check for an off-map merc... maybe
00777       if (guiNumAwaySlots > 0)
00778       {
00779             if ( (guiAIAwaySlotToHandle + 1) >= guiNumAwaySlots)
00780             {
00781                   // start looping from the beginning
00782                   cnt = 0;
00783             }
00784             else
00785             {
00786                   // continue on from the last person we handled
00787                   cnt = guiAIAwaySlotToHandle + 1;
00788             }
00789 
00790             for ( ; cnt < guiNumAwaySlots; cnt++ )
00791             {
00792                   if (AwaySlots[ cnt ] && AwaySlots[ cnt ]->bTeam != gbPlayerNum)
00793                   {
00794                         // aha! found an AI guy!
00795                         guiAIAwaySlotToHandle = cnt;
00796                         return( FALSE );
00797                   }
00798             }
00799       
00800             // reset awayAISlotToHandle, but DON'T loop again, away slots not that important
00801             guiAIAwaySlotToHandle = RESET_HANDLE_OF_OFF_MAP_MERCS;
00802       }
00803 
00804       return( FALSE );
00805 }
00806 
00807 void PauseAITemporarily( void )
00808 {
00809       gfPauseAllAI = TRUE;
00810       giPauseAllAITimer = GetJA2Clock();
00811 }
00812 
00813 void PauseAIUntilManuallyUnpaused( void )
00814 {
00815       gfPauseAllAI = TRUE;
00816       giPauseAllAITimer = 0;
00817 }
00818 
00819 void UnPauseAI( void )
00820 {
00821       // overrides any timer too
00822       gfPauseAllAI = FALSE;
00823       giPauseAllAITimer = 0;
00824 }
00825 
00826 FLOAT gdRadiansForAngle[ ] =
00827 {
00828       (FLOAT)PI, 
00829       (FLOAT)( 3 * PI / 4 ),
00830       (FLOAT)( PI / 2 ),
00831       (FLOAT)( ( PI ) / 4 ),
00832 
00833       (FLOAT)0, 
00834       (FLOAT)( ( -PI ) / 4 ),
00835       (FLOAT)( -PI / 2 ),
00836       (FLOAT)( -3 * PI / 4 ),
00837 
00838 };
00839 
00840 
00841 BOOLEAN ExecuteOverhead( )
00842 {
00843 
00844       UINT32                          cnt;
00845       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
00846       INT16                                   sAPCost;
00847       INT16                                   sBPCost;
00848       FLOAT                                   dXPos , dYPos;
00849       FLOAT                                   dAngle;
00850       BOOLEAN                         fKeepMoving;
00851   INT8                            bShadeLevel;
00852       BOOLEAN                         fNoAPsForPendingAction;
00853       INT16                                   sGridNo;
00854       STRUCTURE                       *pStructure;
00855       BOOLEAN                                                                             fHandleAI = FALSE;
00856 
00857       
00858       // Diagnostic Stuff
00859       static INT32                                    iTimerTest = 0;
00860       static INT32                                    iTimerVal = 0;
00861 
00862       
00863       gfMovingAnimation = FALSE;
00864 
00865       if(GetSoldier(&pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier))
00866       {
00867             if(pSoldier->bActive)
00868             {
00869                   if(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags&SOLDIER_GREEN_RAY)
00870                         LightShowRays((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE), FALSE);
00871             }
00872       }
00873 
00874 
00875       if ( COUNTERDONE( TOVERHEAD ) )
00876       {
00877             // Reset counter
00878             RESETCOUNTER( TOVERHEAD );
00879 
00880             // Diagnostic Stuff
00881             iTimerVal = GetJA2Clock();
00882             giTimerDiag = iTimerVal - iTimerTest;
00883             iTimerTest = iTimerVal;
00884 
00885             // ANIMATED TILE STUFF
00886             UpdateAniTiles( );
00887 
00888             // BOMBS!!!
00889             HandleExplosionQueue();
00890 
00891     HandleCreatureTenseQuote( );
00892 
00893             CheckHostileOrSayQuoteList();
00894 
00895             if ( gfPauseAllAI && giPauseAllAITimer && ( iTimerVal - giPauseAllAITimer > PAUSE_ALL_AI_DELAY ) )
00896             {
00897                   // ok, stop pausing the AI!
00898                   gfPauseAllAI = FALSE;
00899             }
00900 
00901             if (!gfPauseAllAI)
00902             {
00903                   // AI limiting crap
00904                   gubAICounter = 0;
00905                   if (!((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT)))
00906                   {
00907                         if ((iTimerVal - giRTAILastUpdateTime ) > RT_DELAY_BETWEEN_AI_HANDLING)
00908                         {
00909                               giRTAILastUpdateTime = iTimerVal;
00910                               // figure out which AI guy to handle this time around,
00911                               // starting with the slot AFTER the current AI guy
00912                               fHandleAI = NextAIToHandle( guiAISlotToHandle );
00913                         }
00914                   }
00915             }
00916 
00917             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
00918             {
00919                   pSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
00920 
00921                   // Syncronize for upcoming soldier counters
00922                   SYNCTIMECOUNTER( );
00923 
00924                   if ( pSoldier != NULL )
00925                   {
00926                         HandlePanelFaceAnimations( pSoldier );
00927 
00928                         // Handle damage counters
00929                         if ( pSoldier->fDisplayDamage )
00930                         {
00931                               if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->DamageCounter, DAMAGE_DISPLAY_DELAY ) )
00932                               {
00933                                     pSoldier->bDisplayDamageCount++;
00934                                     pSoldier->sDamageX+=1;
00935                                     pSoldier->sDamageY-=1;
00936 
00937                                     RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->DamageCounter, DAMAGE_DISPLAY_DELAY );
00938                               }
00939 
00940                               if ( pSoldier->bDisplayDamageCount >= 8 )
00941                               {
00942                                     pSoldier->bDisplayDamageCount = 0;
00943                                     pSoldier->sDamage = 0;
00944                                     pSoldier->fDisplayDamage = FALSE;
00945                               }
00946 
00947                         }
00948 
00949                         // Handle reload counters
00950                         if ( pSoldier->fReloading )
00951                         {
00952                               if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->ReloadCounter, pSoldier->sReloadDelay ) )
00953                               {
00954                                     pSoldier->fReloading = FALSE;
00955                                     pSoldier->fPauseAim  = FALSE;
00956                                     /*
00957                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Freeing up attacker - realtime reloading") );
00958                                     FreeUpAttacker( pSoldier->ubID );
00959                                     */
00960                               }
00961                         }
00962 
00963                         // Checkout fading
00964                         if ( pSoldier->fBeginFade )
00965                         {
00966                               if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->FadeCounter, NEW_FADE_DELAY ) )
00967                               {
00968                                     RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->FadeCounter, NEW_FADE_DELAY );
00969 
00970                                     // Fade out....
00971                                     if ( pSoldier->fBeginFade == 1 )
00972                                     {
00973                                           bShadeLevel = (pSoldier->ubFadeLevel&0x0f);
00974                                           bShadeLevel=__min(bShadeLevel+1, SHADE_MIN);
00975 
00976                                           if ( bShadeLevel >= ( SHADE_MIN - 3 ) )
00977                                           {
00978                                                 pSoldier->fBeginFade = FALSE;
00979                                                 pSoldier->bVisible = -1;
00980                                                 
00981                                                 // Set levelnode shade level....
00982                                                 if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode )
00983                                                 {
00984                                                       pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel = bShadeLevel;
00985                                                 }
00986 
00987                                                 // Set Anim speed accordingly!
00988                                                 SetSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier );
00989                                           }
00990 
00991                                           bShadeLevel|=(pSoldier->ubFadeLevel&0x30);
00992                                           pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = bShadeLevel;
00993                                     }
00994                                     else if ( pSoldier->fBeginFade == 2 )
00995                                     {
00996                                           bShadeLevel = (pSoldier->ubFadeLevel&0x0f);
00997                                           //ubShadeLevel =__max(ubShadeLevel-1, gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel );
00998 
00999                                           bShadeLevel = bShadeLevel-1;
01000 
01001                                           if ( bShadeLevel <= 0 )
01002                                           {
01003                                                 bShadeLevel = 0;
01004                                           }
01005 
01006                                           if ( bShadeLevel <= (gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel ) )
01007                                           {
01008                                                 bShadeLevel = (gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel );
01009 
01010                                                 pSoldier->fBeginFade = FALSE;
01011                                                 //pSoldier->bVisible = -1;
01012                                                 //pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
01013 
01014                                                 // Set levelnode shade level....
01015                                                 if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode )
01016                                                 {
01017                                                       pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel = bShadeLevel;
01018                                                 }
01019 
01020                                                 // Set Anim speed accordingly!
01021                                                 SetSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier );
01022                                           }
01023 
01024                                           bShadeLevel|=(pSoldier->ubFadeLevel&0x30);
01025                                           pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = bShadeLevel;
01026                                     }
01027                               }
01028                         }
01029 
01030                         // Check if we have a new visiblity and shade accordingly down
01031                         if ( pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue != pSoldier->bVisible  )
01032                         {
01033                               HandleCrowShadowVisibility( pSoldier );
01034 
01035                               // Check for fade out....
01036                               if ( pSoldier->bVisible == -1 && pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue >= 0 )
01037                               {
01038                                     if ( pSoldier->sGridNo != NOWHERE )
01039                                     {
01040                                           pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
01041                                     }
01042                                     else
01043                                     {
01044                                           int i = 0;
01045                                     }
01046                                     pSoldier->fBeginFade    = TRUE;
01047                                     pSoldier->sLocationOfFadeStart = pSoldier->sGridNo;
01048 
01049                                     // OK, re-evaluate guy's roof marker
01050                                     HandlePlacingRoofMarker( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
01051 
01052                                     pSoldier->bVisible = -2;
01053                               }
01054 
01055                               // Check for fade in.....
01056                               if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 && pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue == -1 && pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
01057                               {
01058                                     pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = ( SHADE_MIN - 3 );
01059                                     pSoldier->fBeginFade    = 2;
01060                                     pSoldier->sLocationOfFadeStart = pSoldier->sGridNo;
01061 
01062                                     // OK, re-evaluate guy's roof marker
01063                                     HandlePlacingRoofMarker( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
01064                               }
01065 
01066                         }
01067                         pSoldier->bLastRenderVisibleValue = pSoldier->bVisible;
01068 
01069 
01070                         // Handle stationary polling...
01071                         if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_STATIONARY ) || pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
01072                         {
01073                               // Are are stationary....
01074                               // Were we once moving...?
01075                               if ( pSoldier->fSoldierWasMoving && pSoldier->bVisible > -1 )
01076                               {
01077                                     pSoldier->fSoldierWasMoving = FALSE;
01078 
01079                                     HandlePlacingRoofMarker( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, TRUE, FALSE );
01080 
01081                                     if ( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MERC_ALWAYS_LIGHT_UP ] )
01082                                     {
01083                                           DeleteSoldierLight( pSoldier );
01084 
01085                                           SetCheckSoldierLightFlag( pSoldier );           
01086                                     }
01087                               }
01088                         }
01089                         else
01090                         {
01091                               // We are moving....
01092                               // Were we once stationary?
01093                               if ( !pSoldier->fSoldierWasMoving )
01094                               {
01095                                     pSoldier->fSoldierWasMoving = TRUE;
01096 
01097                                     HandlePlacingRoofMarker( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE, FALSE );
01098                               }
01099                         }
01100 
01101                         // Handle animation update counters
01102                         // ATE: Added additional check here for special value of anispeed that pauses all updates
01103 #ifndef BOUNDS_CHECKER
01104                         if ( TIMECOUNTERDONE( pSoldier->UpdateCounter, pSoldier->sAniDelay ) && pSoldier->sAniDelay != 10000 )
01105 #endif
01106                         {
01107 
01108 #ifdef NETWORKED
01109                               // DEF:
01110                               // Check for TIMING delay here only if in Realtime
01111                               if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME)
01112                                     if ( pSoldier->fIsSoldierMoving )
01113                                                 CheckForSlowSoldier( pSoldier );
01114 #endif
01115             
01116                               // Check if we need to look for items
01117                               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_LOOKFOR_ITEMS )
01118                               {
01119                                     RevealRoofsAndItems(pSoldier, TRUE, FALSE, pSoldier->bLevel, FALSE );
01120                                     pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_LOOKFOR_ITEMS);
01121                               }
01122 
01123 
01124                               // Check if we need to reposition light....
01125                               if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_RECHECKLIGHT )
01126                               {
01127                                     PositionSoldierLight( pSoldier );
01128                                     pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_RECHECKLIGHT);
01129                               }
01130 
01131                               RESETTIMECOUNTER( pSoldier->UpdateCounter, pSoldier->sAniDelay );
01132 
01133                               fNoAPsForPendingAction = FALSE;
01134 
01135 #ifdef NETWORKED
01136                               // Get the path update, if there is 1
01137                               if (pSoldier->fSoldierUpdatedFromNetwork)
01138                                     UpdateSoldierFromNetwork(pSoldier);
01139 #endif
01140 
01141                               // Check if we are moving and we deduct points and we have no points
01142                               if ( !( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_MOVING | ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) ) && pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove  ) && !pSoldier->fPauseAllAnimation  )
01143                               {
01144                                     if ( !AdjustToNextAnimationFrame( pSoldier ) )
01145                                     {
01146                                           continue;
01147                                     }
01148 
01149                                     if ( !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
01150                                     {
01151                                           // Check if we are waiting for an opened path
01152                                           HandleNextTileWaiting( pSoldier );
01153                                     }
01154 
01155                                     // Update world data with new position, etc
01156                                     // Determine gameworld cells corrds of guy
01157                                     if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ( ANIM_MOVING | ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PAUSEANIMOVE ) )
01158                                     {
01159                                           fKeepMoving = TRUE;
01160 
01161                                           pSoldier->fPausedMove   = FALSE;
01162 
01163                                           // CHECK TO SEE IF WE'RE ON A MIDDLE TILE
01164                                           if ( pSoldier->fPastXDest && pSoldier->fPastYDest )
01165                                           {
01166                                                 pSoldier->fPastXDest = pSoldier->fPastYDest = FALSE;
01167                                                 // assign X/Y values back to make sure we are at the center of the tile
01168                                                 // (to prevent mercs from going through corners of tiles and producing
01169                                                 // structure data complaints)
01170 
01171                                                 //pSoldier->dXPos = pSoldier->sDestXPos;
01172                                                 //pSoldier->dYPos = pSoldier->sDestYPos;
01173 
01174                                                 HandleBloodForNewGridNo( pSoldier );
01175 
01176                                                 if ( ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) && pSoldier->sGridNo != pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
01177                                                 {
01178 
01179                                                 }
01180                                                 else
01181                                                 {
01182                                                       //OK, we're at the MIDDLE of a new tile...
01183                                                             HandleAtNewGridNo( pSoldier, &fKeepMoving );
01184                                                 }
01185 
01186                                                 if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState != NOT_BOXING && (gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING_WAITING_FOR_PLAYER || gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == PRE_BOXING || gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING) )
01187                                                 {
01188                                                       BoxingMovementCheck( pSoldier );
01189                                                 }
01190 
01191                                                 // Are we at our final destination?
01192                                                 if ( pSoldier->sFinalDestination == pSoldier->sGridNo )
01193                                                 {           
01194                                                             // Cancel path....
01195                                                             pSoldier->usPathIndex = pSoldier->usPathDataSize = 0;
01196 
01197                                                             // Cancel reverse
01198                                                             pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
01199 
01200                                                             // OK, if we are the selected soldier, refresh some UI stuff
01201                                                             if ( pSoldier->ubID == (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier )
01202                                                             {
01203                                                                   gfUIRefreshArrows = TRUE;
01204                                                             }
01205 
01206                                                             // ATE: Play landing sound.....
01207                                                             if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == JUMP_OVER_BLOCKING_PERSON )
01208                                                             {
01209                                                                   PlaySoldierFootstepSound( pSoldier );
01210                                                             }
01211 
01212                     // If we are a robot, play stop sound...
01213                     if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
01214                     {
01215                                           PlaySoldierJA2Sample( pSoldier->ubID, ROBOT_STOP, RATE_11025, SoundVolume( HIGHVOLUME, pSoldier->sGridNo ), 1, SoundDir( pSoldier->sGridNo ), TRUE );                                           
01216                     }
01217 
01218                                                             // Update to middle if we're on destination
01219                                                             dXPos = pSoldier->sDestXPos;
01220                                                             dYPos = pSoldier->sDestYPos;
01221                                                             EVENT_SetSoldierPosition( pSoldier, dXPos, dYPos );
01222 #ifdef NETWORKED
01223                                                             // DEF: Test Code
01224                                                             StopSoldierMovementTime(pSoldier);
01225 #endif
01226 
01227                                                             // Handle New sight
01228                                                             //HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK | SIGHT_RADIO );
01229 
01230                                                             // CHECK IF WE HAVE A PENDING ANIMATION
01231                                                             if ( pSoldier->usPendingAnimation != NO_PENDING_ANIMATION )
01232                                                             {
01233                                                                   ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPendingAnimation, 0 , FALSE );
01234                                                                   pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01235 
01236                                                                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingDirection != NO_PENDING_DIRECTION )
01237                                                                   {
01238                                                                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->ubPendingDirection );
01239                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01240                                                                   }
01241 
01242                                                             }
01243 
01244                                                             // CHECK IF WE HAVE A PENDING ACTION
01245                                                             if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo  )
01246                                                             {
01247                                                                   if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo == 2 )
01248                                                                   {
01249                                                                         pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 1;
01250 
01251                                                                         if ( gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKOFF_SCREEN )
01252                                                                         {
01253                                                                               // ATE wanted this line here...
01254                                                                               pSoldier->usPathIndex--;
01255                                                                               AdjustSoldierPathToGoOffEdge( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, (UINT8)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 );
01256                                                                               continue;
01257                                                                         }
01258                                                                   }
01259                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo == 1 )
01260                                                                   {
01261                                                                         pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 0;
01262 
01263                                                                         gbNumMercsUntilWaitingOver--;
01264 
01265                                                                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01266 
01267                                                                         // If we are at an exit-grid, make disappear.....
01268                                                                         if ( gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO )
01269                                                                         {
01270                                                                               // Remove!
01271                                                                               RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pSoldier, TRUE );
01272                                                                         }
01273                                                                   }
01274                                                             }                                                                 
01275                                                             else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction != NO_PENDING_ACTION )
01276                                                             {
01277                                                                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("We are inside the IF PENDING Animation with soldier #%d", pSoldier->ubID) );
01278 
01279                                                                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_OPENDOOR ||  pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_OPENSTRUCT )
01280                                                                   {
01281                                                                         sGridNo                                 = pSoldier->sPendingActionData2;
01282                                                                         //usStructureID           = (UINT16)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1;                                                                             
01283                                                                         //pStructure = FindStructureByID( sGridNo, usStructureID );
01284 
01285                                                                         // LOOK FOR STRUCT OPENABLE
01286                                                                         pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_OPENABLE );
01287 
01288                                                                         if ( pStructure == NULL )
01289                                                                         {
01290 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01291                                                                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Told to open struct at %d and none was found", sGridNo );
01292 #endif
01293                                                                                     fKeepMoving = FALSE;
01294                                                                         }
01295                                                                         else
01296                                                                         {
01297                                                                               CalcInteractiveObjectAPs( sGridNo, pStructure, &sAPCost, &sBPCost );
01298 
01299                                                                               if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost , TRUE ) )
01300                                                                               {                                                                                                       
01301                                                                                      InteractWithInteractiveObject( pSoldier, pStructure, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01302                                                                               }
01303                                                                               else
01304                                                                               {
01305                                                                                     fNoAPsForPendingAction = TRUE;
01306                                                                               }
01307                                                                         }
01308                                                                   }
01309                                                                   if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_PICKUPITEM  )
01310                                                                   {
01311                                                                         sGridNo                                 = pSoldier->sPendingActionData2;
01312 
01313                                                                         if ( sGridNo == pSoldier->sGridNo )
01314                                                                         {
01315                                                                               // OK, now, if in realtime
01316                                                                               if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01317                                                                               {
01318                                                                                     // If the two gridnos are not the same, check to see if we can
01319                                                                                     // now go into it
01320                                                                                     if ( sGridNo != (INT16)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 )
01321                                                                                     {
01322                                                                                           if ( NewOKDestination( pSoldier, (INT16)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
01323                                                                                           {
01324                                                                                                 // GOTO NEW TILE!
01325                                                                                                 SoldierPickupItem( pSoldier, pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1, (INT16)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01326                                                                                                 continue;
01327                                                                                           }
01328                                                                                     }
01329                                                                               }
01330 
01331                                                                               // OK MORON, DOUBLE CHECK THAT THE ITEM EXISTS HERE...
01332                                                                               if ( pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 != ITEM_PICKUP_ACTION_ALL )
01333                                                                               {
01334                                                                                     //if ( ItemExistsAtLocation( (INT16)( pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 ), pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
01335                                                                                     {
01336                                                                                           PickPickupAnimation( pSoldier, pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1, (INT16)( pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 ), pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01337                                                                                     }
01338                                                                               }
01339                                                                               else
01340                                                                               {
01341                                                                                     PickPickupAnimation( pSoldier, pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1, (INT16)( pSoldier->uiPendingActionData4 ), pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01342                                                                               }
01343                                                                         }
01344                         else
01345                         {
01346                                                                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01347                         }
01348                                                                   }
01349                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_PUNCH  )
01350                                                                   {
01351                                                                         // for the benefit of the AI
01352                                                                         pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_KNIFE_STAB;
01353 
01354                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginPunchAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01355                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01356                                                                   }
01357                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_TALK )
01358                                                                   {
01359                                                                         PlayerSoldierStartTalking( pSoldier, (UINT8)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1, TRUE );
01360                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01361                                                                   }
01362                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_DROPBOMB  )
01363                                                                   {
01364                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginDropBomb( pSoldier );
01365                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01366                                                                   }
01367                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_STEAL  )
01368                                                                   {
01369                                                                         //pSoldier->bDesiredDirection = pSoldier->bPendingActionData3;
01370                                                                         EVENT_SetSoldierDesiredDirection( pSoldier, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01371 
01372                                                                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pSoldier, STEAL_ITEM, 0 , FALSE );
01373                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01374                                                                   }
01375                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_KNIFEATTACK)
01376                                                                   {
01377                                                                         // for the benefit of the AI
01378                                                                         pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_KNIFE_STAB;
01379 
01380                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginBladeAttack( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01381                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01382                                                                   }
01383                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_GIVEAID  )
01384                                                                   {
01385                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginFirstAid( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01386                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01387                                                                   }
01388                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_REPAIR  )
01389                                                                   {
01390                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginRepair( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01391                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01392                                                                   }
01393                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_FUEL_VEHICLE  )
01394                                                                   {
01395                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginRefuel( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01396                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01397                                                                   }
01398                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_RELOADROBOT  )
01399                                                                   {
01400                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginReloadRobot( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3, (INT8)pSoldier->uiPendingActionData1 );
01401                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01402                                                                   }
01403                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_TAKEBLOOD  )
01404                                                                   {
01405                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginTakeBlood( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01406                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01407                                                                   }
01408                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_ATTACH_CAN )
01409                                                                   {
01410                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginAttachCan( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01411                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01412                                                                   }
01413                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_ENTER_VEHICLE  )
01414                                                                   {
01415                                                                         EVENT_SoldierEnterVehicle( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01416                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01417                                                                         continue;
01418                                                                   }
01419                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_CUTFFENCE )
01420                                                                   {
01421                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginCutFence( pSoldier, pSoldier->sPendingActionData2, pSoldier->bPendingActionData3 );
01422                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01423                                                                   }
01424                                                                   else if ( pSoldier->ubPendingAction == MERC_GIVEITEM  )
01425                                                                   {
01426                                                                         EVENT_SoldierBeginGiveItem( pSoldier );                         
01427                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01428                                                                   }
01429 
01430                                                                   if ( fNoAPsForPendingAction )
01431                                                                   {
01432                                                                         // Change status of guy to waiting
01433                                                                         HaltMoveForSoldierOutOfPoints( pSoldier );
01434                                                                         fKeepMoving = FALSE;
01435                                                                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01436                                                                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01437                                                                   }
01438 
01439                                                             }
01440                                                             else
01441                                                             {
01442                                                                   // OK, ADJUST TO STANDING, WE ARE DONE
01443                                                                   // DO NOTHING IF WE ARE UNCONSCIOUS
01444                                                                   if ( pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
01445                                                                   {
01446                                                                         if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
01447                                                                         {
01448                                                                               // If we are flying, don't stop!
01449                                                                               if ( pSoldier->sHeightAdjustment == 0 )
01450                                                                               {
01451                                                                                     SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01452                                                                               }
01453                                                                         }
01454                                                                         else
01455                                                                         {
01456                                                                               UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01457 
01458                                                                               SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01459                                                                         }
01460                                                                   }
01461                                                             }
01462 
01463                                                             // RESET MOVE FAST FLAG
01464                                                             if ( (pSoldier->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE)  )
01465                                                             {
01466                                                                   pSoldier->fUIMovementFast = FALSE;
01467                                                             }
01468 
01469                                                             // if AI moving and waiting to process something at end of
01470                                                             // move, have them handled the very next frame
01471                                                             if (pSoldier->ubQuoteActionID == QUOTE_ACTION_ID_CHECKFORDEST)
01472                                                             {
01473                                                                   pSoldier->fAIFlags |= AI_HANDLE_EVERY_FRAME;
01474                                                             }
01475 
01476                                                             fKeepMoving = FALSE;
01477                                                 }
01478                                                 else if ( !pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
01479                                                 {
01480                                                       // Increment path....
01481                                                       pSoldier->usPathIndex++;
01482 
01483                                                       if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex > pSoldier->usPathDataSize )
01484                                                       {
01485                                                             pSoldier->usPathIndex = pSoldier->usPathDataSize;
01486                                                       }
01487 
01488                                                       // Are we at the end?
01489                                                       if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex == pSoldier->usPathDataSize )
01490                                                       {
01491                                                             // ATE: Pop up warning....
01492                                                             if ( pSoldier->usPathDataSize != MAX_PATH_LIST_SIZE )
01493                                                             {
01494                                                                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01495                                                                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Path for %s ( %d ) did not make merc get to dest .", pSoldier->name, pSoldier->ubID );
01496                                                                   #endif
01497                                                             }
01498 
01499                                                             // In case this is an AI person with the path-stored flag set,
01500                                                             // turn it OFF since we have exhausted our stored path
01501                                                             pSoldier->bPathStored = FALSE;
01502                                                             if (pSoldier->sAbsoluteFinalDestination != NOWHERE)
01503                                                             {
01504                                                                   // We have not made it to our dest... but it's better to let the AI handle this itself,
01505                                                                   // on the very next fram
01506                                                                   pSoldier->fAIFlags |= AI_HANDLE_EVERY_FRAME;
01507                                                             }
01508                                                             else
01509                                                             {
01510                                                                   // ATE: Added this to fcalilitate the fact
01511                                                                   // that our final dest may now have people on it....
01512                                                                   if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) != 0 )
01513                                                                   {
01514                                                                         INT16 sNewGridNo;
01515 
01516                                                                         sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)guiPathingData[ 0 ] ) );
01517 
01518                                                                         SetDelayedTileWaiting( pSoldier, sNewGridNo, 1 );
01519                                                                   }
01520 
01521                                                                   // We have not made it to our dest... set flag that we are waiting....
01522                                                                   if ( !EVENT_InternalGetNewSoldierPath( pSoldier, pSoldier->sFinalDestination, pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, 2, FALSE ) )
01523                                                                   {
01524                                                                         // ATE: To do here.... we could not get path, so we have to stop
01525                                                                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01526                                                                         continue;
01527                                                                   }
01528                                                             }
01529                                                       }
01530                                                       else
01531                                                       {
01532                                                             // OK, Now find another dest grindo....
01533                                                             if ( !( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_SPECIALMOVE ) )
01534                                                             {
01535                                                                   // OK, now we want to see if we can continue to another tile...
01536                                                                   if ( !HandleGotoNewGridNo( pSoldier, &fKeepMoving, FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState ) )
01537                                                                   {
01538                                                                          continue;
01539                                                                   }
01540                                                             }
01541                                                             else
01542                                                             {
01543                                                                   // Change desired direction
01544                                                                   // Just change direction
01545                                                                   EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], FALSE, pSoldier->usAnimState );
01546                                                             }
01547 
01548                                                             if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState != NOT_BOXING && (gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING_WAITING_FOR_PLAYER || gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == PRE_BOXING || gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING) )
01549                                                             {
01550                                                                   BoxingMovementCheck( pSoldier );
01551                                                             }
01552                                                       }
01553                                                 }
01554                                           }
01555 
01556                                           if ( ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PAUSEANIMOVE ) )
01557                                           {
01558                                                 fKeepMoving = FALSE;
01559                                           }
01560 
01561                                           // DO WALKING 
01562                                           if ( !pSoldier->fPausedMove && fKeepMoving )
01563                                           {
01564                                                 // Determine deltas
01565                                           //    dDeltaX = pSoldier->sDestXPos - pSoldier->dXPos;
01566                                                 //dDeltaY = pSoldier->sDestYPos - pSoldier->dYPos;
01567 
01568                                                 // Determine angle
01569                                           //    dAngle = (FLOAT)atan2( dDeltaX, dDeltaY );
01570 
01571 
01572                                                 dAngle = gdRadiansForAngle[ pSoldier->bMovementDirection ];
01573 
01574                                                 // For walking, base it on body type!
01575                                                 if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == WALKING )
01576                                                 {
01577                                                       MoveMerc( pSoldier, gubAnimWalkSpeeds[ pSoldier->ubBodyType ].dMovementChange, dAngle, TRUE );
01578                                                       
01579                                                 }
01580                                                 else
01581                                                 {
01582                                                       MoveMerc( pSoldier, gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].dMovementChange, dAngle, TRUE );
01583                                                 }
01584                                           }
01585 
01586                                     }
01587 
01588                                     // Check for direction change
01589                                     if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].uiFlags & ANIM_TURNING )
01590                                     {
01591                                                 TurnSoldier( pSoldier );
01592                                     }
01593                               }
01594                   
01595             
01596 #ifdef NETWORKED
01597                               if(!pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
01598                                     pSoldier->usLastUpdateTime = GetJA2Clock();
01599                               if (pSoldier->fSoldierUpdatedFromNetwork)
01600                                     UpdateSoldierFromNetwork(pSoldier);
01601 #endif
01602                         }
01603 
01604                         if ( !gfPauseAllAI && 
01605                               ( ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT)) || (fHandleAI && guiAISlotToHandle == cnt) || (pSoldier->fAIFlags & AI_HANDLE_EVERY_FRAME) || gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode ) )
01606                         {
01607                               HandleSoldierAI( pSoldier );
01608                               if ( !((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT)) )
01609                               {
01610                                     if (GetJA2Clock() - iTimerVal > RT_AI_TIMESLICE)
01611                                     {
01612                                           // don't do any more AI this time!
01613                                           fHandleAI = FALSE;
01614                                     }
01615                                     else
01616                                     {
01617                                           // we still have time to handle AI; skip to the next person
01618                                           fHandleAI = NextAIToHandle( guiAISlotToHandle );
01619                                     }
01620                               }
01621                         }
01622 
01623                   }
01624 
01625             }
01626 
01627             if ( guiNumAwaySlots > 0 && !gfPauseAllAI && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && guiAISlotToHandle == HANDLE_OFF_MAP_MERC && guiAIAwaySlotToHandle != RESET_HANDLE_OF_OFF_MAP_MERCS )
01628             {
01629                   pSoldier = AwaySlots[ guiAIAwaySlotToHandle ];
01630 
01631                   // Syncronize for upcoming soldier counters
01632                   SYNCTIMECOUNTER( );
01633 
01634                   if ( pSoldier != NULL )
01635                   {
01636                         // the ONLY thing to do with away soldiers is process their schedule if they have one
01637                         // and there is an action for them to do (like go on-sector)
01638                         if (pSoldier->fAIFlags & AI_CHECK_SCHEDULE)
01639                         {
01640                               HandleSoldierAI( pSoldier );
01641                         }
01642                   }
01643             }
01644 
01645             // Turn off auto bandage if we need to...
01646             if ( gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
01647             {
01648                   if ( !CanAutoBandage( TRUE) )
01649                   {
01650                         SetAutoBandageComplete( );
01651                   }
01652             }
01653 
01654             // Check if we should be doing a special event once guys get to a location...
01655             if ( gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode != 0 )
01656             {
01657                   // Check if we have gone past our time...
01658                   if ( ( GetJA2Clock( ) - guiWaitingForAllMercsToExitTimer ) > 2500 )
01659                   {
01660                         // OK, set num waiting to 0 
01661 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
01662                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_DEBUG, L"Waiting too long for Mercs to exit...forcing entry." );
01663 #endif
01664                         gbNumMercsUntilWaitingOver = 0;
01665 
01666                         // Reset all waitng codes
01667                         for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
01668                         {
01669                               pSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
01670                               if ( pSoldier != NULL )
01671                               {
01672                                     pSoldier->ubWaitActionToDo = 0;
01673                               }
01674                         }
01675 
01676                   }
01677             }
01678 
01679                   if ( gbNumMercsUntilWaitingOver == 0 )
01680                   {
01681                         // ATE: Unset flag to ignore sight...
01682                         gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ( ~DISALLOW_SIGHT );
01683 
01684 
01685                         // OK cheif, do something here....
01686                         switch( gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode )
01687                         {
01688                         case WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKOFF_SCREEN:
01689 
01690                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
01691                               {
01692                                     guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
01693                                     HandleTacticalUI( );
01694                               }
01695                               AllMercsHaveWalkedOffSector( );
01696                               break;
01697 
01698                         case WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKON_SCREEN:
01699 
01700                               // OK, unset UI
01701                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
01702                               {
01703                                     guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
01704                                     HandleTacticalUI( );
01705                               }
01706                               break;
01707 
01708                         case WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO:
01709 
01710                               // OK, unset UI
01711                               if ( ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
01712                               {
01713                                     guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
01714                                     HandleTacticalUI( );
01715                               }
01716                               AllMercsWalkedToExitGrid( );
01717                               break;
01718 
01719                         }
01720 
01721                         // ATE; Turn off tactical status flag...
01722                         gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ( ~IGNORE_ALL_OBSTACLES );
01723 
01724                         gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode = 0;
01725                   }
01726             }
01727       
01728 
01729       // reset these AI-related global variables to 0 to ensure they don't interfere with the UI
01730       gubNPCAPBudget = 0;
01731       gubNPCDistLimit = 0;
01732 
01733       return( TRUE );
01734
