01735 }
01736 
01737 void HaltGuyFromNewGridNoBecauseOfNoAPs( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01738 {
01739       HaltMoveForSoldierOutOfPoints( pSoldier );
01740       pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
01741       pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
01742       pSoldier->ubPendingAction                = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
01743 
01744       UnMarkMovementReserved( pSoldier );
01745 
01746       // Display message if our merc...
01747       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) ) 
01748       {
01749             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ GUY_HAS_RUN_OUT_OF_APS_STR ], pSoldier->name );
01750       }
01751 
01752       UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01753 
01754       // OK, Unset engaged in CONV, something changed...
01755       UnSetEngagedInConvFromPCAction( pSoldier );
01756 
01757 }
01758 
01759 
01760 void HandleLocateToGuyAsHeWalks( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
01761 {
01762       // Our guys if option set,
01763       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
01764       {
01765             // IF tracking on, center on guy....
01766             if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TRACKING_MODE ] )
01767             {
01768                   LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
01769             }
01770       }
01771       else
01772       {
01773             // Others if visible...
01774             if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
01775             {
01776                   // ATE: If we are visible, and have not already removed roofs, goforit
01777                   if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 )
01778                   {
01779                         if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_ROOFS ) )
01780                         {
01781                               gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= SHOW_ALL_ROOFS;
01782                               SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01783                         }
01784                   }
01785 
01786                   LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, FALSE );
01787             }
01788       }
01789 }
01790 
01791 
01792 BOOLEAN HandleGotoNewGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN *pfKeepMoving, BOOLEAN fInitialMove, UINT16 usAnimState )
01793 {
01794       INT16                           sAPCost;
01795       INT16                           sBPCost;
01796       UINT16                          usNewGridNo, sOverFenceGridNo, sMineGridNo;
01797 
01798       if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT && fInitialMove )
01799       {
01800             HandleLocateToGuyAsHeWalks( pSoldier );
01801       }
01802 
01803       // Default to TRUE
01804       (*pfKeepMoving ) = TRUE;
01805 
01806       // Check for good breath....
01807       // if ( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH && !fInitialMove )
01808       if ( pSoldier->bBreath < OKBREATH )
01809       {
01810             // OK, first check for b== 0
01811             // If our currentd state is moving already....( this misses the first tile, so the user
01812             // Sees some change in their click, but just one tile
01813             if ( pSoldier->bBreath == 0 )
01814             {
01815                   // Collapse!
01816                   pSoldier->bBreathCollapsed = TRUE;
01817                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
01818 
01819                   if ( fInitialMove )
01820                   {
01821                         UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID );
01822                   }
01823 
01824                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: Out of Breath") );
01825                   return( FALSE );
01826             }
01827 
01828             // OK, if we are collapsed now, check for OK breath instead...
01829             if ( pSoldier->bCollapsed )
01830             {
01831                   // Collapse!
01832                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: Has Collapsed") );
01833                   pSoldier->bBreathCollapsed = TRUE;
01834                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
01835                   return( FALSE );
01836             }
01837 
01838       }
01839 
01840       usNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) );
01841 
01842       // OK, check if this is a fence cost....
01843       if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ usNewGridNo ][ (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] == TRAVELCOST_FENCE )
01844       {
01845             // We have been told to jump fence....
01846 
01847             // Do we have APs?
01848             sAPCost = AP_JUMPFENCE;
01849             sBPCost = BP_JUMPFENCE;
01850 
01851             if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost, FALSE )  )
01852             {
01853                   // ATE: Check for tile being clear....
01854                   sOverFenceGridNo = NewGridNo( usNewGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex + 1 ] ) );
01855 
01856                   if ( HandleNextTile( pSoldier, (INT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex + 1 ], sOverFenceGridNo, pSoldier->sFinalDestination ) )
01857                   {
01858                         // We do, adjust path data....
01859                         pSoldier->usPathIndex++;
01860                         // We go two, because we really want to start moving towards the NEXT gridno, 
01861                         // if we have any...
01862 
01863                         // LOCK PENDING ACTION COUNTER
01864                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_LOCKPENDINGACTIONCOUNTER;
01865 
01866                         SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
01867 
01868                         // OK, jump!
01869                         BeginSoldierClimbFence( pSoldier );
01870 
01871                         pSoldier->fContinueMoveAfterStanceChange = 2;
01872                   }
01873 
01874             }
01875             else
01876             {
01877                   HaltGuyFromNewGridNoBecauseOfNoAPs( pSoldier );
01878                   (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
01879             }
01880 
01881             return( FALSE ); 
01882       }
01883       else if ( InternalDoorTravelCost( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, gubWorldMovementCosts[ usNewGridNo ][ (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ][ pSoldier->bLevel ], (BOOLEAN) (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum), NULL, TRUE ) == TRAVELCOST_DOOR )
01884       {
01885             STRUCTURE * pStructure;
01886             INT8                    bDirection;
01887             INT16                   sDoorGridNo;
01888 
01889             // OK, if we are here, we have been told to get a pth through a door.
01890 
01891             // No need to check if for AI
01892 
01893             // No need to check for right key ( since the path checks for that? )
01894 
01895             // Just for now play the $&&% animation
01896             bDirection = (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ];
01897 
01898             // OK, based on the direction, get door gridno
01899             if ( bDirection == NORTH || bDirection == WEST )
01900             {
01901                   sDoorGridNo = NewGridNo( (UINT16)pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( (UINT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) );
01902             }
01903             else if ( bDirection == SOUTH || bDirection == EAST )
01904             {
01905                   sDoorGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
01906             }
01907             else
01908             {
01909 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01910                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"ERROR: Invalid Direction to approach door. (Soldier loc: %d, dir: %d).", pSoldier->sGridNo, bDirection );                 
01911 #endif
01912                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: Open door - invalid approach direction") );
01913 
01914                   HaltGuyFromNewGridNoBecauseOfNoAPs( pSoldier );
01915                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
01916                   (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
01917                   return( FALSE );
01918             }
01919 
01920             // Get door
01921             pStructure = FindStructure( sDoorGridNo, STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR );
01922 
01923             if ( pStructure == NULL )
01924             {
01925 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
01926                   ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"ERROR: Told to open door that does not exist at %d.", sDoorGridNo );                  
01927 #endif
01928                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: Door does not exist") );
01929                   HaltGuyFromNewGridNoBecauseOfNoAPs( pSoldier );
01930                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
01931                   (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
01932                   return( FALSE );
01933             }
01934 
01935             // OK, open!
01936             StartInteractiveObject( sDoorGridNo, pStructure->usStructureID, pSoldier, bDirection );
01937             InteractWithInteractiveObject( pSoldier, pStructure, bDirection );
01938 
01939             // One needs to walk after....
01940             if ( (pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum) || (gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode) || ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PCUNDERAICONTROL ) )
01941             {
01942                   pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = 1;
01943                   pSoldier->sEndDoorOpenCodeData = sDoorGridNo;
01944             }
01945             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
01946             return( FALSE );
01947       }
01948 
01949 
01950       // Find out how much it takes to move here!
01951       sAPCost = ActionPointCost( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, (INT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], usAnimState );              
01952       sBPCost = TerrainBreathPoints( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, (INT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], usAnimState );
01953 
01954       // CHECK IF THIS TILE IS A GOOD ONE!
01955       if ( !HandleNextTile( pSoldier, (INT8)pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], usNewGridNo, pSoldier->sFinalDestination ) )
01956       {
01957             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String( "HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: Tile %d Was blocked", usNewGridNo ) );
01958 
01959             // ATE: If our own guy and an initial move.. display message
01960             //if ( fInitialMove && pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum  )
01961             //{
01962             //    ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ NO_PATH_FOR_MERC ], pSoldier->name );
01963             //}
01964 
01965             pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
01966             // GO on to next guy!
01967             return( FALSE );
01968       }
01969 
01970 
01971       // just check the tile we're going to walk into
01972       if ( NearbyGroundSeemsWrong( pSoldier, usNewGridNo, FALSE, (INT16 *) &sMineGridNo ) )
01973       {
01974             if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC )
01975             {
01976                   // NearbyGroundSeemsWrong returns true with gridno NOWHERE if
01977                   // we find something by metal detector... we should definitely stop
01978                   // but we won't place a locator or say anything
01979 
01980                   // IF not in combat, stop them all
01981                   if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
01982                   {
01983                         INT32 cnt2;
01984                         SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier2;
01985 
01986                         cnt2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
01987 
01988                         // look for all mercs on the same team, 
01989                         for ( pSoldier2 = MercPtrs[ cnt2 ]; cnt2 >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; cnt2-- ,pSoldier2-- )
01990                         {       
01991                               if ( pSoldier2->bActive )
01992                               {
01993                                     EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier2, pSoldier2->sGridNo, pSoldier2->bDirection );                  
01994                               }
01995                         }
01996                   }
01997                   else
01998                   {
01999                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02000                   }
02001 
02002                   (*pfKeepMoving) = FALSE;
02003 
02004                   if (sMineGridNo != NOWHERE)
02005                   {
02006                         LocateGridNo( sMineGridNo );
02007                         // we reuse the boobytrap gridno variable here
02008                         gsBoobyTrapGridNo = sMineGridNo;
02009                         gpBoobyTrapSoldier = pSoldier;
02010                         SetStopTimeQuoteCallback( MineSpottedDialogueCallBack );
02011                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SUSPICIOUS_GROUND );
02012                   }
02013             }
02014             else
02015             {
02016                   if (sMineGridNo != NOWHERE)
02017                   {
02018 
02019                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02020                         (*pfKeepMoving) = FALSE;
02021 
02022                         gpWorldLevelData[ sMineGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT;
02023 
02024                         // better stop and reconsider what to do...
02025                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
02026                         ActionDone( pSoldier );
02027                   }
02028             }
02029       }
02030 
02031 
02032       // ATE: Check if we have sighted anyone, if so, don't do anything else...
02033       // IN other words, we have stopped from sighting...
02034       if ( pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove && !fInitialMove )
02035       {
02036             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: No APs to finish move set") );
02037             pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
02038             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02039       }
02040       else if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex == pSoldier->usPathDataSize && pSoldier->usPathDataSize == 0 )
02041       {
02042             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: No Path") );
02043             pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
02044             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02045       }
02046       //else if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn )
02047       //{
02048       // Hault guy!
02049       //    AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, TRUE );
02050       //    (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02051       //}
02052       else if ( EnoughPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, 0, FALSE )  )
02053       {
02054             BOOLEAN fDontContinue = FALSE;
02055 
02056             if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex > 0 )
02057             {
02058                   // check for running into gas
02059 
02060                   // note: this will have to use the minimum types of structures for tear/creature gas
02061                   // since there isn't a way to retrieve the smoke effect structure
02062                   if ( (gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & ANY_SMOKE_EFFECT && PreRandom( 4 ) == 0 ) || gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
02063                   {
02064                         EXPLOSIVETYPE *         pExplosive = NULL;
02065                         INT8                    bPosOfMask;
02066 
02067                         bPosOfMask = FindGasMask (pSoldier);
02068                         //if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD1POS ].bStatus[0] >= GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
02069                         //{
02070                         //    bPosOfMask = HEAD1POS;
02071                         //}
02072                         //else if ( pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].usItem == GASMASK && pSoldier->inv[ HEAD2POS ].bStatus[0] >= GASMASK_MIN_STATUS )
02073                         //{
02074                         //    bPosOfMask = HEAD2POS;
02075                         //}
02076                         //else
02077                         //{
02078                         //    bPosOfMask = NO_SLOT;
02079                         //}
02080 
02081                         // TODO: Madd: This next section is pretty lame because it can't figure out which explosive was used to actually cause a gas effect
02082                         // so for now, the first explosive to use a gas effect decides the health and breath damage for all of the gasses of that type
02083                         // (this was hard coded before by the developers - i guess they figured they didn't need to look for the actual explosion item, 
02084                         // since they only had one of each gas item?!?)
02085                         // anyway, it means that we can only have one set of health/breath damage values for each gas type, until someone has time
02086                         // to dig into this further and actually make it find the original item that caused the gas
02087                         if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) )
02088                         {
02089 
02090                               if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE )
02091                               {
02092                                     if ( bPosOfMask == NO_SLOT )
02093                                     {
02094                                           pExplosive = &( Explosive[ Item[ GetFirstExplosiveOfType(EXPLOSV_SMOKE) ].ubClassIndex ]);
02095                                     }
02096                               }
02097                               
02098                               //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Overhead pExplosive: %d", pExplosive->ubType );
02099                               if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS )
02100                               {
02101                                     if ( !(pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_TEARGAS) && bPosOfMask == NO_SLOT )
02102                                     {
02103                                           pExplosive = &( Explosive[ Item[ GetFirstExplosiveOfType(EXPLOSV_TEARGAS) ].ubClassIndex ]);
02104                                     }
02105                               }
02106                               
02107                               //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Overhead pExplosive: %d", pExplosive->ubType );
02108                               if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS )
02109                               {
02110                                     if ( !(pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_MUSTARDGAS) && bPosOfMask == NO_SLOT )
02111                                     {
02112                                           pExplosive = &(Explosive[ Item[ GetFirstExplosiveOfType(EXPLOSV_MUSTGAS) ].ubClassIndex ]);
02113                                     }
02114                               }
02115                         }
02116                         
02117                         //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Overhead pExplosive: %d", pExplosive->ubType );
02118                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_CREATUREGAS )
02119                         {
02120                               if ( !(pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_CREATUREGAS) ) // gas mask doesn't help vs creaturegas
02121                               {
02122                                     pExplosive = &(Explosive[ Item[ GetFirstExplosiveOfType(EXPLOSV_CREATUREGAS) ].ubClassIndex ]);
02123                               }
02124                         }
02125                         
02126                         //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Overhead pExplosive: %d", pExplosive->ubType );
02127                         if ( gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS )
02128                         {
02129                               if ( !(pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags & HIT_BY_BURNABLEGAS) )
02130                               {
02131                                     pExplosive = &(Explosive[ Item[ GetFirstExplosiveOfType(EXPLOSV_BURNABLEGAS) ].ubClassIndex ]);
02132                               }
02133                         }
02134                         
02135                         //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Overhead pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags: %d", pSoldier->fHitByGasFlags ); 
02136                         //ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Overhead pExplosive: %d", pExplosive->ubType );   
02137 
02138                         if ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].ubExtFlags[pSoldier->bLevel] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE ))
02139                         {
02140                               if ( pExplosive )
02141                               {
02142                                     EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02143                                     fDontContinue = TRUE;
02144 
02145                                     DishOutGasDamage( pSoldier, pExplosive, TRUE, FALSE, 
02146                                           (INT16) (pExplosive->ubDamage + (UINT8)PreRandom( pExplosive->ubDamage ) ),
02147                                           (INT16) (100 * ( pExplosive->ubStunDamage + (INT16)PreRandom( ( pExplosive->ubStunDamage / 2 ) ) ) ), NOBODY );
02148                               }
02149                         }
02150                   }
02151 
02152                   if ( !fDontContinue )
02153                   {
02154 
02155                         if ( (pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == FLAT_FLOOR || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == PAVED_ROAD) && pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
02156                         {
02157                               INT32  iMarblesIndex;
02158 
02159                               if ( MarblesExistAtLocation( pSoldier->sGridNo, 0, &iMarblesIndex ) )
02160                               {
02161                                     // Slip on marbles!
02162                                     DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02163                                     if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02164                                     {
02165                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, Message[ STR_SLIPPED_MARBLES ], pSoldier->name );
02166                                     }                       
02167                                     RemoveItemFromPool( pSoldier->sGridNo, iMarblesIndex, 0 );
02168                                     SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
02169                                     if (pSoldier->bActionPoints > 0)
02170                                     {
02171                                           pSoldier->bActionPoints -= (INT8) (Random( pSoldier->bActionPoints ) + 1);
02172                                     }
02173                                     return( FALSE );
02174                               }
02175                         }
02176 
02177                         if ( (pSoldier->bBlindedCounter > 0) && (pSoldier->usAnimState == RUNNING) && (Random( 5 ) == 0) && 
02178                               OKFallDirection( pSoldier, (INT16) (pSoldier->sGridNo + DirectionInc( pSoldier->bDirection ) ), pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bDirection, pSoldier->usAnimState ) )
02179                         {
02180                               // 20% chance of falling over!
02181                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02182                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 37 ], pSoldier->name );
02183                               SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
02184                               if (pSoldier->bActionPoints > 0)
02185                               {
02186                                     pSoldier->bActionPoints -= (INT8) (Random( pSoldier->bActionPoints ) + 1);
02187                               }
02188                               return( FALSE );
02189                         }
02190                         else if ( ( GetDrunkLevel( pSoldier ) == DRUNK ) && (Random( 5 ) == 0) && 
02191                               OKFallDirection( pSoldier, (INT16) (pSoldier->sGridNo + DirectionInc( pSoldier->bDirection ) ), pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bDirection, pSoldier->usAnimState ) )
02192                         {
02193                               // 20% chance of falling over!
02194                               DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 );
02195                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, gzLateLocalizedString[ 37 ], pSoldier->name );
02196                               SoldierCollapse( pSoldier );
02197                               if (pSoldier->bActionPoints > 0)
02198                               {
02199                                     pSoldier->bActionPoints -= (INT8) (Random( pSoldier->bActionPoints ) + 1);
02200                               }
02201                               return( FALSE );
02202                         }
02203                         else
02204                               // ATE; First check for profile
02205                               // Forgetful guy might forget his path
02206                               if ( (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) && gMercProfiles[pSoldier->ubProfile].bPersonalityTrait == FORGETFUL )
02207                               {
02208                                     if ( pSoldier->ubNumTilesMovesSinceLastForget < 255 )
02209                                     {
02210                                           pSoldier->ubNumTilesMovesSinceLastForget++;
02211                                     }
02212 
02213                                     if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex > 2 && (Random( 100 ) == 0) && pSoldier->ubNumTilesMovesSinceLastForget > 200 )
02214                                     {
02215                                           pSoldier->ubNumTilesMovesSinceLastForget = 0;
02216 
02217                                           TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_TRAIT );
02218                                           EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02219                                           if (pSoldier->bActionPoints > 0)
02220                                           {
02221                                                 pSoldier->bActionPoints -= (INT8) (Random( pSoldier->bActionPoints ) + 1);
02222                                           }
02223 
02224                                           fDontContinue = TRUE;
02225 
02226                                           UnSetUIBusy( pSoldier->ubID  );
02227                                     }
02228                               }
02229 
02230                   }
02231             }     
02232 
02233             if ( !fDontContinue )
02234             {
02235                   // Don't apply the first deduction in points...
02236                   if ( usAnimState == CRAWLING && pSoldier->fTurningFromPronePosition > 1 )
02237                   {
02238                   }
02239                   else
02240                   {
02241                         // Adjust AP/Breathing points to move
02242                         DeductPoints( pSoldier, sAPCost, sBPCost );
02243                   }
02244 
02245                   // OK, let's check for monsters....
02246                   if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
02247                   {
02248                         if ( !ValidCreatureTurn( pSoldier, ( INT8 ) ( pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) ) )
02249                         {
02250                               if ( !pSoldier->bReverse )
02251                               {
02252                                     pSoldier->bReverse = TRUE;
02253 
02254                                     if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == INFANT_MONSTER )
02255                                     {
02256                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, WALK_BACKWARDS, 1, TRUE );
02257                                     }
02258                                     else
02259                                     {
02260                                           ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, MONSTER_WALK_BACKWARDS, 1, TRUE );
02261                                     }
02262                               }
02263                         }
02264                         else
02265                         {
02266                               pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
02267                         }
02268                   }
02269 
02270                   // OK, let's check for monsters....
02271                   if (pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
02272                   {
02273                         if ( !ValidCreatureTurn( pSoldier, ( INT8 ) ( pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ] ) ) )
02274                         {
02275                               if ( !pSoldier->bReverse )
02276                               {
02277                                     pSoldier->bReverse = TRUE;
02278                                     ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, BLOODCAT_WALK_BACKWARDS, 1, TRUE );
02279                               }
02280                         }
02281                         else
02282                         {
02283                               pSoldier->bReverse = FALSE;
02284                         }
02285                   }
02286 
02287                   // Change desired direction
02288                   EVENT_InternalSetSoldierDestination( pSoldier, pSoldier->usPathingData[ pSoldier->usPathIndex ], fInitialMove, usAnimState );       
02289 
02290                   // CONTINUE
02291                   // IT'S SAVE TO GO AGAIN, REFRESH flag
02292                   AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
02293             }
02294       }
02295       else
02296       {
02297             // HALT GUY HERE
02298             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("HandleGotoNewGridNo() Failed: No APs %d %d", sAPCost, pSoldier->bActionPoints ) );
02299             HaltGuyFromNewGridNoBecauseOfNoAPs( pSoldier );
02300             pSoldier->bEndDoorOpenCode = FALSE;
02301             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02302       }
02303 
02304       return( TRUE );
02305 }
02306 
02307 void HandleMaryArrival( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
02308 {
02309       INT16 sDist;
02310 
02311       if ( !pSoldier )
02312       {
02313             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARY, TRUE );
02314             if ( !pSoldier )
02315             {
02316                   return;
02317             }
02318       }
02319 
02320       if ( CheckFact( FACT_JOHN_ALIVE, 0 ) )
02321       {
02322             return;
02323       }
02324       // new requirements: player close by
02325       else if (PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, 8228 ) < 40)
02326       {
02327             if ( ClosestPC( pSoldier, &sDist ) != NOWHERE && sDist > NPC_TALK_RADIUS * 2 )
02328             {
02329                   // too far away
02330                   return;
02331             }
02332 
02333             // Mary has arrived
02334             SetFactTrue( FACT_MARY_OR_JOHN_ARRIVED );
02335 
02336             EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02337 
02338             TriggerNPCRecord( MARY, 13 );
02339       }
02340 
02341 }
02342 
02343 void HandleJohnArrival( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
02344 {
02345       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier2 = NULL;
02346       INT16 sDist;
02347 
02348       if ( !pSoldier )
02349       {
02350             pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( JOHN, TRUE );
02351             if ( !pSoldier )
02352             {
02353                   return;
02354             }
02355       }
02356 
02357       if (PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, 8228 ) < 40)
02358       {
02359             if ( ClosestPC( pSoldier, &sDist ) != NOWHERE && sDist > NPC_TALK_RADIUS * 2 )
02360             {
02361                   // too far away
02362                   return;
02363             }
02364 
02365             if ( CheckFact( FACT_MARY_ALIVE, 0 ) )
02366             {
02367                   pSoldier2 = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARY, FALSE );
02368                   if ( pSoldier2 )
02369                   {
02370                         if ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier2->sGridNo ) > 8 )
02371                         {
02372                               // too far away!
02373                               return;
02374                         }
02375                   }
02376             }
02377 
02378             SetFactTrue( FACT_MARY_OR_JOHN_ARRIVED );
02379 
02380             EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02381 
02382             // if Mary is alive/dead
02383             if ( pSoldier2 )
02384             {
02385                   EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier2, pSoldier2->sGridNo, pSoldier2->bDirection );
02386                   TriggerNPCRecord( JOHN, 13 );
02387             }
02388             else
02389             {
02390                   TriggerNPCRecord( JOHN, 12 );
02391             }
02392       }
02393 }
02394 
02395 
02396 BOOLEAN HandleAtNewGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN *pfKeepMoving )
02397 {
02398       INT16                                                                               sMineGridNo;
02399       UINT8                               ubVolume;
02400 
02401       
02402       // ATE; Handle bad guys, as they fade, to cancel it if
02403       // too long...
02404       // ONLY if fading IN!
02405       if ( pSoldier->fBeginFade     == 1 )
02406       {
02407             if ( pSoldier->sLocationOfFadeStart != pSoldier->sGridNo )
02408             {
02409                   // Turn off
02410                   pSoldier->fBeginFade = FALSE;
02411 
02412                   if ( pSoldier->bLevel > 0 && gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].pRoofHead != NULL )
02413                   {
02414                         pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pRoofHead->ubShadeLevel;
02415                   }
02416                   else
02417                   {
02418                         pSoldier->ubFadeLevel = gpWorldLevelData[ pSoldier->sGridNo ].pLandHead->ubShadeLevel;
02419                   }
02420 
02421               // Set levelnode shade level....
02422               if ( pSoldier->pLevelNode )
02423                   {
02424                     pSoldier->pLevelNode->ubShadeLevel = pSoldier->ubFadeLevel;
02425                   }
02426                   pSoldier->bVisible = -1;
02427 
02428             }
02429       }
02430 
02431       if (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
02432       {
02433             HandleLocateToGuyAsHeWalks( pSoldier );
02434       }
02435 
02436       // Default to TRUE
02437       (*pfKeepMoving ) = TRUE;
02438 
02439       pSoldier->bTilesMoved++;
02440       if ( pSoldier->usAnimState == RUNNING )
02441       {
02442             // count running as double
02443             pSoldier->bTilesMoved++;
02444       }
02445 
02446       // First if we are in realtime combat or noncombat
02447       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & REALTIME) || !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02448       {
02449             // Update value for RT breath update
02450             pSoldier->ubTilesMovedPerRTBreathUpdate++;
02451             // Update last anim
02452             pSoldier->usLastMovementAnimPerRTBreathUpdate = pSoldier->usAnimState;
02453       }
02454 
02455       // Update path if showing path in RT
02456       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_ALWAYS_SHOW_MOVEMENT_PATH ] )
02457       {
02458             if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02459             {
02460                   gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
02461             }
02462       }
02463 
02464       // ATE: Put some stuff in here to not handle certain things if we are
02465       // trversing...
02466       if ( gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALKOFF_SCREEN || gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode == WAIT_FOR_MERCS_TO_WALK_TO_GRIDNO )
02467       {
02468             return( TRUE );
02469       }
02470 
02471       // Check if they are out of breath
02472       if ( CheckForBreathCollapse( pSoldier ) )
02473       {
02474             (*pfKeepMoving ) = TRUE;
02475             return( FALSE );
02476       }
02477 
02478       // see if a mine gets set off...
02479       if (SetOffBombsInGridNo( pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, FALSE, pSoldier->bLevel ) )
02480       {
02481             (*pfKeepMoving) = FALSE;
02482             EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02483             return( FALSE );
02484       }
02485 
02486 
02487       // Set "interrupt occurred" flag to false so that we will know whether *this 
02488       // particular call* to HandleSight caused an interrupt
02489       gTacticalStatus.fInterruptOccurred = FALSE;
02490 
02491       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
02492       {
02493             ubVolume = MovementNoise( pSoldier );
02494             if (ubVolume > 0)
02495             {
02496                   MakeNoise( pSoldier->ubID, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier->bOverTerrainType, ubVolume, NOISE_MOVEMENT );
02497                   if ( (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC) && (pSoldier->bStealthMode) )
02498                   {
02499                         PlayStealthySoldierFootstepSound( pSoldier );
02500                   }
02501             }
02502       }
02503 
02504       // ATE: Make sure we don't make another interrupt...
02505       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fInterruptOccurred )
02506       {
02507             // Handle New sight
02508             HandleSight(pSoldier,SIGHT_LOOK | SIGHT_RADIO | SIGHT_INTERRUPT);
02509       }
02510 
02511       // ATE: Check if we have sighted anyone, if so, don't do anything else...
02512       // IN other words, we have stopped from sighting...
02513       if (gTacticalStatus.fInterruptOccurred)
02514       {
02515             // Unset no APs value
02516             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, TRUE );
02517 
02518             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02519             pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
02520             pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
02521 
02522             // ATE: Cancel only if our final destination
02523             if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == pSoldier->sFinalDestination )
02524             {
02525                   pSoldier->ubPendingAction                = NO_PENDING_ACTION;                                                                                           
02526             }
02527 
02528             // this flag is set only to halt the currently moving guy; reset it now
02529             gTacticalStatus.fInterruptOccurred = FALSE;
02530 
02531             // ATE: Remove this if we were stopped....
02532             if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn )
02533             {
02534                   if ( gTacticalStatus.ubEnemySightingOnTheirTurnEnemyID == pSoldier->ubID )
02535                   {
02536                         pSoldier->fPauseAllAnimation = FALSE;
02537                         gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn = FALSE;
02538                   }
02539             }
02540       }
02541       else if ( pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove )
02542       {
02543             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02544       }
02545       else if ( pSoldier->usPathIndex == pSoldier->usPathDataSize && pSoldier->usPathDataSize == 0 )
02546       {
02547             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02548       }
02549       else if ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemySightingOnTheirTurn )
02550       {
02551             // Hault guy!
02552             AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, TRUE );
02553             (*pfKeepMoving ) = FALSE;
02554       }
02555 
02556       // OK, check for other stuff like mines...
02557       if (NearbyGroundSeemsWrong( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, TRUE, &sMineGridNo ))
02558       {
02559             if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
02560             {
02561                   // NearbyGroundSeemsWrong returns true with gridno NOWHERE if
02562                   // we find something by metal detector... we should definitely stop
02563                   // but we won't place a locator or say anything
02564 
02565       // IF not in combat, stop them all
02566       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
02567       {
02568             INT32 cnt2;
02569             SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier2;
02570 
02571             cnt2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
02572 
02573         // look for all mercs on the same team, 
02574         for ( pSoldier2 = MercPtrs[ cnt2 ]; cnt2 >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; cnt2-- ,pSoldier2-- )
02575             {       
02576                   if ( pSoldier2->bActive )
02577                   {
02578                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier2, pSoldier2->sGridNo, pSoldier2->bDirection );                  
02579                   }
02580             }
02581       }
02582       else
02583       {
02584                     EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02585       }
02586 
02587                   (*pfKeepMoving) = FALSE;
02588 
02589                   if (sMineGridNo != NOWHERE)
02590                   {
02591                         LocateGridNo( sMineGridNo );
02592                         // we reuse the boobytrap gridno variable here
02593                         gsBoobyTrapGridNo = sMineGridNo;
02594                         gpBoobyTrapSoldier = pSoldier;
02595                         SetStopTimeQuoteCallback( MineSpottedDialogueCallBack );
02596                         TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_SUSPICIOUS_GROUND );
02597                   }
02598             }
02599             else
02600             {
02601                   if (sMineGridNo != NOWHERE)
02602                   {
02603 
02604                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02605                         (*pfKeepMoving) = FALSE;
02606 
02607                         gpWorldLevelData[ sMineGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_ENEMY_MINE_PRESENT;
02608 
02609                         // better stop and reconsider what to do...
02610                         SetNewSituation( pSoldier );
02611                         ActionDone( pSoldier );
02612                   }
02613             }
02614       }
02615 
02616       HandleSystemNewAISituation( pSoldier, FALSE );
02617 
02618       if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02619       {
02620             if ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI == MERC_TYPE__EPC)
02621             {
02622                   // are we there yet?
02623                   if (pSoldier->sSectorX == 13 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_B && pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0)
02624                   {
02625                         switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
02626                         {
02627                               case SKYRIDER:
02628                                     if (PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, 8842 ) < 11)
02629                                     {
02630                                           // Skyrider has arrived!
02631                                           EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02632                                           SetFactTrue( FACT_SKYRIDER_CLOSE_TO_CHOPPER );
02633                                           TriggerNPCRecord( SKYRIDER, 15 );
02634                                           SetUpHelicopterForPlayer( 13, MAP_ROW_B );
02635                                     }
02636                                     break;
02637 
02638                               case MARY:
02639                                     HandleMaryArrival( pSoldier );
02640                                     break;
02641 
02642                               case JOHN:
02643                                     HandleJohnArrival( pSoldier );
02644                                     break;
02645                         }
02646                   }
02647                   else if ( pSoldier->ubProfile == MARIA && (pSoldier->sSectorX == 6 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_C && pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0) && CheckFact( FACT_MARIA_ESCORTED_AT_LEATHER_SHOP, MARIA ) == TRUE )
02648                   {
02649                         // check that Angel is there!
02650                         if ( NPCInRoom( ANGEL, 2 ) ) // room 2 is leather shop
02651                         {
02652                         //    UnRecruitEPC( MARIA );
02653                               TriggerNPCRecord( ANGEL, 12 );
02654                         }
02655                   }
02656                   else if ( ( pSoldier->ubProfile == JOEY ) && (pSoldier->sSectorX == 8 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_G && pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 ) )
02657                   {
02658                         // if Joey walks near Martha then trigger Martha record 7
02659                         if ( CheckFact( FACT_JOEY_NEAR_MARTHA, 0 ) )
02660                         {
02661                               EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
02662                               TriggerNPCRecord( JOEY, 9 );
02663                         }
02664                   }
02665             
02666             }
02667             // Drassen stuff for John & Mary
02668             else if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_ESCORT_TOURISTS ] == QUESTINPROGRESS && pSoldier->sSectorX == 13 && pSoldier->sSectorY == MAP_ROW_B && pSoldier->bSectorZ == 0 )
02669             {
02670                   if ( CheckFact( FACT_JOHN_ALIVE, 0 ) )
02671                   {
02672                         HandleJohnArrival( NULL );
02673                   }
02674                   else
02675                   {
02676                         HandleMaryArrival( NULL );
02677                   }
02678             }
02679 
02680       }
02681       else if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pSoldier->bNeutral )
02682       {
02683             switch( pSoldier->ubProfile ) 
02684             {
02685                   case JIM:
02686                   case JACK:
02687                   case OLAF:
02688                   case RAY:
02689                   case OLGA:
02690                   case TYRONE:
02691                         {
02692                               INT16 sDesiredMercDist;
02693                               
02694                               if ( ClosestPC( pSoldier, &sDesiredMercDist ) != NOWHERE )
02695                               {
02696                                     if ( sDesiredMercDist <= NPC_TALK_RADIUS * 2 )
02697                                     {
02698                                           // stop
02699                                           CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
02700                                           // aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaatttaaaack!!!!
02701                                           AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pSoldier->ubID );
02702                                           //MakeCivHostile( pSoldier, 2 );
02703                                           //TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( pSoldier->ubProfile );
02704                                     }
02705                               }
02706                         }
02707                         break;
02708                   default:
02709                         break;
02710             }
02711       }
02712       return( TRUE );
02713 }
02714 
02715 
02716 void SelectNextAvailSoldier( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
02717 {
02718       INT32                           cnt;
02719       SOLDIERTYPE             *pTeamSoldier;
02720       BOOLEAN                 fSoldierFound = FALSE;
02721       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SelectNextAvailSoldier"));
02722 
02723       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
02724       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
02725 
02726       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
02727       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
02728       {       
02729             if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier )  )
02730             {
02731                   fSoldierFound = TRUE;
02732                   break;
02733             }
02734       }
02735 
02736       if ( fSoldierFound )
02737       {
02738             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SelectNextAvailSoldier: selectsoldier"));
02739                   SelectSoldier( (INT16)cnt, FALSE, FALSE );
02740       }
02741       else
02742       {
02743             gusSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER;
02744             // Change UI mode to reflact that we are selected
02745             guiPendingOverrideEvent = I_ON_TERRAIN;
02746       }
02747 
02748       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SelectNextAvailSoldier: done"));
02749 }
02750 
02751 
02752 
02753 
02754 void InternalSelectSoldier( UINT16 usSoldierID, BOOLEAN fAcknowledge, BOOLEAN fForceReselect, BOOLEAN fFromUI )
02755 {
02756       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier, *pOldSoldier;
02757 
02758 
02759       // ARM: can't call SelectSoldier() in mapscreen, that will initialize interface panels!!!
02760   // ATE: Adjusted conditions a bit ( sometimes were not getting selected )
02761       if ( guiCurrentScreen == LAPTOP_SCREEN || guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
02762   {
02763       return;
02764       }
02765 
02766       if ( usSoldierID == NOBODY )
02767       {
02768             return;
02769       }
02770 
02771       //if we are in the shop keeper interface
02772       if( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_SHOPKEEP_INTERFACE )
02773       {
02774             //dont allow the player to change the selected merc
02775             return;
02776       }
02777 
02778 
02779   // Get guy
02780   pSoldier = MercPtrs[ usSoldierID ];
02781 
02782 
02783       // If we are dead, ignore
02784       if ( !OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier) )
02785       {
02786             return;
02787       }
02788 
02789       // Don't do it if we don't have an interrupt
02790       if ( !OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pSoldier ) )
02791       {
02792             // OK, we want to display message that we can't....
02793     if ( fFromUI )
02794     {
02795               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ MERC_IS_UNAVAILABLE_STR ], pSoldier->name );
02796     }
02797             return;
02798       }
02799 
02800       if ( pSoldier->ubID == gusSelectedSoldier )
02801       {
02802             if ( !fForceReselect )
02803             {
02804                   return;
02805             }
02806       }
02807 
02808       // CANCEL FROM PLANNING MODE!
02809       if ( InUIPlanMode( ) )
02810       {
02811             EndUIPlan( );
02812       }
02813 
02814       // Unselect old selected guy
02815       if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NO_SOLDIER )
02816       {
02817             // Get guy
02818             pOldSoldier = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ];
02819             pOldSoldier->fShowLocator       = FALSE;
02820             pOldSoldier->fFlashLocator = FALSE;
02821 
02822             // DB This used to say pSoldier... I fixed it
02823             if ( pOldSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
02824             {
02825                   //ConcealWalls((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE), REVEAL_WALLS_RADIUS);
02826             //    ApplyTranslucencyToWalls((INT16)(pOldSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pOldSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02827                   //LightHideTrees((INT16)(pOldSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pOldSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02828             }
02829             //DeleteSoldierLight( pOldSoldier );
02830 
02831             if(pOldSoldier->uiStatusFlags&SOLDIER_GREEN_RAY)
02832             {
02833                   LightHideRays((INT16)(pOldSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pOldSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02834                   pOldSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_GREEN_RAY);
02835             }
02836 
02837             UpdateForContOverPortrait( pOldSoldier, FALSE );
02838       }
02839 
02840       gusSelectedSoldier = (UINT16)usSoldierID;
02841              
02842       // find which squad this guy is, then set selected squad to this guy
02843       SetCurrentSquad( pSoldier -> bAssignment, FALSE );
02844 
02845       if ( pSoldier->bLevel == 0 )
02846       {
02847             //RevealWalls((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE), REVEAL_WALLS_RADIUS);
02848       //    CalcTranslucentWalls((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02849             //LightTranslucentTrees((INT16)(pSoldier->dXPos/CELL_X_SIZE), (INT16)(pSoldier->dYPos/CELL_Y_SIZE));
02850       }
02851 
02852       //SetCheckSoldierLightFlag( pSoldier );
02853 
02854       // Set interface to reflect new selection!
02855       SetCurrentTacticalPanelCurrentMerc( (UINT8)usSoldierID );
02856  
02857       // PLay ATTN SOUND
02858       if ( fAcknowledge )
02859       {
02860             if( !gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_MUTE_CONFIRMATIONS ] )
02861                   DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_ATTN1 );
02862       }
02863 
02864       // Change UI mode to reflact that we are selected
02865       // NOT if we are locked inthe UI
02866       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == OUR_TEAM && gCurrentUIMode != LOCKUI_MODE && gCurrentUIMode != LOCKOURTURN_UI_MODE )
02867       {
02868             guiPendingOverrideEvent = M_ON_TERRAIN;
02869       }
02870 
02871       ChangeInterfaceLevel( pSoldier->bLevel );
02872 
02873       if( pSoldier->fMercAsleep )
02874       {
02875             PutMercInAwakeState( pSoldier );
02876       }
02877 
02878       // possibly say personality quote
02879       if ( (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__PLAYER_CHARACTER) && !( pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY) )
02880       {
02881             switch ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bPersonalityTrait )
02882             {
02883                   case PSYCHO:
02884                         if ( Random( 50 ) == 0 )
02885                         {
02886                               TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_TRAIT );
02887                               pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_PERSONALITY;
02888                         }
02889                         break;
02890                   default:
02891                         break;
02892             }
02893       }
02894 
02895       UpdateForContOverPortrait( pSoldier, TRUE );
02896 
02897       // Remove any interactive tiles we could be over!
02898       BeginCurInteractiveTileCheck( INTILE_CHECK_SELECTIVE );
02899 
02900 }
02901 
02902 void SelectSoldier( UINT16 usSoldierID, BOOLEAN fAcknowledge, BOOLEAN fForceReselect )
02903 {
02904   InternalSelectSoldier( usSoldierID, fAcknowledge, fForceReselect, FALSE );
02905 }
02906 
02907 
02908 BOOLEAN ResetAllAnimationCache(  )
02909 {
02910       UINT32                          cnt;
02911       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
02912 
02913       // Loop through all mercs and make go
02914       for ( pSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
02915       {
02916             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
02917             {
02918                   InitAnimationCache( (UINT16)cnt, &(pSoldier->AnimCache) );
02919       
02920             }
02921 
02922       }
02923 
02924       return( TRUE );
02925 }
02926 
02927             
02928 
02929 
02930 void LocateSoldier( UINT16 usID, BOOLEAN fSetLocator)
02931 {
02932       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
02933       INT16 sNewCenterWorldX, sNewCenterWorldY;
02934 
02935       //if (!bCenter && SoldierOnScreen(usID))
02936     //return;
02937 
02938       // do we need to move the screen?
02939       //ATE: Force this baby to locate if told to
02940       if (!SoldierOnScreen(usID) || fSetLocator == 10 )
02941       {
02942             // Get pointer of soldier
02943             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ usID ];
02944       
02945             // Center on guy
02946             sNewCenterWorldX = (INT16)pSoldier->dXPos;
02947             sNewCenterWorldY = (INT16)pSoldier->dYPos;
02948 
02949             SetRenderCenter( sNewCenterWorldX, sNewCenterWorldY );
02950 
02951             // Plot new path!
02952             gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
02953       }
02954 
02955 
02956       // do we flash the name & health bars/health string above?
02957       if (fSetLocator)
02958       {
02959             if ( fSetLocator == SETLOCATOR || fSetLocator == 10 )
02960             {
02961               ShowRadioLocator((UINT8)usID, SHOW_LOCATOR_NORMAL );
02962             }
02963             else
02964             {
02965               ShowRadioLocator((UINT8)usID, SHOW_LOCATOR_FAST );
02966             }
02967       }
02968 }
02969 
02970 
02971 void InternalLocateGridNo( UINT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fForce )
02972 {
02973       INT16 sNewCenterWorldX, sNewCenterWorldY;
02974       
02975       ConvertGridNoToCenterCellXY( sGridNo, &sNewCenterWorldX, &sNewCenterWorldY );
02976 
02977       // FIRST CHECK IF WE ARE ON SCREEN
02978       if ( GridNoOnScreen( sGridNo ) && !fForce )
02979       {
02980             return;
02981       }
02982       
02983       SetRenderCenter( sNewCenterWorldX, sNewCenterWorldY );
02984 }
02985 
02986 void LocateGridNo( UINT16 sGridNo )
02987 {
02988       InternalLocateGridNo( sGridNo, FALSE );
02989 }
02990 
02991 
02992 
02993 void SlideTo(INT16 sGridno, UINT16 usSoldierID , UINT16 usReasonID, BOOLEAN fSetLocator)
02994 {
02995       INT32 cnt;
02996 
02997 
02998       if ( usSoldierID == NOBODY )
02999       {
03000             return;
03001       }
03002 
03003       if ( fSetLocator == SETANDREMOVEPREVIOUSLOCATOR )
03004       {
03005             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
03006             {
03007                   if ( MercPtrs[ cnt ]->bActive && MercPtrs[ cnt ]->bInSector )
03008                   {
03009                         // Remove all existing locators...
03010                         MercPtrs[ cnt ]->fFlashLocator = FALSE;
03011                   }
03012             }
03013       }
03014 
03015       // Locate even if on screen
03016       if (fSetLocator)
03017              ShowRadioLocator((UINT8) usSoldierID, SHOW_LOCATOR_NORMAL );
03018 
03019       // FIRST CHECK IF WE ARE ON SCREEN
03020       if ( GridNoOnScreen( MercPtrs[ usSoldierID ]->sGridNo ) )
03021       {
03022             return;
03023       }
03024 
03025       // sGridNo here for DG compatibility
03026       gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget = MercPtrs[ usSoldierID ]->sGridNo;
03027       gTacticalStatus.sSlideReason = usReasonID;
03028 
03029       // Plot new path!
03030       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
03031 }
03032 
03033 
03034 void SlideToLocation( UINT16 usReasonID, INT16 sDestGridNo )
03035 {
03036       if ( sDestGridNo == NOWHERE )
03037       {
03038             return;
03039       }
03040 
03041       // FIRST CHECK IF WE ARE ON SCREEN
03042       if ( GridNoOnScreen( sDestGridNo ) )
03043       {
03044             return;
03045       }
03046 
03047       // sGridNo here for DG compatibility
03048       gTacticalStatus.sSlideTarget = sDestGridNo;
03049       gTacticalStatus.sSlideReason = usReasonID;
03050 
03051       // Plot new path!
03052       gfPlotNewMovement = TRUE;
03053 }
03054 
03055 
03056 void RebuildAllSoldierShadeTables( )
03057 {
03058       UINT32                          cnt;
03059       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
03060 
03061       // Loop through all mercs and make go
03062       for ( pSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
03063       {
03064             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
03065             {
03066                   CreateSoldierPalettes( pSoldier );
03067             }
03068       }
03069 
03070 }
03071 
03072 void HandlePlayerTeamMemberDeath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03073 {
03074       INT32                    cnt;
03075   INT32                    iNewSelectedSoldier;
03076       SOLDIERTYPE             *pTeamSoldier;
03077       BOOLEAN                 fMissionFailed = TRUE;
03078       INT8                                                        bBuddyIndex;
03079 
03080       VerifyPublicOpplistDueToDeath( pSoldier );
03081 
03082       ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pSoldier );
03083 
03084 
03085       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
03086       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
03087 
03088       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
03089       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03090       {       
03091             if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
03092             {
03093       iNewSelectedSoldier = cnt;
03094                   fMissionFailed = FALSE;
03095                   break;
03096             }
03097       }
03098 
03099 
03100       if ( !fMissionFailed )
03101       {
03102             if (gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode)
03103             {
03104                   if ( pSoldier->ubAutoBandagingMedic != NOBODY )
03105                   {
03106                         CancelAIAction( MercPtrs[ pSoldier->ubAutoBandagingMedic ], TRUE );
03107                   }
03108             }
03109 
03110             // see if this was the friend of a living merc
03111       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
03112             for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03113             {       
03114                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
03115                   {
03116                         bBuddyIndex = WhichBuddy( pTeamSoldier->ubProfile, pSoldier->ubProfile );
03117                         switch( bBuddyIndex )
03118                         {
03119                               case 0:
03120                                     // buddy #1 died!
03121                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_BUDDY_ONE_KILLED );
03122                                     break;
03123                               case 1:
03124                                     // buddy #2 died!
03125                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_BUDDY_TWO_KILLED );
03126                                     break;
03127                               case 2:
03128                                     // learn to like buddy died!
03129                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pTeamSoldier, QUOTE_LEARNED_TO_LIKE_MERC_KILLED );
03130                                     break;
03131                               default:
03132                                     break;
03133                         }
03134                   }
03135             }
03136 
03137             // handle stuff for Carmen if Slay is killed
03138             switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
03139             {
03140                   case SLAY:
03141                         pTeamSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( CARMEN, FALSE );
03142                         if (pTeamSoldier && pTeamSoldier->bAttitude == ATTACKSLAYONLY && ClosestPC( pTeamSoldier, NULL ) != NOWHERE )
03143                         {
03144                               // Carmen now becomes friendly again
03145                               TriggerNPCRecord( CARMEN, 29 );
03146                         }
03147                         break;
03148                   case ROBOT:
03149                         if (CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_ROBOT_DESTROYED, 0 ) == FALSE )
03150                         {
03151                               SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_ROBOT_DESTROYED );
03152                               SetFactFalse( FACT_ROBOT_READY );
03153                         }
03154                         else
03155                         {
03156                               SetFactTrue( FACT_SECOND_ROBOT_DESTROYED );
03157                         }
03158                         break;
03159             }
03160 
03161       }
03162             
03163       //Make a call to handle the strategic things, such as Life Insurance, record it in history file etc.
03164       StrategicHandlePlayerTeamMercDeath( pSoldier );
03165 
03166       CheckForEndOfBattle( FALSE );
03167 
03168 
03169       if ( gusSelectedSoldier == pSoldier->ubID )
03170       {
03171             if ( !fMissionFailed )
03172             {
03173                   SelectSoldier( (INT16)iNewSelectedSoldier, FALSE, FALSE );
03174             }
03175             else
03176             {
03177                   gusSelectedSoldier = NO_SOLDIER;
03178                   // Change UI mode to reflact that we are selected
03179                   guiPendingOverrideEvent = I_ON_TERRAIN;
03180             }
03181 
03182       }
03183 }
03184 
03185 
03186 void HandleNPCTeamMemberDeath( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldierOld )
03187 {
03188       SOLDIERTYPE *pKiller = NULL;
03189   BOOLEAN bVisible;
03190 
03191       pSoldierOld->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_DEAD;
03192   bVisible = pSoldierOld->bVisible;
03193 
03194       VerifyPublicOpplistDueToDeath( pSoldierOld );
03195 
03196       if ( pSoldierOld->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03197       {
03198             // mark as dead!
03199             gMercProfiles[ pSoldierOld->ubProfile ].bMercStatus = MERC_IS_DEAD;
03200             // 
03201             gMercProfiles[ pSoldierOld->ubProfile ].bLife                     = 0;
03202 
03203             if ( !(pSoldierOld->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) && !TANK( pSoldierOld) )
03204             {
03205                   if ( pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
03206                   {
03207                         pKiller = MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ];
03208                   }
03209                   if( pKiller && pKiller->bTeam == OUR_TEAM )
03210                   {
03211                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_MERC_KILLED_CHARACTER, pSoldierOld->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
03212                   }
03213                   else
03214                   {
03215                         AddHistoryToPlayersLog( HISTORY_NPC_KILLED, pSoldierOld->ubProfile, GetWorldTotalMin(), gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
03216                   }
03217             }
03218       }
03219 
03220       if (pSoldierOld->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
03221       {
03222             SOLDIERTYPE * pOther;
03223 
03224     // ATE: Added string to player
03225     if ( bVisible != -1 && pSoldierOld->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03226     {
03227               ScreenMsg( FONT_RED, MSG_INTERFACE, pMercDeadString[ 0 ], pSoldierOld->name );
03228     }
03229 
03230             switch( pSoldierOld->ubProfile )
03231             {
03232                   case BRENDA:
03233                         SetFactTrue( FACT_BRENDA_DEAD );
03234                         {
03235                               pOther = FindSoldierByProfileID( HANS, FALSE );
03236                               if (pOther && pOther->bLife >= OKLIFE && pOther->bNeutral && (SpacesAway( pSoldierOld->sGridNo, pOther->sGridNo ) <= 12) )
03237                               {
03238                                     
03239                                     TriggerNPCRecord( HANS, 10 );
03240                               }
03241                         }
03242                         break;
03243                   case PABLO:
03244                         AddFutureDayStrategicEvent( EVENT_SECOND_AIRPORT_ATTENDANT_ARRIVED, 480 + Random( 60 ), 0, 1 );
03245                         break;
03246                   case ROBOT:
03247                         if (CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_ROBOT_DESTROYED, 0 ) == FALSE )
03248                         {
03249                               SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_ROBOT_DESTROYED );
03250                         }
03251                         else
03252                         {
03253                               SetFactTrue( FACT_SECOND_ROBOT_DESTROYED );
03254                         }
03255                         break;
03256                   case DRUGGIST:
03257                   case SLAY:
03258                   case ANNIE:
03259                   case CHRIS:
03260                   case TIFFANY:
03261                   case T_REX:
03262                         MakeRemainingTerroristsTougher();
03263                         if ( pSoldierOld->ubProfile == DRUGGIST )
03264                         {
03265                               pOther = FindSoldierByProfileID( MANNY, 0 );
03266                               if (pOther && pOther->bActive && pOther->bInSector && pOther->bLife >= OKLIFE )
03267                               {
03268                                     // try to make sure he isn't cowering etc
03269                                     pOther->sNoiseGridno = NOWHERE;
03270                                     pOther->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
03271                                     TriggerNPCRecord( MANNY, 10 );
03272                               }
03273                         }
03274                         break;
03275                   case JIM:
03276                   case JACK:
03277                   case OLAF:
03278                   case RAY:
03279                   case OLGA:
03280                   case TYRONE:
03281                         MakeRemainingAssassinsTougher();
03282                         break;
03283 
03284                   case ELDIN:
03285                         // the security guard...  Results in an extra loyalty penalty for Balime (in addition to civilian murder)
03286 
03287 /* Delayed loyalty effects elimininated.  Sep.12/98.  ARM
03288                         // create the event value, for town BALIME
03289                         uiLoyaltyValue = BuildLoyaltyEventValue( BALIME, LOYALTY_PENALTY_ELDIN_KILLED, FALSE );
03290                         // post the event, 30 minute delay
03291                         AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_TOWN_LOYALTY_UPDATE, GetWorldTotalMin() + 30, uiLoyaltyValue );
03292 */
03293                         DecrementTownLoyalty( BALIME, LOYALTY_PENALTY_ELDIN_KILLED );
03294                         break;
03295                   case JOEY:
03296                         // check to see if Martha can see this
03297                         pOther = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARTHA, FALSE );
03298                         if ( pOther && (PythSpacesAway( pOther->sGridNo, pSoldierOld->sGridNo ) < 10 || SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest( pOther, pSoldierOld, (UINT8) MaxDistanceVisible(), TRUE ) != 0 ) ) 
03299                         {
03300                               // Martha has a heart attack and croaks
03301                               TriggerNPCRecord( MARTHA, 17 );
03302 
03303 /* Delayed loyalty effects elimininated.  Sep.12/98.  ARM
03304                               // create the event value, for town CAMBRIA
03305                               uiLoyaltyValue = BuildLoyaltyEventValue( CAMBRIA, LOYALTY_PENALTY_MARTHA_HEART_ATTACK, FALSE );
03306                               // post the event, 30 minute delay
03307                               AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_TOWN_LOYALTY_UPDATE, GetWorldTotalMin() + 30, uiLoyaltyValue );
03308 */
03309                               DecrementTownLoyalty( CAMBRIA, LOYALTY_PENALTY_MARTHA_HEART_ATTACK );
03310                         }
03311                         else  // Martha doesn't see it.  She lives, but Joey is found a day or so later anyways
03312                         {
03313 /*
03314                               // create the event value, for town CAMBRIA
03315                               uiLoyaltyValue = BuildLoyaltyEventValue( CAMBRIA, LOYALTY_PENALTY_JOEY_KILLED, FALSE );
03316                               // post the event, 30 minute delay
03317                               AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_TOWN_LOYALTY_UPDATE, GetWorldTotalMin() + ( ( 12 + Random(13)) * 60 ), uiLoyaltyValue );
03318 */
03319                               DecrementTownLoyalty( CAMBRIA, LOYALTY_PENALTY_JOEY_KILLED );
03320                         }
03321                         break;
03322                   case DYNAMO:
03323                         // check to see if dynamo quest is on
03324                         if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_FREE_DYNAMO ] == QUESTINPROGRESS)
03325                         {
03326                               EndQuest( QUEST_FREE_DYNAMO, pSoldierOld->sSectorX, pSoldierOld->sSectorY );
03327                         }
03328                         break;
03329                   case KINGPIN:
03330                         // check to see if Kingpin money quest is on
03331                         if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_KINGPIN_MONEY ] == QUESTINPROGRESS)
03332                         {
03333                               EndQuest( QUEST_KINGPIN_MONEY, pSoldierOld->sSectorX, pSoldierOld->sSectorY );
03334                               HandleNPCDoAction( KINGPIN, NPC_ACTION_GRANT_EXPERIENCE_3, 0 );
03335                         }
03336                         SetFactTrue( FACT_KINGPIN_DEAD );
03337                         ExecuteStrategicAIAction( STRATEGIC_AI_ACTION_KINGPIN_DEAD, 0, 0 );
03338                         break;
03339                   case DOREEN:
03340                         // Doreen's dead
03341                         if ( CheckFact( FACT_DOREEN_HAD_CHANGE_OF_HEART, 0 ) )
03342                         {
03343                               // tsk tsk, player killed her after getting her to reconsider, lose the bonus for sparing her
03344                               DecrementTownLoyalty( DRASSEN, LOYALTY_BONUS_CHILDREN_FREED_DOREEN_SPARED );
03345                         }     // then get the points for freeing the kids though killing her
03346                         IncrementTownLoyalty( DRASSEN, LOYALTY_BONUS_CHILDREN_FREED_DOREEN_KILLED );
03347                         // set the fact true so we have a universal check for whether the kids can go
03348                         SetFactTrue( FACT_DOREEN_HAD_CHANGE_OF_HEART );
03349                         EndQuest( QUEST_FREE_CHILDREN, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
03350                         if ( CheckFact( FACT_KIDS_ARE_FREE , 0 ) == FALSE )
03351                         {
03352                               HandleNPCDoAction( DOREEN, NPC_ACTION_FREE_KIDS, 0 );
03353                         }
03354                         break;
03355             }
03356 
03357             // Are we looking at the queen?
03358             if ( pSoldierOld->ubProfile == QUEEN )
03359             {
03360                   if ( pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
03361                   {
03362                         pKiller = MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ];
03363       }
03364 
03365                   BeginHandleDeidrannaDeath( pKiller, pSoldierOld->sGridNo, pSoldierOld->bLevel );
03366             }
03367   
03368             // crows/cows are on the civilian team, but none of the following applies to them
03369             if ( ( pSoldierOld->ubBodyType != CROW ) && ( pSoldierOld->ubBodyType != COW ) )
03370             {
03371                   // If the civilian's killer is known
03372                   if ( pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
03373                   {
03374                         // handle death of civilian..and if it was intentional
03375                         HandleMurderOfCivilian( pSoldierOld, pSoldierOld->fIntendedTarget );
03376                   }
03377             }
03378       }
03379       else if ( pSoldierOld->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
03380       {
03381             INT8 bMilitiaRank;
03382             
03383             bMilitiaRank = SoldierClassToMilitiaRank( pSoldierOld->ubSoldierClass );
03384 
03385             if (bMilitiaRank != -1)
03386             {
03387                   // remove this militia from the strategic records
03388                   StrategicRemoveMilitiaFromSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, bMilitiaRank, 1 );
03389             }
03390 
03391             // If the militia's killer is known
03392             if ( pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
03393             {
03394                   // also treat this as murder - but player will never be blamed for militia death he didn't cause
03395                   HandleMurderOfCivilian( pSoldierOld, pSoldierOld->fIntendedTarget );
03396             }
03397 
03398             HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_NATIVE_KILLED, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
03399       }
03400       else  // enemies and creatures... should any of this stuff not be called if a creature dies?
03401       {
03402     if ( pSoldierOld->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
03403     {
03404                   SOLDIERTYPE *pKiller = NULL;
03405 
03406                   if ( pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY )
03407                   {
03408                         pKiller = MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ];
03409 
03410                         BeginHandleQueenBitchDeath( pKiller, pSoldierOld->sGridNo, pSoldierOld->bLevel );
03411                   }
03412     }
03413 
03414             if ( pSoldierOld->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
03415             {
03416                   gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled++;
03417                   TrackEnemiesKilled( ENEMY_KILLED_IN_TACTICAL, pSoldierOld->ubSoldierClass );
03418             }
03419             // If enemy guy was killed by the player, give morale boost to player's team!
03420             if (pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03421             {
03422                   HandleMoraleEvent( MercPtrs[pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID], MORALE_KILLED_ENEMY, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
03423             }
03424 
03425             HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_ENEMY_KILLED, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
03426 
03427             CheckForAlertWhenEnemyDies( pSoldierOld );
03428 
03429             if ( gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne == pSoldierOld->ubID )
03430             {
03431                   // reset the chosen one!
03432                   gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne = NOBODY;
03433             }
03434 
03435             if ( pSoldierOld->ubProfile == QUEEN )
03436             {
03437                   HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_DEIDRANNA_KILLED, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ  );
03438                   MaximizeLoyaltyForDeidrannaKilled( );
03439             }
03440             else if ( pSoldierOld->ubBodyType == QUEENMONSTER )
03441             {
03442                   HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_MONSTER_QUEEN_KILLED, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ  );
