03443                   IncrementTownLoyaltyEverywhere( LOYALTY_BONUS_KILL_QUEEN_MONSTER );
03444 
03445                   // Grant experience gain.....
03446                   HandleNPCDoAction( 0, NPC_ACTION_GRANT_EXPERIENCE_5, 0 );
03447 
03448             }
03449       }
03450 
03451 
03452       // killing crows/cows is not worth any experience!
03453       if ( ( pSoldierOld->ubBodyType != CROW ) && ( pSoldierOld->ubBodyType != COW ) && pSoldierOld->ubLastDamageReason != TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS )
03454       {
03455             UINT8 ubAssister;
03456 
03457             // if it was a kill by a player's merc
03458             if (pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03459             {
03460                   // EXPERIENCE CLASS GAIN:  Earned a kill
03461                   StatChange( MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ], EXPERAMT, (UINT16)( 10 * pSoldierOld->bExpLevel ), FALSE );
03462             }
03463 
03464             // JA2 Gold: if previous and current attackers are the same, the next-to-previous attacker gets the assist
03465             if (pSoldierOld->ubPreviousAttackerID == pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID)
03466             {
03467                   ubAssister = pSoldierOld->ubNextToPreviousAttackerID;
03468             }
03469             else
03470             {
03471                   ubAssister = pSoldierOld->ubPreviousAttackerID;
03472             }
03473 
03474             // if it was assisted by a player's merc
03475             if (ubAssister != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ ubAssister ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
03476             {
03477                   // EXPERIENCE CLASS GAIN:  Earned an assist
03478                   StatChange( MercPtrs[ ubAssister ], EXPERAMT, (UINT16)( 5 * pSoldierOld->bExpLevel ), FALSE );
03479             }
03480       }
03481 
03482       if (pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ]->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM )
03483       {
03484             MercPtrs[ pSoldierOld->ubAttackerID ]->ubMilitiaKills++;
03485       }
03486 
03487       //if the NPC is a dealer, add the dealers items to the ground
03488       AddDeadArmsDealerItemsToWorld( pSoldierOld->ubProfile );
03489 
03490       //The queen AI layer must process the event by subtracting forces, etc.
03491       ProcessQueenCmdImplicationsOfDeath( pSoldierOld );
03492 
03493       // OK, check for existence of any more badguys!
03494       CheckForEndOfBattle( FALSE );
03495 }
03496 
03497 UINT8 LastActiveTeamMember( UINT8 ubTeam )
03498 {
03499       INT32 cnt;
03500       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
03501 
03502       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bLastID;
03503 
03504   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
03505   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt >= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bFirstID; cnt-- ,pSoldier--)
03506       {       
03507             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
03508             {
03509                   return( (INT8)cnt );
03510             }
03511       }
03512 
03513       return( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bLastID );
03514 }
03515 
03516 void CheckForPotentialAddToBattleIncrement( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03517 {
03518       // Check if we are a threat!
03519       if ( !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) )
03520       {
03521             //if ( FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON ) != NO_SLOT )
03522             // We need to exclude cases where a kid is not neutral anymore, but is defenceless!
03523             if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM )
03524             {
03525                   // maybe increment num enemy attacked
03526                   switch ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup )
03527                   {
03528                         case REBEL_CIV_GROUP:
03529                         case KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP:
03530                         case HICKS_CIV_GROUP:
03531                               if ( FindObjClass( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON ) != NO_SLOT )
03532                               {
03533                                     gTacticalStatus.bNumFoughtInBattle[ pSoldier->bTeam ]++;          
03534                               }
03535                               break;
03536                         default:
03537                               // nope!
03538                               break;
03539                   }
03540             }
03541             else
03542             {
03543                   // Increment num enemy attacked
03544                   gTacticalStatus.bNumFoughtInBattle[ pSoldier->bTeam ]++;
03545             }
03546       }
03547 }
03548 
03549 // internal function for turning neutral to FALSE
03550 void SetSoldierNonNeutral( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
03551 {
03552       pSoldier->bNeutral = FALSE;
03553 
03554       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING )
03555       {
03556             // Special code for strategic implications
03557             CalculateNonPersistantPBIInfo();
03558       }
03559 }
03560 
03561 // internal function for turning neutral to TRUE
03562 void SetSoldierNeutral( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
03563 {
03564       pSoldier->bNeutral = TRUE;
03565 
03566       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING )
03567       {
03568             // Special code for strategic implications
03569             // search through civ team looking for non-neutral civilian!
03570             if ( !HostileCiviliansPresent() )
03571             {
03572                   CalculateNonPersistantPBIInfo();
03573             }
03574       }
03575 }
03576 void MakeCivHostile( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT8 bNewSide )
03577 {
03578       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == COW )
03579       {
03580             return;     
03581       }
03582 
03583       // override passed-in value; default is hostile to player, allied to army
03584       bNewSide = 1;
03585 
03586       switch( pSoldier->ubProfile )
03587       {
03588             case IRA:
03589             case DIMITRI:
03590             case MIGUEL:
03591             case CARLOS:
03592             case MADLAB:
03593             case DYNAMO:
03594             case SHANK:
03595                   // rebels and rebel sympathizers become hostile to player and enemy
03596                   bNewSide = 2;
03597                   break;
03598             case MARIA:
03599             case ANGEL:
03600                   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA ] == QUESTINPROGRESS || gubQuest[ QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA ] == QUESTDONE )
03601                   {
03602                         bNewSide = 2;
03603                   }
03604                   break;
03605             default:
03606                   switch( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup )
03607                   {
03608                         case REBEL_CIV_GROUP:
03609                               bNewSide = 2;
03610                               break;
03611                         default:
03612                               break;
03613                   }
03614                   break;
03615       }
03616 
03617       if ( !pSoldier->bNeutral && bNewSide == pSoldier->bSide )
03618       {
03619             // already hostile!
03620             return;
03621       }
03622 
03623       if (pSoldier->ubProfile == CONRAD || pSoldier->ubProfile == GENERAL)
03624       {
03625             // change to enemy team
03626             SetSoldierNonNeutral( pSoldier );
03627             pSoldier->bSide = bNewSide;
03628             pSoldier = ChangeSoldierTeam( pSoldier, ENEMY_TEAM );
03629       }
03630       else
03631       {
03632             if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP )
03633             {
03634                   // if Maria is in the sector and escorted, set fact that the escape has
03635                   // been noticed
03636                   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_RESCUE_MARIA ] == QUESTINPROGRESS && gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING )
03637                   {                       
03638                         SOLDIERTYPE * pMaria = FindSoldierByProfileID( MARIA, FALSE );
03639                         if ( pMaria && pMaria->bActive && pMaria->bInSector )
03640                         {
03641                               SetFactTrue( FACT_MARIA_ESCAPE_NOTICED );
03642                         }
03643                   }     
03644             }
03645             if (pSoldier->ubProfile == BILLY)
03646             {
03647                   // change orders
03648                   pSoldier->bOrders = FARPATROL;
03649             }
03650             if (bNewSide != -1)
03651             {
03652                   pSoldier->bSide = bNewSide;
03653             }
03654             if ( pSoldier->bNeutral )
03655             {
03656                   SetSoldierNonNeutral( pSoldier );
03657                   RecalculateOppCntsDueToNoLongerNeutral( pSoldier );
03658             }
03659       }
03660 
03661 
03662       // If we are already in combat...
03663       if ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
03664       {
03665             CheckForPotentialAddToBattleIncrement( pSoldier );
03666       }
03667 }
03668 
03669 UINT8 CivilianGroupMembersChangeSidesWithinProximity( SOLDIERTYPE * pAttacked )
03670 {
03671       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
03672       UINT8                               ubFirstProfile = NO_PROFILE;
03673       UINT8                               cnt;
03674 
03675       if ( pAttacked->ubCivilianGroup == NON_CIV_GROUP )
03676       {
03677             return( pAttacked->ubProfile );
03678       }
03679 
03680       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID;
03681   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ ,pSoldier++ )
03682       {
03683             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife && pSoldier->bNeutral )
03684             {
03685                   if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == pAttacked->ubCivilianGroup && pSoldier->ubBodyType != COW )
03686                   {
03687                         // if in LOS of this guy's attacker
03688                         if ( (pAttacked->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && pSoldier->bOppList[pAttacked->ubAttackerID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
03689                                     || ( PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, pAttacked->sGridNo ) < MaxDistanceVisible() ) 
03690                                     || ( pAttacked->ubAttackerID != NOBODY && PythSpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, MercPtrs[ pAttacked->ubAttackerID ]->sGridNo ) < MaxDistanceVisible() ) )
03691                         {
03692                               MakeCivHostile( pSoldier, 2 );
03693                               if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
03694                               {
03695                                     AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pSoldier->ubID );
03696                               }
03697 
03698                               if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 && ( ubFirstProfile == NO_PROFILE || Random( 2 ) ) )
03699                               {
03700                                     ubFirstProfile = pSoldier->ubProfile;
03701                               }
03702                         }
03703 
03704                   }
03705             }
03706       }
03707 
03708       return( ubFirstProfile );
03709 }
03710 
03711 SOLDIERTYPE * CivilianGroupMemberChangesSides( SOLDIERTYPE * pAttacked )
03712 {
03713       SOLDIERTYPE *           pNew;
03714       SOLDIERTYPE *           pNewAttacked = pAttacked;
03715       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
03716       UINT8                               cnt;
03717       UINT8                               ubFirstProfile = NO_PROFILE;
03718 
03719       if ( pAttacked->ubCivilianGroup == NON_CIV_GROUP )
03720       {
03721             // abort
03722             return( pNewAttacked );
03723       }
03724 
03725       // remove anyone (rebels) on our team and put them back in the civ team
03726       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bFirstID;
03727   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ ,pSoldier++)
03728       {
03729             if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife)
03730             {
03731                   if (pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == pAttacked->ubCivilianGroup)
03732                   {
03733                         // should become hostile
03734                         if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && ( ubFirstProfile == NO_PROFILE || Random( 2 ) ) )
03735                         {
03736                               ubFirstProfile = pSoldier->ubProfile;
03737                         }
03738 
03739                         pNew = ChangeSoldierTeam( pSoldier, CIV_TEAM );
03740                         if ( pSoldier == pAttacked )
03741                         {
03742                               pNewAttacked = pNew;
03743                         }
03744 
03745                   }
03746             }
03747       }
03748 
03749       // now change sides for anyone on the civ team within proximity
03750       if ( ubFirstProfile == NO_PROFILE )
03751       {
03752             // get first profile value
03753             ubFirstProfile = CivilianGroupMembersChangeSidesWithinProximity( pNewAttacked );
03754       }
03755       else
03756       {
03757             // just call
03758             CivilianGroupMembersChangeSidesWithinProximity( pNewAttacked );
03759       }
03760 
03761 /*
03762       if ( ubFirstProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03763       {
03764             TriggerFriendWithHostileQuote( ubFirstProfile );
03765       }
03766 */
03767 
03768       if ( gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pNewAttacked->ubCivilianGroup ] == CIV_GROUP_NEUTRAL )
03769       {
03770             // if the civilian group turning hostile is the Rebels
03771             if (pAttacked->ubCivilianGroup == REBEL_CIV_GROUP)
03772             {
03773                   // we haven't already reduced the loyalty back when we first set the flag to BECOME hostile
03774                   ReduceLoyaltyForRebelsBetrayed();
03775             }
03776 
03777             AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_MAKE_CIV_GROUP_HOSTILE_ON_NEXT_SECTOR_ENTRANCE, GetWorldTotalMin() + 300, pNewAttacked->ubCivilianGroup );
03778             gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ pNewAttacked->ubCivilianGroup ] = CIV_GROUP_WILL_EVENTUALLY_BECOME_HOSTILE;
03779       }
03780 
03781       return( pNewAttacked );
03782 }
03783 
03784 void CivilianGroupChangesSides( UINT8 ubCivilianGroup )
03785 {
03786       // change civ group side due to external event (wall blowing up)
03787       INT32                                                       cnt;
03788       SOLDIERTYPE *                                   pSoldier;
03789       UINT8                                                       ubFirstProfile = NO_PROFILE;
03790 
03791       gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ ubCivilianGroup ] = CIV_GROUP_HOSTILE;
03792 
03793       // now change sides for anyone on the civ team
03794       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID;
03795   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ ,pSoldier++)
03796       {
03797             if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife && pSoldier->bNeutral)
03798             {
03799                   if ( pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == ubCivilianGroup && pSoldier->ubBodyType != COW )
03800                   {                 
03801                         MakeCivHostile( pSoldier, 2 );
03802                         if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
03803                         {
03804                               AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pSoldier->ubID );
03805                         }
03806                         /*
03807                         if ( (pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE) && (pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0) && ( ubFirstProfile == NO_PROFILE || Random( 2 ) ) )
03808                         {
03809                               ubFirstProfile = pSoldier->ubProfile;
03810                         }
03811                         */
03812                   }
03813             }
03814       }
03815       
03816       /*
03817       if ( ubFirstProfile != NO_PROFILE )
03818       {
03819             TriggerFriendWithHostileQuote( ubFirstProfile );
03820       }
03821       */
03822 }
03823 
03824 void HickCowAttacked( SOLDIERTYPE * pNastyGuy, SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget )
03825 {
03826       INT32                                                       cnt;
03827       SOLDIERTYPE *                                   pSoldier;
03828 
03829       // now change sides for anyone on the civ team
03830       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID;
03831   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ ,pSoldier++)
03832       {
03833             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife && pSoldier->bNeutral && pSoldier->ubCivilianGroup == HICKS_CIV_GROUP )
03834             {
03835                   if ( SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, pNastyGuy, (UINT8) MaxDistanceVisible(), TRUE ) )
03836                   {
03837 
03838                         CivilianGroupMemberChangesSides( pSoldier );
03839                         break;
03840                   }
03841             }
03842       }
03843 }
03844 
03845 void MilitiaChangesSides( void )
03846 {
03847       // make all the militia change sides
03848 
03849       INT32                               cnt;
03850       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
03851 
03852       if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bMenInSector == 0 )
03853       {
03854             return;
03855       }
03856 
03857       // remove anyone (rebels) on our team and put them back in the civ team
03858       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID;
03859   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ ,pSoldier++)
03860       {
03861             if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife)
03862             {
03863                   if ( (gWorldSectorX ==0 && gWorldSectorY == 0) || !NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY ) )
03864                   MakeCivHostile( pSoldier, 2 );
03865                   RecalculateOppCntsDueToNoLongerNeutral( pSoldier );
03866             }
03867       }
03868 }
03869 
03870 /*
03871 void MakePotentiallyHostileCivGroupsHostile( void )
03872 {
03873       UINT8       ubLoop;
03874 
03875       // loop through all civ groups that might become hostile and set them
03876       // to hostile
03877       for ( ubLoop = REBEL_CIV_GROUP; ubLoop < NUM_CIV_GROUPS; ubLoop++ )
03878       {
03879             if (gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ ubLoop ] == CIV_GROUP_WILL_BECOME_HOSTILE)
03880             {
03881                   gTacticalStatus.fCivGroupHostile[ ubLoop ] = CIV_GROUP_HOSTILE;
03882             }
03883       }
03884 }
03885 */
03886 
03887 INT8 NumActiveAndConsciousTeamMembers( UINT8 ubTeam )
03888 {
03889       INT32 cnt;
03890       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
03891       UINT8                                   ubCount = 0;
03892 
03893       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bFirstID;
03894 
03895   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
03896   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
03897       {       
03898             if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pSoldier) )
03899             {
03900                   ubCount++;
03901             }
03902       }
03903 
03904       return( ubCount );
03905 }
03906 
03907 
03908 UINT8 FindNextActiveAndAliveMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fGoodForLessOKLife, BOOLEAN fOnlyRegularMercs )
03909 {
03910       UINT8   bLastTeamID;
03911       INT32 cnt;
03912       SOLDIERTYPE             *pTeamSoldier;
03913 
03914       cnt = pSoldier->ubID + 1;
03915       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID;
03916 
03917   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
03918   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03919       { 
03920             if ( fOnlyRegularMercs )
03921             {
03922                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && ( AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) ) )
03923                   {
03924                         continue;
03925                   }
03926             }
03927 
03928             if ( fGoodForLessOKLife )
03929             {
03930                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
03931                   {
03932                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
03933                   }
03934             }
03935             else
03936             {
03937                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
03938                   {
03939                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
03940                   }
03941             }
03942       }
03943 
03944       // none found,
03945       // Now loop back
03946       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
03947       bLastTeamID = pSoldier->ubID;
03948 
03949   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= bLastTeamID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
03950       {       
03951             if ( fOnlyRegularMercs )
03952             {
03953                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && ( AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) ) )
03954                   {
03955                         continue;
03956                   }
03957             }
03958 
03959             if ( fGoodForLessOKLife )
03960             {
03961                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
03962                   {
03963                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
03964                   }
03965             }
03966             else
03967             {
03968                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
03969                   {
03970                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
03971                   }
03972             }
03973       }
03974 
03975       // IF we are here, keep as we always were!
03976       return( pSoldier->ubID );
03977 
03978 }
03979 
03980 
03981 SOLDIERTYPE *FindNextActiveSquad( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
03982 {
03983       INT32 cnt, cnt2;
03984 
03985 
03986       for( cnt = pSoldier->bAssignment + 1 ; cnt <  NUMBER_OF_SQUADS; cnt++ )
03987       {
03988             for( cnt2 =0; cnt2 < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; cnt2++ )
03989             {
03990                    if ( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] != NULL && Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ]->bInSector && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] ) && OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] ) && !(Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
03991                    {
03992                               return( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] );
03993                    }
03994             }
03995       }
03996 
03997       // none found,
03998       // Now loop back
03999       for( cnt = 0; cnt <= pSoldier->bAssignment; cnt++ )
04000       {
04001             for( cnt2 =0; cnt2 < NUMBER_OF_SOLDIERS_PER_SQUAD; cnt2++ )
04002             {
04003                    if ( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] != NULL  && Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ]->bInSector && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] ) && OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] ) && !(Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) )
04004                    {
04005                               return( Squad[ cnt ][ cnt2 ] );
04006                    }
04007             }
04008       }
04009 
04010       // IF we are here, keep as we always were!
04011       return( pSoldier );
04012 
04013 }
04014 
04015 
04016 UINT8 FindPrevActiveAndAliveMerc( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fGoodForLessOKLife,  BOOLEAN fOnlyRegularMercs )
04017 {
04018       UINT8   bLastTeamID;
04019       INT32 cnt;
04020       SOLDIERTYPE             *pTeamSoldier;
04021 
04022 
04023       // loop back
04024       bLastTeamID = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bFirstID;
04025       cnt = pSoldier->ubID - 1;
04026 
04027   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt >= bLastTeamID; cnt--,pTeamSoldier-- )
04028       {       
04029             if ( fOnlyRegularMercs )
04030             {
04031                   if ( AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
04032                   {
04033                         continue;
04034                   }
04035             }
04036 
04037             if ( fGoodForLessOKLife )
04038             {
04039                   // Check for bLife > 0
04040                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
04041                   {
04042                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
04043                   }
04044             }
04045             else
04046             {
04047                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
04048                   {
04049                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
04050                   }
04051             }
04052       }
04053 
04054       bLastTeamID = pSoldier->ubID;
04055       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ pSoldier->bTeam ].bLastID;
04056 
04057   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
04058   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt >= bLastTeamID; cnt--,pTeamSoldier-- )
04059       {       
04060             if ( fOnlyRegularMercs )
04061             {
04062                   if ( AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
04063                   {
04064                         continue;
04065                   }
04066             }
04067 
04068             if ( fGoodForLessOKLife )
04069             {
04070                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY  && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
04071                   {
04072                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
04073                   }
04074             }
04075             else
04076             {
04077                   if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier) && OK_INTERRUPT_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pSoldier->bAssignment == pTeamSoldier->bAssignment )
04078                   {
04079                         return( (UINT8)cnt );
04080                   }
04081             }
04082       }
04083 
04084       // none found,
04085       // IF we are here, keep as we always were!
04086       return( pSoldier->ubID );
04087 
04088 }
04089 
04090 BOOLEAN CheckForPlayerTeamInMissionExit( )
04091 {
04092       INT32 cnt;
04093       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
04094       UINT8                                   bGuysIn = 0;
04095 
04096       // End the turn of player charactors
04097       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
04098 
04099   // look for all mercs on the same team, 
04100   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pSoldier++)
04101       {       
04102             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
04103             {
04104                   if ( pSoldier->fInMissionExitNode )
04105                   {
04106                         bGuysIn++;
04107                   }
04108             }
04109       }
04110 
04111       if ( bGuysIn == 0 )
04112       {
04113             return( FALSE );
04114       }
04115 
04116       if ( NumActiveAndConsciousTeamMembers( gbPlayerNum ) == 0 )
04117       {
04118             return( FALSE );
04119       }
04120 
04121       if ( bGuysIn == NumActiveAndConsciousTeamMembers( gbPlayerNum ) )
04122       {
04123             return( TRUE );
04124       }
04125 
04126       return( FALSE );
04127 }
04128 
04129 void EndTacticalDemo( )
04130 {
04131       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~DEMOMODE );
04132       gTacticalStatus.fGoingToEnterDemo = FALSE;
04133 }
04134 
04135 UINT32 EnterTacticalDemoMode()
04136 {
04137       UINT8 ubNewScene = gubCurrentScene;
04138       UINT8   ubNumScenes = NUM_RANDOM_SCENES;
04139 
04140       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeOfLastInput = GetJA2Clock();
04141 
04142       // REMOVE ALL EVENTS!
04143       DequeAllGameEvents( FALSE );
04144 
04145       // Switch into realtime/demo
04146       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ( REALTIME | DEMOMODE );
04147       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~TURNBASED);
04148       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~NPC_TEAM_DEAD);
04149       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~PLAYER_TEAM_DEAD);
04150 
04151       // Force load of guys
04152       SetLoadOverrideParams( TRUE, FALSE, NULL );
04153 
04154       // Load random level
04155       // Dont't do first three levels
04156       if ( gTacticalStatus.fNOTDOLASTDEMO )
04157       {
04158             ubNumScenes--;
04159       }
04160 
04161       do
04162       {
04163             ubNewScene = START_DEMO_SCENE + (UINT8)Random( ubNumScenes );
04164 
04165       } while( ubNewScene == gubCurrentScene );
04166 
04167       gubCurrentScene = ubNewScene;
04168 
04169       // Set demo timer
04170       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceDemoOn = GetJA2Clock();
04171 
04172       gfSGPInputReceived = FALSE;
04173 
04174       gTacticalStatus.fGoingToEnterDemo = FALSE;
04175 
04176       return( INIT_SCREEN );
04177 
04178 }
04179 
04180 CHAR8 *GetSceneFilename(  )
04181 {
04182       return( gzLevelFilenames[ gubCurrentScene ] );
04183 }
04184 
04185 extern BOOLEAN InternalOkayToAddStructureToWorld( INT16 sBaseGridNo, INT8 bLevel, DB_STRUCTURE_REF * pDBStructureRef, INT16 sExclusionID, BOOLEAN fIgnorePeople );
04186 
04187 // NB if making changes don't forget to update NewOKDestinationAndDirection
04188 INT16 NewOKDestination( SOLDIERTYPE * pCurrSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, BOOLEAN fPeopleToo, INT8 bLevel )
04189 {
04190       UINT8                         bPerson;
04191       STRUCTURE *       pStructure;
04192       INT16         sDesiredLevel;
04193       BOOLEAN                       fOKCheckStruct;
04194 
04195   if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( sGridNo ) )
04196   {
04197     return( TRUE );
04198   }
04199 
04200       if (fPeopleToo && ( bPerson = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel ) ) != NO_SOLDIER )
04201       {
04202             // we could be multitiled... if the person there is us, and the gridno is not
04203             // our base gridno, skip past these checks
04204             if ( ! (bPerson == pCurrSoldier->ubID && sGridNo != pCurrSoldier->sGridNo) )
04205             {
04206                   if ( pCurrSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04207                   {
04208                         if ( ( Menptr[ bPerson ].bVisible >= 0) || ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_MERCS ) )
04209                                return( FALSE );                 // if someone there it's NOT OK
04210                   }
04211                   else
04212                   {
04213                         return( FALSE );                 // if someone there it's NOT OK
04214                   }
04215             }
04216       }
04217 
04218       // Check structure database
04219       if ( (pCurrSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE) && !(gfEstimatePath) )
04220       {
04221             UINT16                                                      usAnimSurface;
04222             STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *          pStructureFileRef;
04223             BOOLEAN                                                     fOk;
04224             INT8                                                        bLoop;
04225             UINT16                                                      usStructureID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
04226 
04227             // this could be kinda slow...
04228 
04229             // Get animation surface...
04230             usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pCurrSoldier, pCurrSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04231             // Get structure ref...
04232             pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( pCurrSoldier->ubID, usAnimSurface, pCurrSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04233 
04234             // opposite directions should be mirrors, so only check 4
04235             if ( pStructureFileRef )
04236             {
04237                   // if ANY direction is valid, consider moving here valid
04238                   for (bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bLoop++)
04239                   {
04240                         // ATE: Only if we have a levelnode...
04241                         if ( pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL && pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
04242                         {
04243                               usStructureID = pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
04244                         }
04245                         else
04246                         {
04247                               usStructureID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
04248                         }
04249 
04250                         fOk = InternalOkayToAddStructureToWorld( sGridNo, bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[bLoop]), usStructureID, (BOOLEAN)!fPeopleToo );
04251                         if (fOk)
04252                         {
04253                               return( TRUE );
04254                         }
04255                   }
04256             }
04257             return( FALSE );
04258       }
04259       else
04260       {
04261             // quick test
04262             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructureHead != NULL )
04263             {
04264                   // Something is here, check obstruction in future
04265                   if ( bLevel == 0)
04266                   {
04267                         sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
04268                   }
04269                   else
04270                   {
04271                         sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
04272                   }
04273 
04274                   pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04275 
04276                         // ATE: If we are trying to get a path to an exit grid AND
04277                         // we are a cave....still allow this..
04278                         //if ( pStructure && gfPlotPathToExitGrid && pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CAVEWALL )
04279                   if ( pStructure && gfPlotPathToExitGrid )
04280                   {
04281                         pStructure = NULL;
04282                   }
04283 
04284                   while (pStructure != NULL)
04285                   {
04286                         if (!(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PASSABLE) )
04287                         {
04288                               fOKCheckStruct = TRUE;
04289 
04290                               // Check if this is a multi-tile
04291                               if ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_MOBILE ) && ( pCurrSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE ) )
04292                               {
04293                                     // Check IDs with soldier's ID
04294                                     if ( pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL && pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL && pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID == pStructure->usStructureID )
04295                                     {
04296                                           fOKCheckStruct = FALSE;
04297                                     }
04298                               }
04299 
04300                               if ( fOKCheckStruct )
04301                               {
04302                                     if (pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel)
04303                                     {
04304                                           return( FALSE );
04305                                     }
04306                               }
04307                         }
04308                               
04309                         pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04310                   }
04311             }
04312       }
04313       return( TRUE );
04314 }
04315 
04316 // NB if making changes don't forget to update NewOKDestination
04317 INT16 NewOKDestinationAndDirection( SOLDIERTYPE * pCurrSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bDirection, BOOLEAN fPeopleToo, INT8 bLevel )
04318 {
04319       UINT8                         bPerson;
04320       STRUCTURE *       pStructure;
04321       INT16         sDesiredLevel;
04322       BOOLEAN                       fOKCheckStruct;
04323 
04324       if (fPeopleToo && ( bPerson = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel ) ) != NO_SOLDIER )
04325       {
04326             // we could be multitiled... if the person there is us, and the gridno is not
04327             // our base gridno, skip past these checks
04328             if ( ! (bPerson == pCurrSoldier->ubID && sGridNo != pCurrSoldier->sGridNo) )
04329             {
04330                   if ( pCurrSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
04331                   {
04332                         if ( ( Menptr[ bPerson ].bVisible >= 0) || ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_MERCS ) )
04333                                return( FALSE );                 // if someone there it's NOT OK
04334                   }
04335                   else
04336                   {
04337                         return( FALSE );                 // if someone there it's NOT OK
04338                   }
04339             }
04340       }
04341 
04342       // Check structure database
04343       if ( ( pCurrSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE ) && !(gfEstimatePath) )
04344       {
04345             UINT16                                                      usAnimSurface;
04346             STRUCTURE_FILE_REF *          pStructureFileRef;
04347             BOOLEAN                                                     fOk;
04348             INT8                                                        bLoop;
04349             UINT16                                                      usStructureID = INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID;
04350 
04351             // this could be kinda slow...
04352 
04353             // Get animation surface...
04354             usAnimSurface = DetermineSoldierAnimationSurface( pCurrSoldier, pCurrSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04355             // Get structure ref...
04356             pStructureFileRef = GetAnimationStructureRef( pCurrSoldier->ubID, usAnimSurface, pCurrSoldier->usUIMovementMode );
04357 
04358             if ( pStructureFileRef )
04359             {
04360 
04361                   // use the specified direction for checks
04362                   bLoop = bDirection;
04363 
04364                   {
04365                         // ATE: Only if we have a levelnode...
04366                         if ( pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL && pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL )
04367                         {
04368                               usStructureID = pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID;
04369                         }
04370 
04371                         fOk = InternalOkayToAddStructureToWorld( sGridNo, pCurrSoldier->bLevel, &(pStructureFileRef->pDBStructureRef[ gOneCDirection[ bLoop ] ]), usStructureID, (BOOLEAN)!fPeopleToo );
04372                         if (fOk)
04373                         {
04374                               return( TRUE );
04375                         }
04376                   }
04377 
04378             }
04379             return( FALSE );
04380       }
04381       else
04382       {
04383             // quick test
04384             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pStructureHead != NULL )
04385             {
04386                   // Something is here, check obstruction in future
04387                   if ( bLevel == 0)
04388                   {
04389                         sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
04390                   }
04391                   else
04392                   {
04393                         sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
04394                   }
04395 
04396                   pStructure = FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04397 
04398                         // ATE: If we are trying to get a path to an exit grid AND
04399                         // we are a cave....still allow this..
04400                         //if ( pStructure && gfPlotPathToExitGrid && pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CAVEWALL )
04401                   if ( pStructure && gfPlotPathToExitGrid )
04402                   {
04403                         pStructure = NULL;
04404                   }
04405 
04406                   while (pStructure != NULL)
04407                   {
04408                         if (!(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PASSABLE) )
04409                         {
04410                               fOKCheckStruct = TRUE;
04411 
04412                               // Check if this is a multi-tile
04413                               if ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_MOBILE ) && ( pCurrSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MULTITILE ) )
04414                               {
04415                                     // Check IDs with soldier's ID
04416                                     if ( pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode != NULL && pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData != NULL && pCurrSoldier->pLevelNode->pStructureData->usStructureID == pStructure->usStructureID )
04417                                     {
04418                                           fOKCheckStruct = FALSE;
04419                                     }
04420                               }
04421 
04422                               if ( fOKCheckStruct )
04423                               {
04424                                     if (pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel)
04425                                     {
04426                                           return( FALSE );
04427                                     }
04428                               }
04429                         }
04430                               
04431                         pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04432                   }
04433             }
04434       }
04435       return( TRUE );
04436 }
04437 
04438 
04439 
04440 //Kris:
04441 BOOLEAN FlatRoofAboveGridNo( INT32 iMapIndex )
04442 {
04443       LEVELNODE *pRoof;
04444       UINT32 uiTileType;
04445       pRoof = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pRoofHead;
04446       while( pRoof )
04447       {
04448             if( pRoof->usIndex != NO_TILE )
04449             {
04450                   GetTileType( pRoof->usIndex, &uiTileType );
04451                   if( uiTileType >= FIRSTROOF && uiTileType <= LASTROOF )
04452                         return TRUE;
04453             }
04454             pRoof = pRoof->pNext;
04455       }
04456       return FALSE;
04457 }
04458 
04459 
04460 //Kris:
04461 //ASSUMPTION:  This function assumes that we are checking on behalf of a single tiled merc.  This function
04462 //                                   should not be used for checking on behalf of multi-tiled "things".
04463 //I wrote this function for editor use.  I don't personally care about multi-tiled stuff.  All I want
04464 //to know is whether or not I can put a merc here.  In most cases, I won't be dealing with multi-tiled
04465 //mercs, and the rarity doesn't justify the needs.  I just wrote this to be quick and dirty, and I don't 
04466 //expect it to perform perfectly in all situations.
04467 BOOLEAN IsLocationSittable( INT32 iMapIndex, BOOLEAN fOnRoof )
04468 {
04469       STRUCTURE *pStructure;
04470       INT16 sDesiredLevel;
04471       if( WhoIsThere2( (INT16)iMapIndex, 0 ) != NO_SOLDIER )
04472     return FALSE;
04473       //Locations on roofs without a roof is not possible, so
04474       //we convert the onroof intention to ground.
04475       if( fOnRoof && !FlatRoofAboveGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
04476             fOnRoof = FALSE;
04477       // Check structure database
04478       if( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructureHead )
04479       {
04480             // Something is here, check obstruction in future
04481             sDesiredLevel = fOnRoof ? STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF : STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
04482             pStructure = FindStructure( (INT16)iMapIndex, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04483             while( pStructure )
04484             {
04485                   if( !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PASSABLE) && pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel )
04486                         return FALSE;
04487                   pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04488             }
04489       }
04490       return TRUE;
04491 }
04492 
04493 
04494 BOOLEAN IsLocationSittableExcludingPeople( INT32 iMapIndex, BOOLEAN fOnRoof )
04495 {
04496       STRUCTURE *pStructure;
04497       INT16 sDesiredLevel;
04498 
04499       //Locations on roofs without a roof is not possible, so
04500       //we convert the onroof intention to ground.
04501       if( fOnRoof && !FlatRoofAboveGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
04502             fOnRoof = FALSE;
04503       // Check structure database
04504       if( gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pStructureHead )
04505       {
04506             // Something is here, check obstruction in future
04507             sDesiredLevel = fOnRoof ? STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF : STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
04508             pStructure = FindStructure( (INT16)iMapIndex, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04509             while( pStructure )
04510             {
04511                   if( !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PASSABLE) && pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel )
04512                         return FALSE;
04513                   pStructure = FindNextStructure( pStructure, STRUCTURE_BLOCKSMOVES );
04514             }
04515       }
04516       return TRUE;
04517 }
04518 
04519 
04520 BOOLEAN TeamMemberNear(INT8 bTeam, INT16 sGridNo, INT32 iRange)
04521 {
04522       UINT8 bLoop;
04523       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
04524 
04525       for (bLoop=gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bFirstID, pSoldier=MercPtrs[bLoop]; bLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[bTeam].bLastID; bLoop++, pSoldier++)
04526       {
04527             if (pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED ) )
04528             {
04529                   if (PythSpacesAway(pSoldier->sGridNo,sGridNo) <= iRange)
04530                   {
04531                         return(TRUE);
04532                   }
04533             }
04534       }
04535 
04536       return(FALSE);
04537 }
04538 
04539 INT16 FindAdjacentGridEx( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 *pubDirection, INT16 *psAdjustedGridNo, BOOLEAN fForceToPerson, BOOLEAN fDoor )
04540 {
04541 // psAdjustedGridNo gets the original gridno or the new one if updated
04542       // It will ONLY be updated IF we were over a merc, ( it's updated to their gridno )
04543 // pubDirection gets the direction to the final gridno
04544 // fForceToPerson: forces the grid under consideration to be the one occupiedby any target
04545 // in that location, because we could be passed a gridno based on the overlap of soldier's graphic
04546 // fDoor determines whether special door-handling code should be used (for interacting with doors)
04547 
04548  INT16 sFourGrids[4], sDistance=0;
04549  INT16 sDirs[4] = { NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST };
04550  INT32 cnt;
04551  INT16 sClosest=NOWHERE, sSpot, sOkTest;
04552  INT16 sCloseGridNo=NOWHERE;
04553  UINT32                                         uiMercFlags;
04554  UINT16                                         usSoldierIndex;
04555  UINT8                                          ubDir;
04556  STRUCTURE                              *pDoor;
04557  //STRUCTURE                            *pWall;
04558  UINT8                                          ubWallOrientation;
04559  BOOLEAN                                                                                                    fCheckGivenGridNo = TRUE;
04560  UINT8                                                                                                            ubTestDirection;
04561  EXITGRID                                                                                             ExitGrid;
04562 
04563  // Set default direction
04564  if (pubDirection)
04565  {
04566       *pubDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
04567  }
04568 
04569  // CHECK IF WE WANT TO FORCE GRIDNO TO PERSON
04570  if ( psAdjustedGridNo != NULL )
04571  {
04572        *psAdjustedGridNo = sGridNo;
04573  }
04574 
04575  // CHECK IF IT'S THE SAME ONE AS WE'RE ON, IF SO, RETURN THAT!
04576  if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo && !FindStructure( sGridNo, ( STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) ) )
04577  {
04578        // OK, if we are looking for a door, it may be in the same tile as us, so find the direction we
04579        // have to face to get to the door, not just our initial direction...
04580       // If we are in the same tile as a switch, we can NEVER pull it....
04581        if( fDoor )
04582        {
04583                   // This can only happen if a door was to the south to east of us!
04584 
04585               // Do south!
04586               //sSpot = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
04587 
04588               // ATE: Added: Switch behave EXACTLY like doors
04589                   pDoor = FindStructure( sGridNo, ( STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) );
04590 
04591               if ( pDoor != NULL )
04592                   {
04593                         // Get orinetation
04594                         ubWallOrientation = pDoor->ubWallOrientation;
04595 
04596                         if ( ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT || ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
04597                         {
04598                               // To the south!
04599                           sSpot = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( SOUTH ) );
04600                               if (pubDirection)
04601                               {
04602                                     (*pubDirection) = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sSpot, pSoldier );
04603                               }                 
04604                         }
04605 
04606                         if ( ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
04607                         {
04608                               // TO the east!
04609                               sSpot = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
04610                               if (pubDirection)
04611                               {
04612                                     (*pubDirection) = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sSpot, pSoldier );
04613                               }
04614                         }
04615                   }
04616        }
04617 
04618        // Use soldier's direction
04619    return( sGridNo );
04620  }
04621 
04622   // Look for a door!
04623       if (fDoor)
04624       {
04625             pDoor = FindStructure( sGridNo, ( STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR | STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) );
04626       }
04627       else
04628       {
04629             pDoor = NULL;
04630       }
04631 
04632       if ( fForceToPerson )
04633       {
04634             if ( FindSoldier( sGridNo, &usSoldierIndex, &uiMercFlags, FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO )  )
04635             {
04636                   sGridNo = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ]->sGridNo;
04637                   if ( psAdjustedGridNo != NULL )
04638                   {
04639                         *psAdjustedGridNo = sGridNo;
04640 
04641                         // Use direction to this guy!
04642                         if (pubDirection)
04643                         {
04644                               (*pubDirection) = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
04645                         }
04646                   }
04647             }       
04648       } 
04649 
04650 
04651  if ( ( sOkTest = NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) > 0)    // no problem going there! nobody on it!
04652  {
04653        // OK, if we are looking to goto a switch, ignore this....
04654        if ( pDoor )
04655        {
04656                   if ( pDoor->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
04657                   {
04658                         // Don't continuel
04659                         fCheckGivenGridNo = FALSE;
04660                   }
04661        }
04662 
04663        // If there is an exit grid....
04664        if ( GetExitGrid( sGridNo, &ExitGrid ) )
04665        {
04666                   // Don't continuel
04667                   fCheckGivenGridNo = FALSE;
04668        }
04669 
04670 
04671        if ( fCheckGivenGridNo )
04672        {
04673              sDistance = PlotPath( pSoldier, sGridNo,  NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (INT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
04674 
04675              if ( sDistance > 0 )
04676              {
04677             
04678                    if ( sDistance < sClosest )
04679                    {
04680                               sClosest                        = sDistance;
04681                               sCloseGridNo  = (INT16)sGridNo;
04682                    }
04683              }
04684        }
04685  }
04686 
04687 
04688  for (cnt = 0; cnt < 4; cnt++)
04689  {
04690        // MOVE OUT TWO DIRECTIONS
04691    sFourGrids[cnt] = sSpot = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( sDirs[ cnt ] ) );
04692 
04693        ubTestDirection = (UINT8)sDirs[ cnt ];
04694 
04695        // For switches, ALLOW them to walk through walls to reach it....
04696        if ( pDoor && pDoor->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
04697        {
04698                   ubTestDirection = gOppositeDirection[ ubTestDirection ];
04699        }
04700 
04701        if( fDoor )
04702        {
04703                   if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot ][ ubTestDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
04704                   {
04705                         // obstacle or wall there!
04706                         continue;
04707                   }
04708        }
04709        else
04710        {
04711              // this function returns original MP cost if not a door cost
04712              if ( DoorTravelCost( pSoldier, sSpot, gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot ][ ubTestDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ], FALSE, NULL ) >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
04713              {
04714                   // obstacle or wall there!
04715                   continue;
04716              }
04717        }
04718 
04719        // Eliminate some directions if we are looking at doors!
04720        if ( pDoor != NULL )
04721        {
04722                   // Get orinetation
04723                   ubWallOrientation = pDoor->ubWallOrientation;
04724 
04725                   // Refuse the south and north and west  directions if our orientation is top-right
04726                   if ( ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
04727                   {
04728                         if ( sDirs[ cnt ] == NORTH || sDirs[ cnt ] == WEST || sDirs[ cnt ] == SOUTH )
04729                               continue;                               
04730                   }
04731 
04732                   // Refuse the north and west and east directions if our orientation is top-right
04733                   if ( ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT || ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
04734                   {
04735                         if ( sDirs[ cnt ] == NORTH || sDirs[ cnt ] == WEST || sDirs[ cnt ] == EAST )
04736                               continue;                               
04737                   }
04738        }
04739 
04740        // If this spot is our soldier's gridno use that!
04741        if ( sSpot == pSoldier->sGridNo )
04742        {
04743              // Use default diurection ) soldier's direction )
04744                   
04745              // OK, at least get direction to face......
04746              // Defaults to soldier's facing dir unless we change it!
04747              //if ( pDoor != NULL )
04748              {
04749                         // Use direction to the door!
04750                         if (pubDirection)
04751                         {
04752                               (*pubDirection) = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
04753                         }
04754              }
04755              return( sSpot );
04756        }
04757 
04758    // don't store path, just measure it
04759        ubDir = (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sSpot, sGridNo );  
04760 
04761    if ( ( NewOKDestinationAndDirection( pSoldier, sSpot, ubDir, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) > 0 ) &&
04762        ( ( sDistance = PlotPath( pSoldier, sSpot,  NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (INT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints ) ) > 0 ) )
04763    {
04764      if ( sDistance < sClosest )
04765      {
04766                         sClosest                        = sDistance;
04767                         sCloseGridNo  = (INT16)sSpot;
04768      }
04769    }
04770  }
04771 
04772       if (sClosest != NOWHERE)
04773   {
04774              // Take last direction and use opposite!
04775              // This will be usefull for ours and AI mercs
04776 
04777              // If our gridno is the same ( which can be if we are look at doors )
04778              if ( sGridNo == sCloseGridNo )
04779              {
04780                         if (pubDirection)
04781                         {
04782                               // ATE: Only if we have a valid door!
04783                               if ( pDoor )
04784                               {
04785                                     switch( pDoor->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubWallOrientation )
04786                                     {
04787                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
04788                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
04789 
04790                                            *pubDirection = SOUTH;
04791                                                 break;
04792 
04793                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
04794                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
04795 
04796                                            *pubDirection = EAST;
04797                                                 break;
04798                                     }
04799                               }
04800                         }
04801              }
04802              else
04803              {
04804                         // Calculate direction if our gridno is different....
04805                         ubDir = (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sCloseGridNo, sGridNo );
04806                         if (pubDirection)
04807                         {
04808                               *pubDirection = ubDir;
04809                         }
04810              }
04811              //if ( psAdjustedGridNo != NULL )
04812              //{
04813             //          (*psAdjustedGridNo) = sCloseGridNo;
04814              //}
04815              if ( sCloseGridNo == NOWHERE )
04816              {
04817                         return( -1 );
04818              }
04819              return( sCloseGridNo );
04820   }
04821       else
04822             return( -1 );
04823 }
04824 
04825 
04826 INT16 FindNextToAdjacentGridEx( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 *pubDirection, INT16 *psAdjustedGridNo, BOOLEAN fForceToPerson, BOOLEAN fDoor )
04827 {
04828 // This function works in a similar way as FindAdjacentGridEx, but looks for a location 2 tiles away
04829 
04830 // psAdjustedGridNo gets the original gridno or the new one if updated
04831 // pubDirection gets the direction to the final gridno
04832 // fForceToPerson: forces the grid under consideration to be the one occupiedby any target
04833 // in that location, because we could be passed a gridno based on the overlap of soldier's graphic
04834 // fDoor determines whether special door-handling code should be used (for interacting with doors)
04835 
04836  INT16 sFourGrids[4], sDistance=0;
04837  INT16 sDirs[4] = { NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST };
04838  INT32 cnt;
04839  INT16 sClosest=WORLD_MAX, sSpot, sSpot2, sOkTest;
04840  INT16 sCloseGridNo=NOWHERE;
04841  UINT32                                         uiMercFlags;
04842  UINT16                                         usSoldierIndex;
04843  UINT8                                          ubDir;
04844  STRUCTURE                              *pDoor;
04845  UINT8                                          ubWallOrientation;
04846  BOOLEAN                                                                                                    fCheckGivenGridNo = TRUE;
04847  UINT8                                                                                                            ubTestDirection;
04848  UINT8                                                                                                            ubWhoIsThere;
04849 
04850  // CHECK IF WE WANT TO FORCE GRIDNO TO PERSON
04851  if ( psAdjustedGridNo != NULL )
04852  {
04853        *psAdjustedGridNo = sGridNo;
04854  }
04855 
04856  // CHECK IF IT'S THE SAME ONE AS WE'RE ON, IF SO, RETURN THAT!
04857  if ( pSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo )
04858  {
04859        *pubDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
04860    return( sGridNo );
04861  }
04862 
04863   // Look for a door!
04864       if (fDoor)
04865       {
04866             pDoor = FindStructure( sGridNo, ( STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR | STRUCTURE_SWITCH ) );
04867       }
04868       else
04869       {
04870             pDoor = NULL;
04871       }
04872 
04873       if ( fForceToPerson )
04874       {
04875             if ( FindSoldier( sGridNo, &usSoldierIndex, &uiMercFlags, FIND_SOLDIER_GRIDNO )  )
04876             {
04877                   sGridNo = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ]->sGridNo;
04878                   if ( psAdjustedGridNo != NULL )
04879                   {
04880                         *psAdjustedGridNo = sGridNo;
04881                   }
04882             }       
04883       } 
04884 
04885 
04886  if ( ( sOkTest = NewOKDestination( pSoldier, sGridNo, TRUE, pSoldier->bLevel ) ) > 0)    // no problem going there! nobody on it!
04887  {
04888        // OK, if we are looking to goto a switch, ignore this....
04889        if ( pDoor )
04890        {
04891                   if ( pDoor->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
04892                   {
04893                         // Don't continuel
04894                         fCheckGivenGridNo = FALSE;
04895                   }
04896        }
04897 
04898        if ( fCheckGivenGridNo )
04899        {
04900              sDistance = PlotPath( pSoldier, sGridNo,  NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (INT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints );
04901 
04902              if ( sDistance > 0 )
04903              {
04904             
04905                    if ( sDistance < sClosest )
04906                    {
04907                               sClosest                = sDistance;
04908                               sCloseGridNo  = (INT16)sGridNo;
04909                    }
04910              }
04911        }
04912  }
04913 
04914 
04915  for (cnt = 0; cnt < 4; cnt++)
04916  {
04917        // MOVE OUT TWO DIRECTIONS
04918    sFourGrids[cnt] = sSpot = NewGridNo( sGridNo, DirectionInc( sDirs[ cnt ] ) );
04919 
04920        ubTestDirection = (UINT8)sDirs[ cnt ];
04921 
04922        if ( pDoor && pDoor->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SWITCH )
04923        {
04924                   ubTestDirection = gOppositeDirection[ ubTestDirection ];
04925        }
04926 
04927        if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot ][ ubTestDirection ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
04928        {
04929             // obstacle or wall there!
04930             continue;
04931        }
04932 
04933       ubWhoIsThere = WhoIsThere2( sSpot, pSoldier->bLevel );
04934        if ( ubWhoIsThere != NOBODY && ubWhoIsThere != pSoldier->ubID )
04935        {
04936             // skip this direction b/c it's blocked by another merc!
04937             continue;
04938        }
04939 
04940        // Eliminate some directions if we are looking at doors!
04941        if ( pDoor != NULL )
04942        {
04943                   // Get orinetation
04944                   ubWallOrientation = pDoor->ubWallOrientation;
04945 
04946                   // Refuse the south and north and west  directions if our orientation is top-right
04947                   if ( ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
04948                   {
04949                         if ( sDirs[ cnt ] == NORTH || sDirs[ cnt ] == WEST || sDirs[ cnt ] == SOUTH )
04950                               continue;                               
04951                   }
04952 
04953                   // Refuse the north and west and east directions if our orientation is top-right
04954                   if ( ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT || ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT )
04955                   {
04956                         if ( sDirs[ cnt ] == NORTH || sDirs[ cnt ] == WEST || sDirs[ cnt ] == EAST )
04957                               continue;                               
04958                   }
04959        }
04960 
04961        // first tile is okay, how about the second?
04962        sSpot2 = NewGridNo( sSpot, DirectionInc( sDirs[ cnt ] ) );
04963        if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot2 ][ sDirs[cnt] ][ pSoldier->bLevel ] >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED ||
04964                         DoorTravelCost( pSoldier, sSpot2, gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot2 ][ sDirs[cnt] ][ pSoldier->bLevel ], (BOOLEAN) (pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum), NULL ) == TRAVELCOST_DOOR ) // closed door blocks!
04965        {
04966             // obstacle or wall there!
04967             continue;
04968        }
04969 
04970        ubWhoIsThere = WhoIsThere2( sSpot2, pSoldier->bLevel );
04971        if ( ubWhoIsThere != NOBODY && ubWhoIsThere != pSoldier->ubID )
04972        {
04973             // skip this direction b/c it's blocked by another merc!
04974             continue;
04975        }
04976 
04977        sSpot = sSpot2;
04978 
04979        // If this spot is our soldier's gridno use that!
04980        if ( sSpot == pSoldier->sGridNo )
04981        {
04982              if (pubDirection)
04983              {
04984                (*pubDirection) = (UINT8)GetDirectionFromGridNo( sGridNo, pSoldier );
04985              }
04986              //*pubDirection = pSoldier->bDirection;
04987              return( sSpot );
04988        }
04989 
04990        ubDir = (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sSpot, sGridNo );  
04991 
04992    // don't store path, just measure it
04993    if ( ( NewOKDestinationAndDirection( pSoldier, sSpot, ubDir, TRUE , pSoldier->bLevel ) > 0 ) &&
04994        ( ( sDistance = PlotPath( pSoldier, sSpot,  NO_COPYROUTE, NO_PLOT, TEMPORARY, (INT16)pSoldier->usUIMovementMode, NOT_STEALTH, FORWARD, pSoldier->bActionPoints ) ) > 0 ) )
04995    {
04996      if ( sDistance < sClosest )
04997      {
04998                         sClosest                = sDistance;
04999                         sCloseGridNo  = (INT16)sSpot;
05000      }
05001    }
05002  }
05003 
05004       if (sClosest != NOWHERE)
05005   {
05006              // Take last direction and use opposite!
05007              // This will be usefull for ours and AI mercs
05008 
05009              // If our gridno is the same ( which can be if we are look at doors )
05010              if ( sGridNo == sCloseGridNo )
05011              {
05012                         if (pubDirection)
05013                         {
05014                               // ATE: Only if we have a valid door!
05015                               if ( pDoor )
05016                               {
05017                                     switch( pDoor->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubWallOrientation )
05018                                     {
05019                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
05020                                           case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
05021 
05022                                            *pubDirection = SOUTH;
05023                                                 break;
05024 
05025                                           case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
05026                                           case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
05027 
05028                                            *pubDirection = EAST;
05029                                                 break;
05030                                     }
05031                               }
05032                         }
05033              }
05034              else
05035              {
05036                         // Calculate direction if our gridno is different....
05037                         ubDir = (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sCloseGridNo, sGridNo );
05038                         if (pubDirection)
05039                         {
05040                               *pubDirection = ubDir;
05041                         }
05042              }
05043 
05044              if ( sCloseGridNo == NOWHERE )
05045              {
05046                         return( -1 );
05047              }
05048              return( sCloseGridNo );
05049   }
05050       else
05051             return( -1 );
05052 
05053 
05054 
05055       /*
05056       if (sCloseGridNo != NOWHERE)
05057   {
05058              // Take last direction and use opposite!
05059              // This will be usefull for ours and AI mercs
05060 
05061              // If our gridno is the same ( which can be if we are look at doors )
05062              if ( sGridNo == sCloseGridNo )
05063              {
05064                         switch( pDoor->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubWallOrientation )
05065                         {
05066                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
05067                               case INSIDE_TOP_LEFT:
05068 
05069                                *pubDirection = SOUTH;
05070                                     break;
05071 
05072                               case OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
05073                               case INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT:
05074 
05075                                *pubDirection = EAST;
05076                                     break;
05077                         }
05078              }
05079              else
05080              {
05081                         // Calculate direction if our gridno is different....
05082                         ubDir = (UINT8)GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( sCloseGridNo, sGridNo );
05083                         *pubDirection = ubDir;
05084              }
05085              return( sCloseGridNo );
05086   }
05087       else
05088             return( -1 );
05089       */
05090 }
05091 
05092 INT16 FindAdjacentPunchTarget( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pTargetSoldier, INT16 * psAdjustedTargetGridNo, UINT8 * pubDirection )
05093 {
05094        INT16      cnt;
05095        INT16      sSpot;      
05096        UINT8      ubGuyThere;
05097 
05098        for ( cnt = 0; cnt < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; cnt++ )
05099        {
05100                   sSpot = (INT16)NewGridNo( pSoldier->sGridNo, DirectionInc( cnt ) );
05101 
05102                   if ( DoorTravelCost( pSoldier, sSpot, gubWorldMovementCosts[ sSpot ][ cnt ][ pSoldier->bLevel ], FALSE, NULL ) >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
05103                   {
05104                         // blocked!
05105                         continue;
05106                   }
05107 
05108                   // Check for who is there...
05109                   ubGuyThere = WhoIsThere2( sSpot, pSoldier->bLevel );
05110 
05111                   if ( pTargetSoldier != NULL && ubGuyThere == pTargetSoldier->ubID )
05112                   {
05113                         // We've got a guy here....
05114                         // Who is the one we want......
05115                         *psAdjustedTargetGridNo = pTargetSoldier->sGridNo;
05116                         *pubDirection           = ( UINT8 )cnt;
05117                         return( sSpot );
05118                   }
05119        }
05120 
05121        return( NOWHERE );
05122 }
05123 
05124 
05125 BOOLEAN UIOKMoveDestination( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, UINT16 usMapPos )
05126 {
05127       BOOLEAN fVisible;
05128 
05129       // Check if a hidden tile exists but is not revealed
05130       if ( DoesGridnoContainHiddenStruct( usMapPos, &fVisible ) )
05131       {
05132             if ( !fVisible )
05133             {
05134                   // The player thinks this is OK!
05135                   return( TRUE );
05136             }
05137       }
05138 
05139 
05140       if ( !NewOKDestination( pSoldier, usMapPos, FALSE, (INT8) gsInterfaceLevel ) )
05141       {
05142             return( FALSE );
05143       }
05144 
05145       // ATE: If we are a robot, see if we are being validly controlled...
05146       if ( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ROBOT )
05147       {
05148             if ( ! CanRobotBeControlled( pSoldier ) )
05149             {
05150                   // Display message that robot cannot be controlled....
05151                   return( 2 );
05152             }
05153       }
05154 
05155       // ATE: Experiment.. take out
05156       //else if ( IsRoofVisible( usMapPos ) && gsInterfaceLevel == 0 )
05157       //{
05158       //    return( FALSE );
05159       //}
05160 
05161 
05162       return( TRUE);
05163 }
05164 
05165 
05166 void HandleTeamServices( UINT8 ubTeamNum )
05167 {
05168       INT32                           cnt;
05169       SOLDIERTYPE             *pTeamSoldier, *pTargetSoldier;
05170       UINT32                  uiPointsUsed;
05171       UINT16                  usSoldierIndex, usInHand;
05172       UINT16                  usKitPts;
05173   INT8                                                            bSlot;
05174       BOOLEAN                                                     fDone;
05175 
05176       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
05177       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeamNum ].bFirstID;
05178 
05179       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
05180       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeamNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
05181       {       
05182             if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
05183             {
05184                   fDone = FALSE;
05185                   // Check for different events!
05186                   // FOR DOING AID
05187                   if ( pTeamSoldier->usAnimState == GIVING_AID )
05188                   {
05189                         // Get medkit info
05190                         usInHand = pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
05191 
05192                         // Get victim pointer
05193                         usSoldierIndex = WhoIsThere2( pTeamSoldier->sTargetGridNo, pTeamSoldier->bLevel );
05194                         if ( usSoldierIndex != NOBODY )
05195                         {
05196                               pTargetSoldier = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ];
05197 
05198                               if ( pTargetSoldier->ubServiceCount )
05199                               {
05200                                     usKitPts = TotalPoints( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
05201 
05202                                     uiPointsUsed = SoldierDressWound( pTeamSoldier, pTargetSoldier, usKitPts, usKitPts );
05203 
05204                                     // Determine if they are all banagded
05205                                     if ( !pTargetSoldier->bBleeding && pTargetSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
05206                                     {
05207                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_IS_ALL_BANDAGED_STR ], pTargetSoldier->name );
05208                                     
05209                                           // Cancel all services for this guy!
05210                                           ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pTargetSoldier );
05211                                           fDone = TRUE;
05212                                     }
05213 
05214                                     UseKitPoints( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), (UINT16)uiPointsUsed, pTeamSoldier );
05215 
05216                                     // Get new total
05217                                     usKitPts = TotalPoints( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
05218 
05219                                     // WHETHER OR NOT recipient is all bandaged, check if we've used them up!
05220                                     if ( usKitPts <= 0)     // no more bandages
05221                                     {
05222                                           if ( fDone )
05223                                           {
05224                                                 // don't swap if we're done
05225                                                 bSlot = NO_SLOT;
05226                                           }
05227                                           else
05228                                           {
05229                                                 bSlot = FindFirstAidKit ( pTeamSoldier );
05230                                                 if ( bSlot == NO_SLOT )
05231                                                 {
05232                                                       bSlot = FindMedKit( pTeamSoldier );
05233                                                 }
05234                                           }
05235                                           if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
05236                                           {
05237                                                 SwapObjs( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pTeamSoldier->inv[bSlot] ) );
05238                                           }
05239                                           else
05240               {
05241                                                 ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_IS_OUT_OF_BANDAGES_STR ], pTeamSoldier->name );
05242                                                 GivingSoldierCancelServices( pTeamSoldier );
05243 
05244                                                 if ( !gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
05245                                                 {
05246                                                       DoMercBattleSound( pTeamSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 ) );
05247                                                 }
05248 
05249               }
05250                                     }
05251                               }
05252                         }
05253                   }
05254             }
05255 
05256       }
05257 }
05258 
05259 void HandlePlayerServices( SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier )
05260 {
05261       SOLDIERTYPE     *pTargetSoldier;
05262       UINT32                  uiPointsUsed;
