05263       UINT16                  usSoldierIndex, usInHand;
05264       UINT16                  usKitPts;
05265       INT8                                                        bSlot;
05266       BOOLEAN                                                     fDone = FALSE;
05267 
05268       if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bActive )
05269       {
05270             // Check for different events!
05271             // FOR DOING AID
05272             if ( pTeamSoldier->usAnimState == GIVING_AID )
05273             {
05274                   // Get medkit info
05275                   usInHand = pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem;
05276 
05277                   // Get victim pointer
05278                   usSoldierIndex = WhoIsThere2( pTeamSoldier->sTargetGridNo, pTeamSoldier->bLevel );
05279 
05280                   if ( usSoldierIndex != NOBODY )
05281                   {
05282                         pTargetSoldier = MercPtrs[ usSoldierIndex ];
05283 
05284                         if ( pTargetSoldier->ubServiceCount )
05285                         {
05286                               usKitPts = TotalPoints( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
05287 
05288                               uiPointsUsed = SoldierDressWound( pTeamSoldier, pTargetSoldier, usKitPts, usKitPts );
05289 
05290                               // Determine if they are all banagded
05291                               if ( !pTargetSoldier->bBleeding && pTargetSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
05292                               {
05293                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_IS_ALL_BANDAGED_STR ], pTargetSoldier->name );
05294                                     
05295                                     // Cancel all services for this guy!
05296                                     ReceivingSoldierCancelServices( pTargetSoldier );
05297                                     fDone = TRUE;
05298                               }
05299 
05300                               UseKitPoints( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ), (UINT16)uiPointsUsed, pTeamSoldier );
05301 
05302                               // Get new total
05303                               usKitPts = TotalPoints( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[ HANDPOS ] ) );
05304 
05305                               // WHETHER OR NOT recipient is all bandaged, check if we've used them up!
05306                               if ( usKitPts <= 0)     // no more bandages
05307                               {
05308                                     if ( fDone )
05309                                     {
05310                                           // don't swap if we're done
05311                                           bSlot = NO_SLOT;
05312                                     }
05313                                     else
05314                                     {
05315                                           bSlot = FindFirstAidKit ( pTeamSoldier);
05316                                           if ( bSlot == NO_SLOT )
05317                                           {
05318                                                 bSlot = FindMedKit ( pTeamSoldier );
05319                                           }
05320                                     }
05321 
05322                                     if ( bSlot != NO_SLOT )
05323                                     {
05324                                           SwapObjs( &(pTeamSoldier->inv[HANDPOS]), &(pTeamSoldier->inv[bSlot] ) );
05325                                     }
05326                                     else
05327             {
05328                                           ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ MERC_IS_OUT_OF_BANDAGES_STR ], pTeamSoldier->name );
05329                                           GivingSoldierCancelServices( pTeamSoldier );
05330 
05331                                           if ( !gTacticalStatus.fAutoBandageMode )
05332                                           {
05333                                                 DoMercBattleSound( pTeamSoldier, (INT8)( BATTLE_SOUND_CURSE1 ) );
05334                                           }
05335             }
05336                               }
05337                         }
05338                   }
05339             }
05340       }
05341 }
05342 
05343 void CommonEnterCombatModeCode( )
05344 {
05345       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CommonEnterCombatMode");
05346       UINT32                   cnt;
05347       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
05348 
05349       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= INCOMBAT;
05350 
05351       //gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount = 0;
05352 
05353       // Reset num enemies fought flag...
05354       memset( &(gTacticalStatus.bNumFoughtInBattle), 0, MAXTEAMS );
05355       gTacticalStatus.ubLastBattleSectorX = (UINT8) gWorldSectorX;
05356       gTacticalStatus.ubLastBattleSectorY = (UINT8) gWorldSectorY;
05357       gTacticalStatus.fLastBattleWon      = FALSE;
05358   gTacticalStatus.fItemsSeenOnAttack  = FALSE;
05359 
05360 
05361       // ATE: If we have an item pointer end it!
05362       CancelItemPointer( );
05363 
05364       ResetInterfaceAndUI( );
05365       ResetMultiSelection( );
05366 
05367       // OK, loop thorugh all guys and stop them!
05368       // Loop through all mercs and make go
05369       for ( pSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
05370       {
05371             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
05372             {
05373                   if ( pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->ubBodyType != CROW )
05374                   {
05375                         // Set some flags for quotes
05376                         pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_IN_SHIT );
05377                         pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_MULTIPLE_CREATURES);
05378                         
05379                         // Hault!
05380                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
05381 
05382                         // END AI actions
05383                         CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
05384 
05385                         // turn off AI controlled flag
05386                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL;
05387 
05388                         // Check if this guy is an enemy....
05389                         CheckForPotentialAddToBattleIncrement( pSoldier );
05390 
05391                         // If guy is sleeping, wake him up!
05392                         if ( pSoldier->fMercAsleep == TRUE )
05393                         {
05394                               ChangeSoldierState( pSoldier, WKAEUP_FROM_SLEEP, 1, TRUE );
05395                         }
05396 
05397                         // ATE: Refresh APs
05398                         CalcNewActionPoints( pSoldier );
05399 
05400                         if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
05401                         {
05402                               if ( pSoldier->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pSoldier->bNeutral )
05403                               {
05404                                     // only set precombat gridno if unset
05405                                     if ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sPreCombatGridNo == 0 || gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sPreCombatGridNo == NOWHERE )
05406                                     {
05407                                           gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sPreCombatGridNo = pSoldier->sGridNo;
05408                                     }
05409                               }
05410                               else
05411                               {
05412                                     gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].sPreCombatGridNo = NOWHERE;
05413                               }
05414                         }
05415 
05416         if ( !gTacticalStatus.fHasEnteredCombatModeSinceEntering )
05417         {
05418           // ATE: reset player's movement mode at the very start of
05419           // combat
05420           //if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
05421           //{
05422             //pSoldier->usUIMovementMode = RUNNING;
05423           //}
05424         }
05425                   }
05426             }
05427       }
05428 
05429   gTacticalStatus.fHasEnteredCombatModeSinceEntering = TRUE;
05430 
05431       SyncStrategicTurnTimes( );
05432 
05433       // Play tune..
05434       PlayJA2Sample( ENDTURN_1, RATE_11025, MIDVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );
05435 
05436       // Say quote.....
05437 
05438       // Change music modes
05439       SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_BATTLE );
05440       
05441       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"CommonEnterCombatMode done");
05442 
05443 }
05444 
05445 
05446 void EnterCombatMode( UINT8 ubStartingTeam )
05447 {
05448       UINT32                        cnt;
05449       SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
05450       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode");
05451 
05452       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
05453       {
05454             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Can't enter combat when already in combat" );
05455             // we're already in combat!
05456             return;
05457       }
05458 
05459       // Alrighty, don't do this if no enemies in sector
05460       if ( NumCapableEnemyInSector( ) == 0 )
05461       {
05462             DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Can't enter combat when no capable enemies" );
05463             //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_RED, MSG_DEBUG, L"Trying to init combat when no enemies around!." );
05464             return;
05465       }
05466 
05467       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Entering combat mode" );
05468 
05469   // ATE: Added here to guarentee we have fEnemyInSector
05470   // Mostly this was not getting set if:
05471   // 1 ) we see bloodcats ( which makes them hostile )
05472   // 2 ) we make civs hostile
05473   // only do this once they are seen.....
05474   if ( !gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
05475   {
05476             SetEnemyPresence( );
05477   }
05478 
05479       CommonEnterCombatModeCode( );
05480       
05481       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode continuing...");
05482 
05483       if (ubStartingTeam == gbPlayerNum)
05484       {
05485             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("EnterCombatMode continuing... start player turn, selected soldier = %d",gusSelectedSoldier));
05486             // OK, make sure we have a selected guy
05487             // Madd: this was causing a weird crash becuase gusSelectedSoldier was 156 (out of the array bounds) for some reason
05488             //if ( MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bOppCnt == 0 )
05489             if ( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY && MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->bOppCnt == 0 )
05490             {
05491                   DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode continuing... nobody selected");
05492                   // OK, look through and find one....
05493                   for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID, pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++ )
05494                   {
05495                         if ( OK_CONTROLLABLE_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && pTeamSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
05496                         {
05497                               DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode continuing... select soldier");
05498                               SelectSoldier( pTeamSoldier->ubID, FALSE, TRUE );
05499                         }
05500                   }
05501             }
05502             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode continuing... calling startplayerteamturn");
05503 
05504             StartPlayerTeamTurn( FALSE, TRUE );
05505       }
05506       else
05507       {
05508             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode continuing... end turn");
05509       // have to call EndTurn so that we freeze the interface etc
05510             EndTurn( ubStartingTeam );
05511       }
05512 
05513       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"EnterCombatMode done");
05514 
05515 }
05516 
05517 
05518 
05519 void ExitCombatMode( )
05520 {
05521       UINT32                          cnt;
05522       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier;
05523 
05524       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, "Exiting combat mode" );
05525 
05526       // Leave combat mode
05527       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= (~INCOMBAT);
05528 
05529       EndTopMessage( );
05530 
05531       // OK, we have exited combat mode.....
05532       // Reset some flags for no aps to move, etc
05533 
05534       // Set virgin sector to true....
05535       gTacticalStatus.fVirginSector = TRUE;
05536 
05537       // Loop through all mercs and make go
05538       for ( pSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
05539       {
05540             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
05541             {
05542                   if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
05543                   {
05544                         // Reset some flags
05545                         if ( pSoldier->fNoAPToFinishMove && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
05546                         {
05547                               AdjustNoAPToFinishMove( pSoldier, FALSE );
05548                               SoldierGotoStationaryStance( pSoldier );
05549                         }
05550 
05551                         //Cancel pending events
05552                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
05553                         pSoldier->ubPendingDirection = NO_PENDING_DIRECTION;
05554                         pSoldier->ubPendingAction    = NO_PENDING_ACTION;
05555 
05556                         // Reset moved flag
05557                         pSoldier->bMoved = FALSE;
05558 
05559                         // Set final destination
05560                         pSoldier->sFinalDestination    = pSoldier->sGridNo;
05561 
05562                         // remove AI controlled flag
05563                         pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= ~SOLDIER_UNDERAICONTROL;
05564                   }
05565             }
05566       }
05567 
05568       // Change music modes
05569       gfForceMusicToTense = TRUE;
05570 
05571       SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT );
05572 
05573       BetweenTurnsVisibilityAdjustments();
05574 
05575       // pause the AI for a bit
05576       PauseAITemporarily();
05577 
05578       // reset muzzle flashes
05579       TurnOffEveryonesMuzzleFlashes();
05580 
05581       // zap interrupt list
05582       ClearIntList();
05583 
05584       // dirty interface
05585       DirtyMercPanelInterface( MercPtrs[ 0 ], DIRTYLEVEL2 );
05586 
05587       // ATE: If we are IN_CONV - DONT'T DO THIS!
05588       if ( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV ) ) 
05589       {
05590             HandleStrategicTurnImplicationsOfExitingCombatMode();
05591       }
05592 
05593       // Make sure next opplist decay DOES happen right after we go to RT
05594       // since this would be the same as what would happen at the end of the turn
05595       gTacticalStatus.uiTimeSinceLastOpplistDecay = __max( 0, GetWorldTotalSeconds() - TIME_BETWEEN_RT_OPPLIST_DECAYS );
05596       NonCombatDecayPublicOpplist( GetWorldTotalSeconds() );
05597 }
05598 
05599 
05600 void SetEnemyPresence( )
05601 {
05602       // We have an ememy present....
05603       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SetEnemyPresence"));
05604 
05605       // Check if we previously had no enemys present and we are in a virgin secotr ( no enemys spotted yet )
05606       if ( !gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector && gTacticalStatus.fVirginSector )
05607       {
05608             // If we have a guy selected, say quote!
05609             // For now, display ono status message
05610             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ ENEMY_IN_SECTOR_STR ] );
05611 
05612             // Change music modes..
05613             
05614             // If we are just starting game, don't do this!
05615             if ( !DidGameJustStart() && !AreInMeanwhile( ) )
05616             {
05617                   SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT );
05618                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SetEnemyPresence: warnings = false"));
05619                   sniperwarning = FALSE;
05620                   biggunwarning = FALSE;
05621 //                airstrikeavailable = TRUE;
05622             }
05623             else
05624             {
05625                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("SetEnemyPresence: warnings = true"));
05626                   sniperwarning = TRUE;
05627                   biggunwarning = TRUE;
05628 //                airstrikeavailable = FALSE;
05629             }
05630 
05631             // Say quote...
05632             //SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_ENEMY_PRESENCE );
05633             
05634             gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector = TRUE;
05635 
05636       }
05637 }
05638 
05639 
05640 extern BOOLEAN gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID;
05641 
05642 BOOLEAN SoldierHasSeenEnemiesLastFewTurns( SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier )
05643 {
05644       INT32                         cnt2;
05645       SOLDIERTYPE       *pSoldier;
05646       INT32                         cnt;
05647       
05648       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < MAXTEAMS; cnt++ )
05649       {
05650             
05651             if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bSide != pTeamSoldier->bSide )
05652             {
05653 
05654                   // check this team for possible enemies
05655                   cnt2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bFirstID;
05656                   for ( pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt2 ]; cnt2 <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bLastID; cnt2++, pSoldier++ )
05657                   {                       
05658                         if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE ) )
05659                         {
05660                               if ( !CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pTeamSoldier, pSoldier ) && ( pTeamSoldier->bSide != pSoldier->bSide ) )
05661                               {
05662                                     // Have we not seen this guy.....
05663                                     if ( ( pTeamSoldier->bOppList[ cnt2 ] >= SEEN_CURRENTLY ) &&
05664                                                  ( pTeamSoldier->bOppList[ cnt2 ] <= SEEN_THIS_TURN ) )
05665                                     {
05666                                           gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen = 0;
05667                                           return( TRUE );
05668                                     }
05669                               }
05670                         }
05671                   }
05672             }
05673       }
05674 
05675       return( FALSE );
05676 }
05677 
05678 BOOLEAN WeSeeNoOne( void )
05679 {
05680       UINT32            uiLoop;
05681       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
05682 
05683       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++ )
05684       {
05685             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
05686             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
05687             {
05688                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum ) 
05689                   {
05690                         if ( pSoldier->bOppCnt > 0 )
05691                         {
05692                               return( FALSE );
05693                         }
05694                   }
05695             }
05696       }
05697 
05698       return( TRUE );
05699 }
05700 
05701 BOOLEAN NobodyAlerted( void )
05702 {
05703       UINT32            uiLoop;
05704       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
05705 
05706       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++ )
05707       {
05708             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
05709             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
05710             {
05711                   if ( ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum ) && ( ! pSoldier->bNeutral ) && (pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE) && (pSoldier->bAlertStatus >= STATUS_RED) )
05712                   {
05713                         return( FALSE );
05714                   }
05715             }
05716       }
05717 
05718       return( TRUE );
05719 }
05720 
05721 
05722 BOOLEAN WeSawSomeoneThisTurn( void )
05723 {
05724       UINT32            uiLoop, uiLoop2;
05725       SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier;
05726 
05727       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++ )
05728       {
05729             pSoldier = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
05730             if ( pSoldier != NULL )
05731             {
05732                   if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum ) 
05733                   {
05734                         for ( uiLoop2 = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bFirstID; uiLoop2 < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; uiLoop2++ )
05735                         {
05736                               if ( pSoldier->bOppList[ uiLoop2 ] == SEEN_THIS_TURN )
05737                               {
05738                                     return( TRUE );
05739                               }
05740                         }
05741                   }
05742             }
05743       }
05744       return( FALSE );
05745 }
05746 
05747 
05748 void SayBattleSoundFromAnyBodyInSector( INT32 iBattleSnd )
05749 {
05750       UINT8 ubMercsInSector[ 20 ] = { 0 };
05751       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
05752       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
05753       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
05754       INT32 cnt;
05755 
05756       // Loop through all our guys and randomly say one from someone in our sector
05757 
05758       // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
05759       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;   
05760 
05761       // run through list
05762       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++ )
05763       {
05764             // Add guy if he's a candidate...
05765             if ( OK_INSECTOR_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED ) && !(AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier )) && !pTeamSoldier->fMercAsleep )
05766             {
05767                   ubMercsInSector[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)cnt;
05768                   ubNumMercs++;
05769             }
05770       }
05771 
05772       // If we are > 0
05773       if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
05774       {
05775             ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
05776 
05777             DoMercBattleSound( MercPtrs[ ubChosenMerc ],(UINT8)iBattleSnd );
05778       }
05779 
05780 }
05781 
05782 
05783 BOOLEAN CheckForEndOfCombatMode( BOOLEAN fIncrementTurnsNotSeen )
05784 {
05785       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
05786       UINT32 cnt = 0;
05787       BOOLEAN     fWeSeeNoOne, fNobodyAlerted;
05788       BOOLEAN     fSayQuote = FALSE;
05789       BOOLEAN fWeSawSomeoneRecently = FALSE, fSomeoneSawSomeoneRecently = FALSE;
05790 
05791       // We can only check for end of combat if in combat mode
05792       if ( ! ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
05793       {
05794             return( FALSE );
05795       }
05796 
05797       // if we're boxing NEVER end combat mode
05798       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING )
05799       {
05800             return( FALSE );
05801       }
05802 
05803       // First check for end of battle....
05804       // If there are no enemies at all in the sector
05805       // Battle end should take presedence!
05806       if ( CheckForEndOfBattle( FALSE ) )
05807       {
05808             return( TRUE );
05809       }
05810 
05811       fWeSeeNoOne = WeSeeNoOne();
05812       fNobodyAlerted = NobodyAlerted();
05813       if ( fWeSeeNoOne && fNobodyAlerted )
05814       {
05815             // hack!!!
05816             gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen = 5;
05817       }
05818       else
05819       {
05820 
05821             // we have to loop through EVERYONE to see if anyone sees a hostile... if so, stay in turnbased...
05822             
05823             for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
05824             {
05825                   pTeamSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
05826                   if ( pTeamSoldier && pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral )
05827                   {
05828                         if ( SoldierHasSeenEnemiesLastFewTurns( pTeamSoldier ) )
05829                         {
05830                               gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen = 0;
05831                               fSomeoneSawSomeoneRecently = TRUE;
05832                               if ( pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum || (pTeamSoldier->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM && pTeamSoldier->bSide == 0 ) ) // or friendly militia
05833                               {
05834                                     fWeSawSomeoneRecently = TRUE;
05835                                     break;
05836                               }
05837                         }
05838                   }                       
05839             }
05840 
05841             if ( fSomeoneSawSomeoneRecently )
05842             {
05843                   if ( fWeSawSomeoneRecently )
05844                   {
05845                         gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsWeHaventSeenButEnemyDoes = 0;
05846                   }
05847                   else
05848                   {
05849                         // start tracking this
05850                         gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsWeHaventSeenButEnemyDoes++;
05851                   }
05852                   return( FALSE );
05853             }
05854       
05855             // IF here, we don;t see anybody.... increment count for end check
05856             if( fIncrementTurnsNotSeen )
05857             {
05858                   gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen++;
05859             }
05860       }
05861 
05862       gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsWeHaventSeenButEnemyDoes = 0;
05863 
05864       // If we have reach a point where a cons. number of turns gone by....
05865       if ( gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen > 1 )
05866       {
05867             gTacticalStatus.bConsNumTurnsNotSeen = 0;
05868 
05869             // Exit mode!
05870             ExitCombatMode();
05871 
05872 
05873             if ( fNobodyAlerted )
05874             {
05875                   // if we don't see anyone currently BUT we did see someone this turn, THEN don't
05876                   // say quote
05877                   if ( fWeSeeNoOne && WeSawSomeoneThisTurn() )
05878                   {
05879                         // don't say quote
05880                   }
05881                   else
05882                   {
05883                         fSayQuote = TRUE;
05884                   }
05885             }
05886             else
05887             {
05888                   fSayQuote = TRUE;
05889             }
05890 
05891     // ATE: Are there creatures here? If so, say another quote...
05892     if ( fSayQuote && ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IN_CREATURE_LAIR ) )
05893     {
05894                   SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_WORRIED_ABOUT_CREATURE_PRESENCE );
05895     }
05896     // Are we fighting bloodcats?
05897     else if ( NumBloodcatsInSectorNotDeadOrDying( ) > 0 )
05898     {
05899 
05900     }
05901     else
05902     {
05903               if ( fSayQuote )
05904               {
05905                     // Double check by seeing if we have any active enemies in sector!
05906                     if ( NumEnemyInSectorNotDeadOrDying( ) > 0 )
05907                     {
05908                           SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_WARNING_OUTSTANDING_ENEMY_AFTER_RT );
05909                     }
05910               }
05911     }
05912 /*
05913             if ( (!fWeSeeNoOne || !fNobodyAlerted) && WeSawSomeoneThisTurn() )
05914             {
05915                   // Say quote to the effect that the battle has lulled
05916                   SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_WARNING_OUTSTANDING_ENEMY_AFTER_RT );
05917             }
05918 */
05919 
05920             // Begin tense music....
05921             gfForceMusicToTense = TRUE;
05922             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_ENEMYPRESENT );
05923 
05924             return( TRUE );
05925       }
05926 
05927       return( FALSE );
05928 }
05929 
05930 
05931 void DeathNoMessageTimerCallback( void )
05932 {
05933   CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
05934 }
05935 
05936 void RemoveStaticEnemiesFromSectorInfo( INT16 sMapX, INT16 sMapY )
05937 {
05938       SECTORINFO *pSectorInfo = &( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sMapX, sMapY ) ] );
05939 
05940       pSectorInfo->ubNumAdmins = pSectorInfo->ubNumTroops = pSectorInfo->ubNumElites = 0;
05941       pSectorInfo->ubAdminsInBattle = pSectorInfo->ubTroopsInBattle = pSectorInfo->ubElitesInBattle = 0;
05942 }
05943 
05944 //!!!!
05945 //IMPORTANT NEW NOTE:
05946 //Whenever returning TRUE, make sure you clear gfBlitBattleSectorLocator;
05947 BOOLEAN CheckForEndOfBattle( BOOLEAN fAnEnemyRetreated )
05948 {
05949       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
05950       BOOLEAN                 fBattleWon = TRUE;
05951       BOOLEAN                 fBattleLost = FALSE;
05952       INT32                   cnt = 0;
05953       UINT16                  usAnimState;
05954 
05955       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING )
05956       {
05957             // no way are we going to exit boxing prematurely, thank you! :-)
05958             return( FALSE );
05959       }
05960 
05961       // We can only check for end of battle if in combat mode or there are enemies 
05962       // present (they might bleed to death or run off the map!)
05963       if ( ! ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
05964       {
05965             if ( ! (gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector) )
05966             {
05967                   return( FALSE );
05968             }
05969       }
05970 
05971       // ATE: If attack busy count.. get out...
05972       if ( (gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount > 0 ) )
05973       {
05974             return( FALSE );
05975       }
05976 
05977 
05978       // OK, this is to releave infinate looping...becasue we can kill guys in this function
05979       if ( gfKillingGuysForLosingBattle )
05980       {
05981             return( FALSE );
05982       }
05983 
05984       // Check if the battle is won!
05985       if ( NumCapableEnemyInSector( ) > 0 )
05986       {
05987             fBattleWon = FALSE;
05988       }
05989 
05990       if ( CheckForLosingEndOfBattle( ) == TRUE )
05991       {
05992             fBattleLost = TRUE;
05993       }
05994 
05995       //NEW (Nov 24, 98)  by Kris
05996       if( !gbWorldSectorZ && fBattleWon )
05997       { //Check to see if more enemy soldiers exist in the strategic layer 
05998             //It is possible to have more than 20 enemies in a sector.  By failing here,
05999             //it gives the engine a chance to add these soldiers as reinforcements.  This
06000             //is naturally handled.
06001             AddPossiblePendingEnemiesToBattle();
06002             if( gfPendingEnemies )
06003             {
06004                   fBattleWon = FALSE;
06005             }
06006       }
06007 
06008       if( ( fBattleLost ) || ( fBattleWon ) )
06009       {
06010             if( !gbWorldSectorZ )
06011             {
06012                   SectorInfo[ SECTOR( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY) ].bLastKnownEnemies = NumEnemiesInSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
06013             }
06014       }
06015 
06016       // We should NEVER have a battle lost and won at the same time...
06017 
06018       if ( fBattleLost )
06019       {
06020     // CJC: End AI's turn here.... first... so that UnSetUIBusy will succeed if militia win 
06021             // battle for us
06022             EndAllAITurns( );
06023 
06024             // Set enemy presence to false
06025     // This is safe 'cause we're about to unload the friggen sector anyway....
06026             gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector = FALSE;
06027 
06028             // If here, the battle has been lost!
06029             UnSetUIBusy( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
06030 
06031             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
06032             {
06033                   // Exit mode!
06034                   ExitCombatMode();
06035             }
06036 
06037             HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_HEARD_BATTLE_LOST, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
06038             HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_BATTLE_LOST, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
06039 
06040             // Play death music
06041             SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_DEATH );
06042             SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( 10000, DeathNoMessageTimerCallback, FALSE );
06043 
06044             if ( CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_BEING_FOUGHT, 0 ) )
06045             {
06046                   // this is our first battle... and we lost it!
06047                   SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_FOUGHT );
06048                   SetFactFalse( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_BEING_FOUGHT );
06049                   SetTheFirstBattleSector( (INT16) (gWorldSectorX + gWorldSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X) );
06050                   HandleFirstBattleEndingWhileInTown( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, FALSE );
06051             }
06052 
06053             if( NumEnemyInSectorExceptCreatures() )
06054             {
06055                   SetThisSectorAsEnemyControlled( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, TRUE );
06056             }
06057 
06058             // ATE: Important! THis is delayed until music ends so we can have proper effect!
06059             // CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
06060 
06061             //Whenever returning TRUE, make sure you clear gfBlitBattleSectorLocator;
06062             LogBattleResults( LOG_DEFEAT );
06063             gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
06064             return( TRUE );
06065       }
06066 
06067 
06068       // If battle won, do stuff right away!
06069       if ( fBattleWon )
06070       {
06071 
06072             if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING ) // if boxing don't do any of this stuff
06073             {
06074               gTacticalStatus.fLastBattleWon = TRUE;
06075 
06076                   // OK, KILL any enemies that are incompacitated
06077                   if ( KillIncompacitatedEnemyInSector( ) )
06078                   {
06079                         return( FALSE );                    
06080                   }
06081             }
06082 
06083             // Kill all enemies. Sometime even after killing all the enemies, there appeares "in battle" enemies in sector info
06084             RemoveStaticEnemiesFromSectorInfo( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY );
06085             
06086 
06087             // If here, the battle has been won!
06088             // hurray! a glorious victory!
06089 
06090             // Set enemy presence to false
06091             gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector = FALSE;
06092 
06093             // CJC: End AI's turn here.... first... so that UnSetUIBusy will succeed if militia win 
06094             // battle for us
06095             EndAllAITurns( );
06096 
06097             UnSetUIBusy( (UINT8)gusSelectedSoldier );
06098 
06099             // ATE: 
06100             // If we ended battle in any team other than the player's
06101             // we need to end the UI lock using this method....
06102             guiPendingOverrideEvent = LU_ENDUILOCK;
06103             HandleTacticalUI( );
06104 
06105             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
06106             {
06107                   // Exit mode!
06108                   ExitCombatMode();
06109             }
06110 
06111             if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING ) // if boxing don't do any of this stuff
06112             {
06113 
06114                   // Only do some stuff if we actually faught a battle
06115                   if ( gTacticalStatus.bNumFoughtInBattle[ ENEMY_TEAM ] + gTacticalStatus.bNumFoughtInBattle[ CREATURE_TEAM ] + gTacticalStatus.bNumFoughtInBattle[ CIV_TEAM ] > 0 )
06116                   //if ( gTacticalStatus.bNumEnemiesFoughtInBattle > 0 )
06117                   {
06118                         // Loop through all mercs and make go
06119                         for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
06120                         {
06121                               if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive )
06122                               {
06123                                     if ( pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06124                                     {
06125                                           if( pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
06126                                           {
06127                                                 gMercProfiles[pTeamSoldier->ubProfile].usBattlesFought++;
06128 
06129                                                 // If this guy is OKLIFE & not standing, make stand....
06130                                                 if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && !pTeamSoldier->bCollapsed )
06131                                                 {
06132                                                       if ( pTeamSoldier->bAssignment < ON_DUTY )
06133                                                       {
06134                     // Reset some quote flags....
06135                     pTeamSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BUDDY_1_WITNESSED);
06136                     pTeamSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BUDDY_2_WITNESSED);
06137                     pTeamSoldier->usQuoteSaidExtFlags &= (~SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BUDDY_3_WITNESSED);
06138 
06139                     // toggle stealth mode....
06140                           gfUIStanceDifferent = TRUE;
06141                     pTeamSoldier->bStealthMode = FALSE;
06142                     fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
06143 
06144                                                             if ( gAnimControl[ pTeamSoldier->usAnimState ].ubHeight != ANIM_STAND )
06145                                                             {
06146                                                                   ChangeSoldierStance( pTeamSoldier, ANIM_STAND );
06147                                                             }
06148                                                             else
06149                                                             {
06150                                                                   // If they are aiming, end aim!
06151                                                                   usAnimState = PickSoldierReadyAnimation( pTeamSoldier, TRUE );
06152 
06153                                                                   if ( usAnimState != INVALID_ANIMATION )
06154                                                                   {
06155                                                                         EVENT_InitNewSoldierAnim( pTeamSoldier, usAnimState, 0, FALSE );  
06156                                                                   }
06157                                                             }
06158                                                       }
06159                                                 }
06160                                           }
06161                                     }
06162                               }
06163                         }
06164 
06165                         HandleMoraleEvent( NULL, MORALE_BATTLE_WON, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
06166                         HandleGlobalLoyaltyEvent( GLOBAL_LOYALTY_BATTLE_WON, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
06167 
06168                         // Change music modes
06169         if ( gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID == NOBODY || ( gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID != NOBODY && !( MercPtrs[ gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER ) ) )
06170         {
06171                           SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_VICTORY );
06172 
06173                           ShouldBeginAutoBandage( );
06174         }
06175         else if ( gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID != NOBODY && ( MercPtrs[ gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER ) )
06176         {
06177                           ShouldBeginAutoBandage( );          
06178         }
06179 
06180                         // Say battle end quote....
06181 
06182                         if (fAnEnemyRetreated)
06183                         {                 
06184                               SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_ENEMY_RETREATED );
06185                         }
06186                         else
06187                         {
06188                               // OK, If we have just finished a battle with creatures........ play killed creature quote...
06189                               // 
06190                               if ( gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID != NOBODY && ( MercPtrs[ gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER ) )
06191                               {
06192 
06193                               }
06194                               else if ( gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID != NOBODY && ( MercPtrs[ gfLastMercTalkedAboutKillingID ]->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT ) )
06195                               {
06196             SayBattleSoundFromAnyBodyInSector( BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
06197           }
06198           else
06199           {
06200                                     SayQuoteFromAnyBodyInSector( QUOTE_SECTOR_SAFE );
06201                               }
06202                         }
06203 
06204                   }
06205                   else
06206                   {
06207                         // Change to nothing music...
06208                         SetMusicMode( MUSIC_TACTICAL_NOTHING );
06209                     ShouldBeginAutoBandage();
06210                   }
06211 
06212                   HandleMilitiaStatusInCurrentMapBeforeLoadingNewMap();
06213                   gfStrategicMilitiaChangesMade = TRUE;
06214 
06215 
06216                   // Loop through all militia and restore them to peaceful status
06217                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID;
06218                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
06219                   {
06220                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06221                         {
06222                               pTeamSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
06223                               CheckForChangingOrders( pTeamSoldier );
06224                               pTeamSoldier->sNoiseGridno = NOWHERE;
06225                               pTeamSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = 0;
06226                               pTeamSoldier->bNewSituation = FALSE;
06227                               pTeamSoldier->bOrders = STATIONARY;
06228                               if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
06229                                     pTeamSoldier->bLife = OKLIFE;
06230 
06231                               pTeamSoldier->bBleeding = 0; // let's think, the autobandage was done for the militia too
06232                         }
06233                   }
06234                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition = FALSE;
06235 
06236                   // Loop through all civs and restore them to peaceful status
06237                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID;
06238                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
06239                   {
06240                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06241                         {
06242                               pTeamSoldier->bAlertStatus = STATUS_GREEN;
06243                               pTeamSoldier->sNoiseGridno = NOWHERE;
06244                               pTeamSoldier->ubNoiseVolume = 0;
06245                               pTeamSoldier->bNewSituation = FALSE;
06246                               CheckForChangingOrders( pTeamSoldier );
06247                         }
06248                   }
06249                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bAwareOfOpposition = FALSE;
06250 
06251             }
06252 
06253             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
06254 
06255             if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == NOT_BOXING ) // if boxing don't do any of this stuff
06256             {
06257                   LogBattleResults( LOG_VICTORY );
06258                   
06259                   SetThisSectorAsPlayerControlled( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, TRUE );
06260                   HandleVictoryInNPCSector( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY,( INT16 ) gbWorldSectorZ );
06261                   if ( CheckFact( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_BEING_FOUGHT, 0 ) )
06262                   {
06263                         // ATE: Need to trigger record for this event .... for NPC scripting
06264                         TriggerNPCRecord( PACOS, 18 );
06265 
06266                         // this is our first battle... and we won!
06267                         SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_FOUGHT );
06268                         SetFactTrue( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_WON );
06269                         SetFactFalse( FACT_FIRST_BATTLE_BEING_FOUGHT );
06270                         SetTheFirstBattleSector( (INT16) (gWorldSectorX + gWorldSectorY * MAP_WORLD_X) );
06271                         HandleFirstBattleEndingWhileInTown( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, FALSE );
06272                   }
06273             }
06274 
06275             //Whenever returning TRUE, make sure you clear gfBlitBattleSectorLocator;
06276             gfBlitBattleSectorLocator = FALSE;
06277 
06278 
06279             // Kaiden: More UB Reveal All Items after combat code.
06280             //When all the enemy gets killed, reveal the items they dropped
06281             RevealAllDroppedEnemyItems();
06282 
06283             return( TRUE );
06284       }
06285 
06286       return( FALSE );
06287 }
06288 
06289 
06290 void CycleThroughKnownEnemies( )
06291 {
06292       // static to indicate last position we were at:
06293       SOLDIERTYPE        *pSoldier;
06294       static BOOLEAN fFirstTime = TRUE;
06295       static UINT16     usStartToLook;
06296       UINT32                        cnt;
06297       BOOLEAN                       fEnemyBehindStartLook = FALSE;
06298       BOOLEAN                       fEnemiesFound = FALSE;
06299 
06300       if ( fFirstTime )
06301       {
06302             fFirstTime = FALSE;
06303 
06304             usStartToLook = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
06305       }
06306 
06307       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
06308       {
06309             // try to find first active, OK enemy
06310             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->bLife > 0) )
06311             {
06312                   if ( pSoldier->bVisible != -1 )
06313                   {
06314                         fEnemiesFound = TRUE;
06315 
06316                         // If we are > ok start, this is the one!
06317                         if ( cnt > usStartToLook )
06318                         {
06319                               usStartToLook = (UINT16)cnt;
06320 
06321                               // Locate to!
06322                               //LocateSoldier( pSoldier->ubID, 1 );
06323 
06324                               //ATE: Change to Slide To...
06325                               SlideTo( 0, pSoldier->ubID, 0, SETANDREMOVEPREVIOUSLOCATOR );
06326                               return;
06327                         }
06328                         else
06329                         {
06330                               fEnemyBehindStartLook = TRUE;
06331                         }
06332                   }
06333             }
06334       }
06335 
06336       if ( !fEnemiesFound )
06337       {
06338             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_UI_FEEDBACK, TacticalStr[ NO_ENEMIES_IN_SIGHT_STR ] );
06339       }
06340 
06341       // If here, we found nobody, but there may be someone behind
06342       // If to, recurse!
06343       if ( fEnemyBehindStartLook )
06344       {
06345             usStartToLook = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
06346 
06347             CycleThroughKnownEnemies( );
06348       }
06349 }
06350 
06351 
06352 void CycleVisibleEnemies( SOLDIERTYPE *pSrcSoldier )
06353 {
06354       // static to indicate last position we were at:
06355       SOLDIERTYPE        *pSoldier;
06356       UINT16      usStartToLook;
06357       UINT32                        cnt;
06358 
06359       usStartToLook = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
06360 
06361       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
06362       {
06363             // try to find first active, OK enemy
06364             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->bLife > 0) )
06365             {
06366                   if ( pSrcSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY  )
06367                   {
06368                         // If we are > ok start, this is the one!
06369                         if ( cnt > pSrcSoldier->ubLastEnemyCycledID )
06370                         {
06371                               pSrcSoldier->ubLastEnemyCycledID = (UINT8)cnt;
06372 
06373                               //ATE: Change to Slide To...
06374                               SlideTo( 0, pSoldier->ubID, 0, SETANDREMOVEPREVIOUSLOCATOR );
06375 
06376                               ChangeInterfaceLevel( pSoldier->bLevel );
06377                               return;
06378                         }
06379                   }
06380             }
06381       }
06382 
06383       // If here.. reset to zero...
06384       pSrcSoldier->ubLastEnemyCycledID = 0;
06385 
06386 
06387       usStartToLook = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID;
06388       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++, pSoldier++ )
06389       {
06390             // try to find first active, OK enemy
06391             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && !pSoldier->bNeutral && (pSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum) && (pSoldier->bLife > 0) )
06392             {
06393                   if ( pSrcSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY  )
06394                   {
06395 
06396                         // If we are > ok start, this is the one!
06397                         if ( cnt > pSrcSoldier->ubLastEnemyCycledID )
06398                         {
06399                               pSrcSoldier->ubLastEnemyCycledID = (UINT8)cnt;
06400 
06401                               //ATE: Change to Slide To...
06402                               SlideTo( 0, pSoldier->ubID, 0, SETANDREMOVEPREVIOUSLOCATOR );
06403 
06404                               ChangeInterfaceLevel( pSoldier->bLevel );
06405                               return;
06406                         }
06407                   }
06408             }
06409       }
06410 
06411 
06412 }
06413 
06414 
06415 INT8 CountNonVehiclesOnPlayerTeam( void )
06416 {
06417       UINT32                        cnt;
06418       SOLDIERTYPE        *pSoldier;
06419       INT8                          bNumber = 0;
06420 
06421       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID, pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= (UINT32)( gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID ); cnt++, pSoldier++ )
06422       {
06423             if ( pSoldier->bActive && !(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
06424             {
06425                   bNumber++;
06426             }
06427       }
06428 
06429       return( bNumber );
06430 
06431 }
06432 
06433 
06434 BOOLEAN PlayerTeamFull( )
06435 {
06436       // last ID for the player team is 19, so long as we have at most 17 non-vehicles...
06437       if ( CountNonVehiclesOnPlayerTeam() <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID - 2 )
06438       {
06439             return( FALSE );
06440       }
06441 
06442       return( TRUE );
06443 }
06444 
06445 UINT8 NumPCsInSector( void )
06446 {
06447       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06448       UINT32                        cnt = 0;
06449       UINT8                   ubNumPlayers = 0;
06450 
06451       // Check if the battle is won!
06452       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06453       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < guiNumMercSlots; cnt++ )
06454       {
06455             if ( MercSlots[ cnt ] ) 
06456             {
06457                   pTeamSoldier = MercSlots[ cnt ];
06458                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 )
06459                   {
06460                         ubNumPlayers++;
06461                   }
06462             }
06463       }
06464 
06465       return( ubNumPlayers );
06466 
06467 }
06468 
06469 
06470 UINT8 NumEnemyInSector( )
06471 {
06472       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06473       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06474       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06475 
06476       // Check if the battle is won!
06477       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06478       for ( pTeamSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pTeamSoldier++, cnt++ )
06479       {
06480             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 )
06481             {
06482                   // Checkf for any more bacguys
06483                   if ( !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral && (pTeamSoldier->bSide != 0 ) )
06484                   {
06485                         ubNumEnemies++;
06486                   }
06487             }
06488       }
06489 
06490       return( ubNumEnemies );
06491 
06492 }
06493 
06494 UINT8 NumEnemyInSectorExceptCreatures()
06495 {
06496       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06497       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06498       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06499 
06500       // Check if the battle is won!
06501       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06502       for ( pTeamSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pTeamSoldier++, cnt++ )
06503       {
06504             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife > 0 && pTeamSoldier->bTeam != CREATURE_TEAM )
06505             {
06506                   // Checkf for any more bacguys
06507                   if ( !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral && (pTeamSoldier->bSide != 0 ) )
06508                   {
06509                         ubNumEnemies++;
06510                   }
06511             }
06512       }
06513 
06514       return( ubNumEnemies );
06515 
06516 }
06517 
06518 
06519 UINT8 NumEnemyInSectorNotDeadOrDying( )
06520 {
06521       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06522       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06523       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06524 
06525       // Check if the battle is won!
06526       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06527       for ( pTeamSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pTeamSoldier++, cnt++ )
06528       {
06529             // Kill those not already dead.,...
06530             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06531             {
06532                   // For sure for flag thet they are dead is not set
06533                   if ( !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
06534                   {
06535                         // Also, we want to pick up unconcious guys as NOT being capable,
06536                         // but we want to make sure we don't get those ones that are in the
06537                         // process of dying
06538                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
06539                         {
06540                               // Check for any more badguys
06541                               if ( !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral && (pTeamSoldier->bSide != 0 ) )
06542                               {
06543                                     ubNumEnemies++;
06544                               }
06545                         }
06546                   }
06547             }
06548       }
06549 
06550       return( ubNumEnemies );
06551 
06552 }
06553 
06554 UINT8 NumBloodcatsInSectorNotDeadOrDying( )
06555 {
06556       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06557       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06558       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06559 
06560       // Check if the battle is won!
06561       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06562       for ( pTeamSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pTeamSoldier++, cnt++ )
06563       {
06564             // Kill those not already dead.,...
06565             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06566             {
06567       if ( pTeamSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
06568       {
06569                     // For sure for flag thet they are dead is not set
06570                     if ( !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
06571                     {
06572                           // Also, we want to pick up unconcious guys as NOT being capable,
06573                           // but we want to make sure we don't get those ones that are in the
06574                           // process of dying
06575                           if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
06576                           {
06577                                 // Check for any more badguys
06578                                 if ( !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral && (pTeamSoldier->bSide != 0 ) )
06579                                 {
06580                                       ubNumEnemies++;
06581                                 }
06582                           }
06583                     }
06584       }
06585             }
06586       }
06587 
06588       return( ubNumEnemies );
06589 
06590 }
06591 
06592 
06593 UINT8 NumCapableEnemyInSector( )
06594 {
06595       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06596       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06597       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06598 
06599       // Check if the battle is won!
06600       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06601       for ( pTeamSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pTeamSoldier++, cnt++ )
06602       {
06603             // Kill those not already dead.,...
06604             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06605             {
06606                   // For sure for flag thet they are dead is not set
06607                   if ( !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
06608                   {
06609                         // Also, we want to pick up unconcious guys as NOT being capable,
06610                         // but we want to make sure we don't get those ones that are in the
06611                         // process of dying
06612                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE && pTeamSoldier->bLife != 0 )
06613                         {
06614 
06615                         }
06616                         else
06617                         {
06618                               // Check for any more badguys
06619                               if ( !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral && (pTeamSoldier->bSide != 0 ) )
06620                               {
06621                                     ubNumEnemies++;
06622                               }
06623                         }
06624                   }
06625             }
06626       }
06627 
06628       return( ubNumEnemies );
06629 
06630 }
06631 
06632 
06633 BOOLEAN CheckForLosingEndOfBattle( )
06634 {
06635       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06636       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06637       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06638       INT8                    bNumDead = 0, bNumNotOK = 0, bNumInBattle = 0, bNumNotOKRealMercs = 0;
06639       BOOLEAN                 fMadeCorpse;
06640       BOOLEAN                 fDoCapture = FALSE;
06641   BOOLEAN     fOnlyEPCsLeft = TRUE;
06642   BOOLEAN     fMilitiaInSector = FALSE;
06643 
06644 
06645   // ATE: Check for MILITIA - we won't lose if we have some.....
06646       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bFirstID;
06647       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ MILITIA_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
06648       {
06649             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bSide == gbPlayerNum )
06650             {
06651                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE )
06652       {
06653         // We have at least one poor guy who will still fight....
06654         // we have not lost ( yet )!
06655         fMilitiaInSector = TRUE;
06656       }
06657             }
06658       }
06659 
06660 
06661       // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
06662       cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
06663 
06664       // look for all mercs on the same team, 
06665       for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
06666       {       
06667             // Are we active and in sector.....
06668             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
06669             {
06670                   bNumInBattle++;
06671 
06672                   if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife == 0 )
06673                   {
06674                         bNumDead++;
06675                   }
06676                   else if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE )
06677                   {
06678                         bNumNotOK++;
06679 
06680         if ( !AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
06681         {
06682           bNumNotOKRealMercs++;
06683         }
06684                   }
06685       else
06686       {
06687         if ( !AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) || !AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) )
06688         {
06689           fOnlyEPCsLeft = FALSE;
06690         }
06691       }
06692             }
06693       }
06694 
06695 
06696       // OK< check ALL in battle, if that matches SUM of dead, incompacitated, we're done!
06697       if ( ( bNumDead + bNumNotOK ) == bNumInBattle || fOnlyEPCsLeft )
06698   {
06699     // Are there militia in sector?
06700     if ( fMilitiaInSector )
06701     {
06702       if( guiCurrentScreen != AUTORESOLVE_SCREEN )
06703       {
06704         // if here, check if we should autoresolve.
06705         // if we have at least one guy unconscious, call below function...
06706         if ( HandlePotentialBringUpAutoresolveToFinishBattle( ) )
06707         {
06708           // return false here as we are autoresolving...
06709           return( FALSE );
06710         }
06711       }
06712       else
06713       {
06714         return( FALSE );
06715       }
06716     }
06717 
06718 
06719             // Bring up box if we have ANY guy incompaciteded.....
06720             if ( bNumDead != bNumInBattle )
06721             {
06722                   // If we get captured...
06723                   // Your unconscious mercs are captured!
06724 
06725                   // Check if we should get captured....
06726                   if ( bNumNotOKRealMercs < 4 && bNumNotOKRealMercs > 1 )
06727                   {
06728         // Check if any enemies exist....
06729         if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector > 0 )
06730         {
06731                           //if( GetWorldDay() > STARTDAY_ALLOW_PLAYER_CAPTURE_FOR_RESCUE && !( gStrategicStatus.uiFlags & STRATEGIC_PLAYER_CAPTURED_FOR_RESCUE ))
06732                           {
06733                                 if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED || ( gubQuest[ QUEST_HELD_IN_ALMA ] == QUESTDONE && gubQuest[ QUEST_INTERROGATION ] == QUESTNOTSTARTED ) )
06734                                 {
06735                                       fDoCapture = TRUE;
06736                                           // CJC Dec 1 2002: fix capture sequences
06737                                           BeginCaptureSquence();
06738                                 }
06739                           }
06740         }
06741                   }
06742 
06743                   gfKillingGuysForLosingBattle = TRUE;
06744 
06745                   // KIll them now...
06746                   // IF IT'S THE SELECTED GUY, MAKE ANOTHER SELECTED!
06747                   cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
06748 
06749                   for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++)
06750                   {
06751                         // Are we active and in sector.....
06752                         if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
06753                         {
06754                               if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife != 0 && pTeamSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE || AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) || AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier ) )
06755                               {
06756             // Captured EPCs or ROBOTS will be kiiled in capture routine....
06757                                     if ( !fDoCapture )
06758                                     {
06759                                           // Kill!
06760                                           pTeamSoldier->bLife = 0;
06761 
06762                                           HandleSoldierDeath( pTeamSoldier, &fMadeCorpse );
06763 
06764                                           //HandlePlayerTeamMemberDeath( pTeamSoldier );
06765                                           // Make corpse..
06766                                           //TurnSoldierIntoCorpse( pTeamSoldier, TRUE, TRUE );
06767                                     }
06768                               }
06769 
06770           // ATE: if we are told to do capture....
06771           if ( pTeamSoldier->bLife != 0 && fDoCapture )
06772                               {
06773                                     EnemyCapturesPlayerSoldier( pTeamSoldier );
06774 
06775                                     RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( pTeamSoldier, TRUE );
06776                               }
06777 
06778                         }
06779                   }
06780 
06781                   gfKillingGuysForLosingBattle = FALSE;
06782 
06783                   if ( fDoCapture )
06784                   {
06785                         EndCaptureSequence( );
06786                         SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( 3000, CaptureTimerCallback, FALSE );
06787                   }
06788                   else
06789                   {
06790                         SetCustomizableTimerCallbackAndDelay( 10000, DeathTimerCallback, FALSE );
06791                   }
06792 
06793             }
06794             return( TRUE );
06795       }
06796 
06797       return( FALSE );
06798 }
06799 
06800 
06801 BOOLEAN KillIncompacitatedEnemyInSector( )
06802 {
06803       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
06804       INT32                   cnt = 0;
06805       UINT8                   ubNumEnemies = 0;
06806       BOOLEAN                 fReturnVal = FALSE;
06807 
06808       // Check if the battle is won!
06809       // Loop through all mercs and make go
06810       for ( pTeamSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pTeamSoldier++, cnt++ )
06811       {
06812             if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector && pTeamSoldier->bLife < OKLIFE && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_DEAD ) )
06813             {
06814                   // Checkf for any more bacguys
06815                   if ( !pTeamSoldier->bNeutral && (pTeamSoldier->bSide != gbPlayerNum ) )
06816                   {
06817                         // KIll......
06818                         SoldierTakeDamage( pTeamSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH, pTeamSoldier->bLife, 100, TAKE_DAMAGE_BLOODLOSS, NOBODY, NOWHERE, 0, TRUE );
06819                         fReturnVal = TRUE;
06820                   }
06821             }
06822       }
06823       return( fReturnVal );
06824 }
06825 
06826 
06827 
06828 BOOLEAN AttackOnGroupWitnessed( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget )
06829 {
06830       UINT32                              uiSlot;
06831       SOLDIERTYPE *           pGroupMember;
06832 
06833       // look for all group members... rebels could be on the civ team or ours!
06834       for ( uiSlot = 0; uiSlot < guiNumMercSlots; uiSlot++ )
06835       {
06836             pGroupMember = MercSlots[ uiSlot ];
06837             if (pGroupMember && (pGroupMember->ubCivilianGroup == pTarget->ubCivilianGroup) && pGroupMember != pTarget)
06838             {
06839                   if (pGroupMember->bOppList[pSoldier->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY || pGroupMember->bOppList[pTarget->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
06840                   {
06841                         return( TRUE );
06842                   }
06843                   if ( SpacesAway( pGroupMember->sGridNo, pSoldier->sGridNo ) < 12 || SpacesAway( pGroupMember->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo ) < 12 )
06844                   {
06845                         return( TRUE );
06846                   }
06847             }
06848       }
06849 
06850       return( FALSE );
06851 }
06852 
06853 INT8 CalcSuppressionTolerance( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier )
06854 {
06855       INT8        bTolerance;
06856 
06857       // Calculate basic tolerance value
06858       bTolerance = pSoldier->bExpLevel * 2;
06859       if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
06860       {
06861             // give +1 for every 10% morale from 50, for a maximum bonus/penalty of 5.
06862             bTolerance += ( pSoldier->bMorale - 50 ) / 10;
06863       }
06864       else
06865       {
06866             // give +2 for every morale category from normal, for a max change of 4 
06867             bTolerance += ( pSoldier->bAIMorale - MORALE_NORMAL ) * 2;
06868       }
06869       
06870       if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE )
06871       {
06872             // change tolerance based on attitude
06873             switch ( gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].bAttitude )
06874             {
06875                   case ATT_AGGRESSIVE:
06876                         bTolerance +=  2;
06877                         break;
06878                   case ATT_COWARD:
06879                         bTolerance += -2;
06880                         break;
06881                   default:
06882                         break;
06883             }
06884       }
06885       else
06886       {
06887             // generic NPC/civvie; change tolerance based on attitude
06888             switch ( pSoldier->bAttitude )
06889             {
06890                   case BRAVESOLO:
06891                   case BRAVEAID:
06892                         bTolerance +=  2;
06893                         break;
06894                   case AGGRESSIVE:
06895                         bTolerance +=  1;
06896                         break;
06897                   case DEFENSIVE:
06898                         bTolerance += -1;
06899                         break;
06900                   default:
06901                         break;
06902             }
06903       }
06904 
06905       if (bTolerance < 0)
06906       {
06907             bTolerance = 0;
06908       }
06909 
06910       return( bTolerance );
06911 }
06912 
06913 #define MAX_APS_SUPPRESSED 8
06914 void HandleSuppressionFire( UINT8 ubTargetedMerc, UINT8 ubCausedAttacker )
06915 {
06916       INT8                                                  bTolerance;
06917       INT16                                                 sClosestOpponent, sClosestOppLoc;
06918       UINT8                                                 ubPointsLost, ubTotalPointsLost, ubNewStance;
06919       UINT32                                                uiLoop;
06920       UINT8                                                 ubLoop2;
06921       SOLDIERTYPE *                             pSoldier;
06922 
06923       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
06924       {
06925             DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: loop = %d, numslots = %d ",uiLoop, guiNumMercSlots));
06926             pSoldier = MercSlots[uiLoop];
06927             if (pSoldier && IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pSoldier) && pSoldier->bLife >= OKLIFE && pSoldier->ubSuppressionPoints > 0)
06928             {
06929                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: soldier id = %d, life = %d, suppression points = %d",pSoldier->ubID,pSoldier->bLife, pSoldier->ubSuppressionPoints));
06930                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: calc suppression tolerance"));
06931                   bTolerance = CalcSuppressionTolerance( pSoldier );
06932 
06933                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: figure out aps lost"));
06934                   // multiply by 2, add 1 and divide by 2 to round off to nearest whole number
06935                   ubPointsLost = ( ((pSoldier->ubSuppressionPoints * 6) / (bTolerance + 6)) * 2 + 1 ) / 2;
06936 
06937                   // reduce loss of APs based on stance
06938                   // ATE: Taken out because we can possibly supress ourselves...
06939                   //switch (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight)
06940                   //{
06941                   //    case ANIM_PRONE:
06942                   //          ubPointsLost = ubPointsLost * 2 / 4;
06943                   //          break;
06944                   //    case ANIM_CROUCH:
06945                   //          ubPointsLost = ubPointsLost * 3 / 4;
06946                   //          break;
06947                   //    default:
06948                   //          break;
06949                   //}
06950                   
06951                   // cap the # of APs we can lose
06952                   if (ubPointsLost > MAX_APS_SUPPRESSED)
06953                   {
06954                         ubPointsLost = MAX_APS_SUPPRESSED;
06955                   }
06956 
06957                   ubTotalPointsLost = ubPointsLost;
06958 
06959                   // Subtract off the APs lost before this point to find out how many points are lost now
06960                   if (pSoldier->ubAPsLostToSuppression >= ubPointsLost)
06961                   {
06962                         continue;
06963                   }
06964 
06965                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: check for morale effects"));
06966                   // morale modifier
06967                   if (ubTotalPointsLost / 2 > pSoldier->ubAPsLostToSuppression / 2)
06968                   {
06969                         for ( ubLoop2 = 0; ubLoop2 < (ubTotalPointsLost / 2) - (pSoldier->ubAPsLostToSuppression / 2); ubLoop2++ )
06970                         {
06971                               HandleMoraleEvent( pSoldier, MORALE_SUPPRESSED, pSoldier->sSectorX, pSoldier->sSectorY, pSoldier->bSectorZ );
06972                         }
06973                   }
06974 
06975                   ubPointsLost -= pSoldier->ubAPsLostToSuppression;
06976                   ubNewStance = 0;
06977 
06978                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: check for reaction"));
06979                   // merc may get to react
06980                   if ( pSoldier->ubSuppressionPoints >= ( 130 / (6 + bTolerance) ) )
06981                   {
06982                         // merc gets to use APs to react!
06983                         switch (gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight)
06984                         {
06985                               case ANIM_PRONE:
06986                                     // can't change stance below prone!
06987                                     break;
06988                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
06989                                     if (ubTotalPointsLost >= AP_PRONE && IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) )
06990                                     {
06991                                           sClosestOpponent = ClosestKnownOpponent( pSoldier, &sClosestOppLoc, NULL );
06992                                           if (sClosestOpponent == NOWHERE || SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sClosestOppLoc ) > 8)
06993                                           {
06994                                                 if (ubPointsLost < AP_PRONE)
06995                                                 {
06996                                                       // Have to give APs back so that we can change stance without
06997                                                       // losing more APs
06998                                                       pSoldier->bActionPoints += (AP_PRONE - ubPointsLost);
06999                                                       ubPointsLost = 0;
07000                                                 }
07001                                                 else
07002                                                 {
07003                                                       ubPointsLost -= AP_PRONE;
07004                                                 }
07005                                                 ubNewStance = ANIM_PRONE;
07006                                           }
07007                                     }
07008                                     break;
07009                               default: // standing!
07010                                     if (pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER)
07011                                     {
07012                                           // can't change stance here!
07013                                           break;
07014                                     }
07015                                     else if (ubTotalPointsLost >= (AP_CROUCH + AP_PRONE) && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_PRONE ) && IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_PRONE ) )
07016                                     {
07017                                           sClosestOpponent = ClosestKnownOpponent( pSoldier, &sClosestOppLoc, NULL );
07018                                           if ( sClosestOpponent == NOWHERE || SpacesAway( pSoldier->sGridNo, sClosestOppLoc ) > 8 )
07019                                           {
07020                                                 if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND )
07021                                                 {
07022                                                       // can only crouch for now
07023                                                       ubNewStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
07024                                                 }
07025                                                 else
07026                                                 {
07027                                                       // lie prone!
07028                                                       ubNewStance = ANIM_PRONE;
07029                                                 }
07030                                           }
07031                                           else if ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND && IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH ) )
07032                                           {
