07033                                                 // crouch, at least!
07034                                                 ubNewStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
07035                                           }
07036                                     }
07037                                     else if ( ubTotalPointsLost >= AP_CROUCH && ( gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight != ANIM_CROUCH ) && IsValidStance( pSoldier, ANIM_CROUCH ) )
07038                                     {
07039                                           // crouch!
07040                                           ubNewStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
07041                                     }
07042                                     break;
07043                         }
07044                   }
07045 
07046                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: reduce action points"));
07047                   // Reduce action points!
07048                   pSoldier->bActionPoints -= ubPointsLost;
07049                   pSoldier->ubAPsLostToSuppression = ubTotalPointsLost;
07050 
07051                   DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: check for quote"));
07052                   if ( (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC) && (pSoldier->ubSuppressionPoints > 8) && (pSoldier->ubID == ubTargetedMerc) )
07053                   {
07054                         if ( !(pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BEING_PUMMELED ) )
07055                         {
07056                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: say quote"));
07057                               pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_BEING_PUMMELED;
07058                               // say we're under heavy fire!
07059 
07060                               // ATE: For some reason, we forgot #53!
07061                               if ( pSoldier->ubProfile != 53 )
07062                               {
07063                                     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_UNDER_HEAVY_FIRE );
07064                               }
07065                         }
07066                   }
07067 
07068                   if ( ubNewStance != 0 )
07069                   {
07070                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: setup change stance"));
07071                         // This person is going to change stance
07072 
07073                         // This person will be busy while they crouch or go prone
07074                         if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT))
07075                         {
07076                               DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting suppression, on %d", pSoldier->ubID ) );
07077 
07078                               gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount++;
07079 
07080           // make sure supressor ID is the same!
07081           pSoldier->ubSuppressorID = ubCausedAttacker;
07082                         }
07083                         pSoldier->fChangingStanceDueToSuppression = TRUE;
07084                         pSoldier->fDontChargeAPsForStanceChange = TRUE;
07085 
07086                         // AI people will have to have their actions cancelled
07087                         if (!(pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))                      
07088                         {
07089                               CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
07090                               pSoldier->bAction = AI_ACTION_CHANGE_STANCE;
07091                               pSoldier->usActionData = ubNewStance;
07092                               pSoldier->bActionInProgress = TRUE;
07093                         }
07094 
07095                         // go for it!
07096                         // ATE: Cancel any PENDING ANIMATIONS...
07097                         pSoldier->usPendingAnimation = NO_PENDING_ANIMATION;
07098                         // ATE: Turn off non-interrupt flag ( this NEEDS to be done! )
07099                         pSoldier->fInNonintAnim = FALSE;
07100                         pSoldier->fRTInNonintAnim = FALSE;
07101 
07102                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire: change stance"));
07103                         ChangeSoldierStance( pSoldier, ubNewStance );
07104                   }
07105 
07106             } // end of examining one soldier
07107       } // end of loop
07108 
07109       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("HandleSuppressionFire done"));
07110 }
07111 
07112 BOOLEAN ProcessImplicationsOfPCAttack( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE ** ppTarget, INT8 bReason )
07113 {
07114       INT16       sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos;
07115       BOOLEAN     fEnterCombat = TRUE;
07116       SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget = *ppTarget;
07117 
07118       if ( pTarget->fAIFlags & AI_ASLEEP )
07119       {
07120             // waaaaaaaaaaaaake up!
07121             pTarget->fAIFlags &= (~AI_ASLEEP);
07122       }
07123 
07124       if (pTarget->ubProfile == PABLO && CheckFact( FACT_PLAYER_FOUND_ITEMS_MISSING, 0 ) )
07125       {
07126             SetFactTrue( FACT_PABLO_PUNISHED_BY_PLAYER );
07127       }
07128 
07129       if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING )
07130       {
07131             // should have a check for "in boxing ring", no?
07132             if ( ( pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon != NOTHING && !Item[pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon].brassknuckles ) || !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_BOXER ) )
07133             {
07134                   // someone's cheating!
07135                   if ( (Item[ pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_BLADE || Item[ pSoldier->usAttackingWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_PUNCH) && (pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_BOXER) )
07136                   {
07137                         // knife or brass knuckles disqualify the player!
07138                         BoxingPlayerDisqualified( pSoldier, BAD_ATTACK );
07139                   }
07140                   else
07141                   {
07142                         // anything else is open war!
07143                         //gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState = NOT_BOXING;
07144                         SetBoxingState( NOT_BOXING );
07145                         // if we are attacking a boxer we should set them to neutral (temporarily) so that the rest of the civgroup code works...
07146                         if ( (pTarget->bTeam == CIV_TEAM) && (pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_BOXER) )
07147                         {
07148                               SetSoldierNeutral( pTarget );
07149                         }
07150                   }
07151       
07152             }
07153       }
07154 
07155       if ( (pTarget->bTeam == MILITIA_TEAM) && (pTarget->bSide == gbPlayerNum) )
07156       {
07157             // rebel militia attacked by the player!
07158             MilitiaChangesSides();
07159       }
07160       // JA2 Gold: fix Slay
07161       else if ( (pTarget->bTeam == CIV_TEAM && pTarget->bNeutral) && pTarget->ubProfile == SLAY && pTarget->bLife >= OKLIFE && CheckFact( 155, 0 ) == FALSE )
07162       {
07163             TriggerNPCRecord( SLAY, 1 );
07164       }
07165       else if ( (pTarget->bTeam == CIV_TEAM) && (pTarget->ubCivilianGroup == 0) && (pTarget->bNeutral) && !( pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) )
07166       {
07167             if ( pTarget->ubBodyType == COW && gWorldSectorX == 10 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_F )
07168             {
07169                   // hicks could get mad!!!
07170                   HickCowAttacked( pSoldier, pTarget );
07171             }
07172             else if (pTarget->ubProfile == PABLO && pTarget->bLife >= OKLIFE && CheckFact( FACT_PABLO_PUNISHED_BY_PLAYER, 0 ) && !CheckFact( 38, 0 ) )
07173             {
07174                   TriggerNPCRecord( PABLO, 3 );
07175             }
07176             else
07177             {
07178                   // regular civ attacked, turn non-neutral
07179                   AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pTarget->ubID );
07180 
07181                   if ( pTarget->ubProfile == NO_PROFILE || !(gMercProfiles[ pTarget->ubProfile ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_TOWN_DOESNT_CARE_ABOUT_DEATH) )
07182                   {
07183                         //Kaiden: Added to keep Militia from going Hostile if you attack a Crow or Cow with an explosive.
07184                         if ( (pTarget->ubBodyType != CROW) && (pTarget->ubBodyType != COW) )
07185                         // militia, if any, turn hostile
07186                         MilitiaChangesSides();
07187                   }
07188             }
07189       }
07190       else
07191       {
07192             if (pTarget->ubProfile == CARMEN)// Carmen
07193             {
07194                   // Special stuff for Carmen the bounty hunter
07195                   if (pSoldier->ubProfile != SLAY) // attacked by someone other than Slay
07196                   {
07197                         // change attitude
07198                         pTarget->bAttitude = AGGRESSIVE;
07199                   }
07200             }
07201 
07202             if ( pTarget->ubCivilianGroup && ( (pTarget->bTeam == gbPlayerNum) || pTarget->bNeutral ) )
07203             {
07204 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
07205                   if (pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
07206                   {
07207                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"%s is changing teams", pTarget->name );
07208                   }
07209 #endif
07210                   // member of a civ group, either recruited or neutral, so should
07211                   // change sides individually or all together
07212 
07213                   CivilianGroupMemberChangesSides( pTarget );
07214             
07215                   if (pTarget->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE && pTarget->bLife >= OKLIFE && pTarget->bVisible == TRUE)
07216                   {
07217                         // trigger quote!
07218                         PauseAITemporarily();
07219                         AddToShouldBecomeHostileOrSayQuoteList( pTarget->ubID );
07220                         //TriggerNPCWithIHateYouQuote( pTarget->ubProfile );
07221                   }
07222             }
07223             else if ( pTarget->ubCivilianGroup != NON_CIV_GROUP && !( pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_BOXER ) )
07224             {
07225                   // Firing at a civ in a civ group who isn't hostile... if anyone in that civ group can see this
07226                   // going on they should become hostile.
07227                   CivilianGroupMembersChangeSidesWithinProximity( pTarget );
07228             }
07229             else if ( pTarget->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
07230             {
07231                   // firing at one of our own guys who is not a rebel etc
07232                   if ( pTarget->bLife >= OKLIFE && !(pTarget->bCollapsed) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pTarget ) && (bReason == REASON_NORMAL_ATTACK ) )
07233                   {
07234                         // OK, sturn towards the prick
07235                         // Change to fire ready animation
07236                         ConvertGridNoToXY( pSoldier->sGridNo, &sTargetXPos, &sTargetYPos );
07237 
07238                         pTarget->fDontChargeReadyAPs = TRUE;
07239                         // Ready weapon
07240                         SoldierReadyWeapon( pTarget, sTargetXPos, sTargetYPos, FALSE );
07241 
07242                         // ATE: Depending on personality, fire back.....
07243 
07244                         // Do we have a gun in a\hand?
07245                         if ( Item[ pTarget->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN )
07246                         {
07247                                // Toggle burst capable...
07248                               if ( !pTarget->bDoBurst )
07249                               {
07250                                     if ( IsGunBurstCapable( pTarget, HANDPOS , FALSE ) )
07251                                     {
07252                                           ChangeWeaponMode( pTarget );
07253                                     }
07254                               }
07255 
07256                               // Fire back!
07257                               HandleItem( pTarget, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pTarget->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem, FALSE );
07258 
07259                         }
07260 
07261                   }
07262 
07263                   // don't enter combat on attack on one of our own mercs
07264                   fEnterCombat = FALSE;
07265             }
07266 
07267             // if we've attacked a miner
07268             if ( IsProfileAHeadMiner( pTarget->ubProfile ) )
07269             {
07270                   PlayerAttackedHeadMiner( pTarget->ubProfile );
07271             }
07272       }
07273 
07274       *ppTarget = pTarget;
07275       return( fEnterCombat );
07276 }
07277 
07278 SOLDIERTYPE *InternalReduceAttackBusyCount( UINT8 ubID, BOOLEAN fCalledByAttacker, UINT8 ubTargetID )
07279 {
07280       // Strange as this may seem, this function returns a pointer to
07281       // the *target* in case the target has changed sides as a result
07282       // of being attacked
07283       SOLDIERTYPE *                       pSoldier;
07284       SOLDIERTYPE *                       pTarget;
07285       BOOLEAN                                         fEnterCombat = FALSE;
07286 
07287       if (ubID == NOBODY)
07288       {
07289             pSoldier = NULL;
07290             pTarget = NULL;
07291       }
07292       else
07293       {
07294             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubID ];
07295             if ( ubTargetID != NOBODY)
07296             {
07297                   pTarget = MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ];
07298             }
07299             else
07300             {
07301                   pTarget = NULL;
07302                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String(">>Target ptr is null!" ) );
07303             }
07304       }
07305 
07306       if (fCalledByAttacker)
07307       {
07308             if (pSoldier && Item[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].usItemClass & IC_GUN)
07309             {
07310                   if (pSoldier->bBulletsLeft > 0)
07311                   {
07312                         return( pTarget );
07313                   }
07314             }
07315       }
07316 
07317 //    if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT))
07318 //    {
07319 
07320       if ( gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount == 0 )
07321       {
07322             // ATE: We have a problem here... if testversion, report error......
07323             // But for all means.... DON'T wrap!
07324             if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) )
07325             {
07326                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! &&&&&&& Problem with attacker busy count decrementing past 0.... preventing wrap-around." ) );
07327                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
07328                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Attack busy problem. Save, exit and send debug.txt + save file to Sir-Tech." );
07329                   #endif
07330             }
07331       }
07332       else
07333       {
07334             gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount--;
07335       }
07336 
07337       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Ending attack, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
07338 //    }
07339 
07340       if (gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount > 0)
07341       {
07342             return( pTarget );
07343       }
07344 
07345       if ((gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) && (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT))
07346       {
07347 
07348             // Check to see if anyone was suppressed
07349             if (pSoldier)
07350             {
07351                   HandleSuppressionFire( pSoldier->ubTargetID, ubID );
07352             }
07353             else
07354             {
07355                   HandleSuppressionFire( NOBODY, ubID );
07356             }
07357                   
07358 
07359             //HandleAfterShootingGuy( pSoldier, pTarget );
07360 
07361             // suppression fire might cause the count to be increased, so check it again
07362             if (gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount > 0)
07363             {
07364                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("!!!!!!! Starting suppression, attack count now %d", gTacticalStatus.ubAttackBusyCount) );
07365                   return( pTarget );
07366             }
07367       }
07368 
07369       // ATE: IN MEANWHILES, we have 'combat' in realtime....
07370       // this is so we DON'T call freeupattacker() which will cancel
07371       // the AI guy's meanwhile NPC stuff.
07372       // OK< let's NOT do this if it was the queen attacking....
07373       if ( AreInMeanwhile( ) && pSoldier != NULL && pSoldier->ubProfile != QUEEN )
07374       {
07375             return( pTarget );
07376       }
07377 
07378       if (pTarget)
07379       {
07380             // reset # of shotgun pellets hit by
07381             pTarget->bNumPelletsHitBy = 0;
07382             // reset flag for making "ow" sound on being shot
07383       }
07384 
07385       if (pSoldier)
07386       {
07387             // reset attacking hand
07388             pSoldier->ubAttackingHand = HANDPOS;
07389 
07390             // if there is a valid target, and our attack was noticed
07391             if ( pTarget && (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED) )
07392             {
07393                   // stuff that only applies to when we attack
07394                   if ( pTarget->ubBodyType != CROW )
07395                   {
07396                         if ( pSoldier->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
07397                         {
07398                               fEnterCombat = ProcessImplicationsOfPCAttack( pSoldier, &pTarget, REASON_NORMAL_ATTACK );
07399                               if ( !fEnterCombat )
07400                               {
07401                                     DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, ">>Not entering combat as a result of PC attack" );
07402                               }
07403                         }
07404                   }
07405 
07406                   // global
07407 
07408                   // ATE: If we are an animal, etc, don't change to hostile... 
07409                   // ( and don't go into combat )
07410                   if ( pTarget->ubBodyType == CROW )
07411                   {
07412                         // Loop through our team, make guys who can see this fly away....
07413                         {
07414                               UINT32                        cnt;
07415                               SOLDIERTYPE       *pTeamSoldier;
07416                               UINT8                         ubTeam;
07417 
07418                               ubTeam = pTarget->bTeam;
07419 
07420                               for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bFirstID, pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ ubTeam ].bLastID; cnt++, pTeamSoldier++ )
07421                               {
07422                                     if ( pTeamSoldier->bActive && pTeamSoldier->bInSector )
07423                                     {
07424                                           if ( pTeamSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
07425                                           {
07426                                                 if ( pTeamSoldier->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] == SEEN_CURRENTLY )
07427                                                 {
07428                                                       //ZEROTIMECOUNTER( pTeamSoldier->AICounter );         
07429                                                       
07430                                                       //MakeCivHostile( pTeamSoldier, 2 );
07431 
07432                                                       HandleCrowFlyAway( pTeamSoldier );
07433 
07434                                                 }
07435                                           }
07436                                     }
07437                               }
07438                         }
07439 
07440                         // Don't enter combat...
07441                         fEnterCombat = FALSE;
07442                   }
07443 
07444                   if ( gTacticalStatus.bBoxingState == BOXING )
07445                   {
07446                         if ( pTarget && pTarget->bLife <= 0 )
07447                         {
07448                               // someone has won!
07449                               EndBoxingMatch( pTarget );
07450                         }
07451                   }
07452 
07453 
07454                   // if soldier and target were not both players and target was not under fire before...
07455                   if ( ( pSoldier->bTeam != gbPlayerNum || pTarget->bTeam != gbPlayerNum ) )
07456                   {
07457                         if (pTarget->bOppList[ pSoldier->ubID ] != SEEN_CURRENTLY )
07458                         {
07459                               NoticeUnseenAttacker( pSoldier, pTarget, 0 );
07460                         }
07461                         // "under fire" lasts for 2 turns
07462                         pTarget->bUnderFire = 2;
07463                   }
07464 
07465             }
07466             else if ( pTarget )
07467             {
07468                   // something is wrong here!
07469                   if ( !pTarget->bActive || !pTarget->bInSector )
07470                   {
07471                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, ">>Invalid target attacked!" );
07472                   }
07473                   else if ( ! (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED) )
07474                   {
07475                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, ">>Attack not noticed" );
07476                   }
07477             }
07478             else
07479             {
07480                   // no target, don't enter combat
07481                   fEnterCombat = FALSE;
07482             }
07483 
07484             if ( pSoldier->fSayAmmoQuotePending )
07485             {
07486                   pSoldier->fSayAmmoQuotePending = FALSE;
07487                   TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, QUOTE_OUT_OF_AMMO );
07488             }
07489 
07490             if (pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC)
07491             {     
07492                   UnSetUIBusy( ubID );
07493             }
07494             else
07495             {
07496                   FreeUpNPCFromAttacking( ubID );
07497             }
07498 
07499             if ( !fEnterCombat )
07500             {
07501                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, ">>Not to enter combat from this attack" );
07502             }
07503 
07504 
07505             if ( fEnterCombat && !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
07506             {
07507                   // Go into combat!
07508 
07509                   // If we are in a meanwhile... don't enter combat here...
07510                   if ( !AreInMeanwhile( ) )
07511                   {
07512                         EnterCombatMode( pSoldier->bTeam );                         
07513                   }
07514             }
07515 
07516             pSoldier->uiStatusFlags &= (~SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED);
07517       }
07518 
07519       if ( gTacticalStatus.fKilledEnemyOnAttack )
07520       {
07521             // Check for death quote...
07522             HandleKilledQuote( MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.ubEnemyKilledOnAttack ], MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.ubEnemyKilledOnAttackKiller ], gTacticalStatus.ubEnemyKilledOnAttackLocation, gTacticalStatus.bEnemyKilledOnAttackLevel );
07523             gTacticalStatus.fKilledEnemyOnAttack = FALSE;
07524       }
07525       
07526       // ATE: Check for stat changes....
07527       HandleAnyStatChangesAfterAttack( );
07528 
07529 
07530       if ( gTacticalStatus.fItemsSeenOnAttack  && gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam == gbPlayerNum )
07531       {
07532             gTacticalStatus.fItemsSeenOnAttack = FALSE;
07533 
07534             // Display quote!
07535     if ( !AM_AN_EPC( MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.ubItemsSeenOnAttackSoldier ] ) )
07536     {
07537               TacticalCharacterDialogueWithSpecialEvent( MercPtrs[ gTacticalStatus.ubItemsSeenOnAttackSoldier ], (UINT16)( QUOTE_SPOTTED_SOMETHING_ONE + Random( 2 ) ), DIALOGUE_SPECIAL_EVENT_SIGNAL_ITEM_LOCATOR_START, gTacticalStatus.usItemsSeenOnAttackGridNo, 0 );
07538     }
07539     else
07540     {
07541                   // Turn off item lock for locators...
07542                   gTacticalStatus.fLockItemLocators = FALSE;
07543                   // Slide to location!
07544                   SlideToLocation( 0,  gTacticalStatus.usItemsSeenOnAttackGridNo );
07545     }
07546       }
07547 
07548       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & CHECK_SIGHT_AT_END_OF_ATTACK )
07549       {
07550             UINT8 ubLoop;
07551             SOLDIERTYPE * pSightSoldier;
07552 
07553             AllTeamsLookForAll( FALSE );
07554 
07555             // call fov code
07556             ubLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID;
07557             for ( pSightSoldier = MercPtrs[ ubLoop ]; ubLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; ubLoop++, pSightSoldier++ )
07558             {
07559                   if ( pSightSoldier->bActive && pSightSoldier->bInSector )
07560                   {
07561                         RevealRoofsAndItems( pSightSoldier, TRUE, FALSE, pSightSoldier->bLevel, FALSE );
07562                   }
07563             }     
07564             gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &= ~CHECK_SIGHT_AT_END_OF_ATTACK;
07565       }
07566 
07567       DequeueAllDemandGameEvents( TRUE );
07568 
07569       CheckForEndOfBattle( FALSE );
07570 
07571       // if we're in realtime, turn off the attacker's muzzle flash at this point
07572       if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT) && pSoldier )
07573       {
07574             EndMuzzleFlash( pSoldier );
07575       }
07576 
07577       if ( pSoldier && (pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_BURST || pSoldier->bWeaponMode == WM_ATTACHED_GL_AUTO ))
07578       {
07579             if ( !Weapon[pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem].NoSemiAuto )
07580             {
07581                   // change back to single shot
07582                   pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_NORMAL;
07583                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 0;
07584                   pSoldier->bDoBurst = 0;
07585             }
07586             else
07587             {
07588                   // change back to autofire
07589                   pSoldier->bWeaponMode = WM_AUTOFIRE;
07590                   pSoldier->bDoAutofire = 1;
07591                   pSoldier->bDoBurst = TRUE;
07592             }
07593             DirtyMercPanelInterface(pSoldier, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
07594       }
07595 
07596       // record last target
07597   // Check for valid target!
07598   if ( pSoldier )
07599   {
07600         pSoldier->sLastTarget = pSoldier->sTargetGridNo;
07601   }
07602 
07603       return( pTarget );
07604 }
07605 
07606 SOLDIERTYPE * ReduceAttackBusyCount( UINT8 ubID, BOOLEAN fCalledByAttacker )
07607 {
07608       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ReduceAttackBusyCount") );    
07609   if ( ubID == NOBODY )
07610   {
07611         return( InternalReduceAttackBusyCount( ubID, fCalledByAttacker, NOBODY ) );
07612   }
07613   else
07614   {
07615         return( InternalReduceAttackBusyCount( ubID, fCalledByAttacker, MercPtrs[ ubID ]->ubTargetID ) );
07616   }
07617 }
07618 
07619 SOLDIERTYPE * FreeUpAttacker( UINT8 ubID )
07620 {
07621       // Strange as this may seem, this function returns a pointer to
07622       // the *target* in case the target has changed sides as a result
07623       // of being attacked
07624       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FreeUpAttacker") );     
07625       return( ReduceAttackBusyCount( ubID, TRUE ) );
07626 }
07627 
07628 SOLDIERTYPE * FreeUpAttackerGivenTarget( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubTargetID )
07629 {
07630       // Strange as this may seem, this function returns a pointer to
07631       // the *target* in case the target has changed sides as a result
07632       // of being attacked
07633       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("FreeUpAttackerGivenTarget") );      
07634       return( InternalReduceAttackBusyCount( ubID, TRUE, ubTargetID ) );
07635 }
07636 
07637 SOLDIERTYPE * ReduceAttackBusyGivenTarget( UINT8 ubID, UINT8 ubTargetID )
07638 {
07639       // Strange as this may seem, this function returns a pointer to
07640       // the *target* in case the target has changed sides as a result
07641       // of being attacked
07642       DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("ReduceAttackBusyGivenTarget") );    
07643       return( InternalReduceAttackBusyCount( ubID, FALSE, ubTargetID ) );
07644 }
07645 
07646 
07647 void StopMercAnimation( BOOLEAN fStop )
07648 {
07649       static INT8 bOldRealtimeSpeed;
07650 
07651       if ( fStop )
07652       {
07653             if ( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SLOW_ANIMATION ) )
07654             {
07655                   bOldRealtimeSpeed = gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed;
07656                   gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed = -1;
07657 
07658                   gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |=(SLOW_ANIMATION );
07659 
07660                   ResetAllMercSpeeds( );
07661 
07662             }
07663       }
07664       else
07665       {
07666             if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SLOW_ANIMATION )
07667             {
07668                   gTacticalStatus.bRealtimeSpeed = bOldRealtimeSpeed;
07669 
07670                   gTacticalStatus.uiFlags &=(~SLOW_ANIMATION );
07671 
07672                   ResetAllMercSpeeds( );
07673             }
07674 
07675       }
07676 
07677 
07678 }
07679 
07680 void ResetAllMercSpeeds( )
07681 {
07682       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
07683       UINT32                  cnt;
07684 
07685       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; cnt++ )
07686       {
07687             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
07688 
07689             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector )
07690             {
07691                   SetSoldierAniSpeed( pSoldier );
07692             }
07693 
07694       }
07695 
07696 }
07697 
07698 void SetActionToDoOnceMercsGetToLocation( UINT8 ubActionCode,  INT8 bNumMercsWaiting, UINT32 uiData1, UINT32 uiData2, UINT32 uiData3 )
07699 {
07700       gubWaitingForAllMercsToExitCode                       = ubActionCode;
07701       gbNumMercsUntilWaitingOver                                  = bNumMercsWaiting;
07702       guiWaitingForAllMercsToExitData[ 0 ]      = uiData1;
07703       guiWaitingForAllMercsToExitData[ 1 ]      = uiData2;
07704       guiWaitingForAllMercsToExitData[ 2 ]      = uiData3;
07705 
07706       // Setup timer counter and report back if too long....
07707       guiWaitingForAllMercsToExitTimer                = GetJA2Clock( );
07708 
07709       // ATE: Set flag to ignore sight...
07710       gTacticalStatus.uiFlags |= ( DISALLOW_SIGHT );
07711 
07712 }
07713 
07714 void HandleBloodForNewGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
07715 {
07716       // Handle bleeding...
07717       if ( ( pSoldier->bBleeding > MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD ) )
07718   {
07719             INT8 bBlood;
07720 
07721             bBlood = ( ( pSoldier->bBleeding-MIN_BLEEDING_THRESHOLD ) / BLOODDIVISOR);
07722 
07723     if ( bBlood > MAXBLOODQUANTITY )
07724             {
07725                   bBlood = MAXBLOODQUANTITY;
07726             }
07727 
07728             // now, he shouldn't ALWAYS bleed the same amount; LOWER it perhaps. If it
07729             // goes less than zero, then no blood!
07730             bBlood -= (INT8)Random(7);
07731 
07732             if ( bBlood >= 0 )
07733             {
07734                   // this handles all soldiers' dropping blood during movement
07735                   DropBlood( pSoldier, bBlood, pSoldier->bVisible );
07736             }
07737   }
07738 }
07739 
07740 void CencelAllActionsForTimeCompression( void )
07741 {
07742       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier;
07743       INT32 cnt;
07744 
07745       for ( pSoldier = Menptr, cnt = 0; cnt < TOTAL_SOLDIERS; pSoldier++, cnt++ )
07746       {
07747             if ( pSoldier->bActive )
07748             {
07749                   if ( pSoldier->bInSector )
07750                   {
07751                               // Hault!
07752                         EVENT_StopMerc( pSoldier, pSoldier->sGridNo, pSoldier->bDirection );
07753 
07754                         // END AI actions
07755                         CancelAIAction( pSoldier, TRUE );
07756                   }
07757             }
07758       }
07759 }
07760 
07761 void AddManToTeam( INT8 bTeam )
07762 {
07763       // ATE: If not loading game!
07764       if( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
07765       {
07766             // Increment men in sector number!
07767             if (gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector == 0)
07768             {
07769                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bTeamActive = TRUE;
07770             }
07771             gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector++;
07772             if ( bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
07773             {
07774                   gTacticalStatus.bOriginalSizeOfEnemyForce++;
07775             }
07776       }
07777 }
07778 
07779 void RemoveManFromTeam( INT8 bTeam )
07780 {
07781       // ATE; if not loading game!
07782       if( !( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME ) )
07783       {
07784             // Decrement men in sector number!
07785             gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector--;
07786             if (gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector == 0)
07787             {
07788                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bTeamActive = FALSE;
07789             }
07790             else if (gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector < 0)
07791             {
07792                   #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
07793                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Number of people on team %d dropped to %d", bTeam, gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector );
07794                   #endif
07795                   // reset!
07796                   gTacticalStatus.Team[ bTeam ].bMenInSector = 0;
07797             }
07798       }
07799 }
07800 
07801 void RemoveSoldierFromTacticalSector( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, BOOLEAN fAdjustSelected )
07802 {
07803       UINT8 ubID;
07804       SOLDIERTYPE *pNewSoldier;
07805 
07806       // reset merc's opplist
07807       InitSoldierOppList( pSoldier );
07808 
07809       // Remove!
07810       RemoveSoldierFromGridNo( pSoldier );
07811 
07812       RemoveMercSlot( pSoldier );
07813 
07814       pSoldier->bInSector = FALSE;
07815 
07816       // Select next avialiable guy....
07817       if ( fAdjustSelected )
07818       {
07819     if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
07820     {
07821               if ( gusSelectedSoldier == pSoldier->ubID  )
07822               {
07823                     ubID = FindNextActiveAndAliveMerc( pSoldier, FALSE, FALSE ); 
07824               
07825                     if ( ubID != NOBODY && ubID != gusSelectedSoldier )
07826                     {
07827                           SelectSoldier( ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
07828                     }
07829                     else
07830                     {
07831                           // OK - let's look for another squad...
07832                           pNewSoldier = FindNextActiveSquad( pSoldier );
07833 
07834                           if ( pNewSoldier != pSoldier )
07835                           {
07836                                 // Good squad found!
07837                                 SelectSoldier( pNewSoldier->ubID, FALSE, FALSE );
07838                           }
07839           else
07840           {
07841             // if here, make nobody
07842             gusSelectedSoldier = NOBODY;
07843           }
07844                     }
07845               }
07846             UpdateTeamPanelAssignments( );
07847     }
07848     else
07849     {
07850       gusSelectedSoldier = NOBODY;
07851 
07852       if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
07853       {
07854                 // otherwise, make sure interface is team panel...
07855               UpdateTeamPanelAssignments( );
07856                 SetCurrentInterfacePanel( (UINT8)TEAM_PANEL );
07857       }
07858     }
07859       }
07860 
07861 }
07862 
07863 
07864 void  DoneFadeOutDueToDeath( void )
07865 {
07866       // Quit game....
07867       InternalLeaveTacticalScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
07868       //SetPendingNewScreen( MAINMENU_SCREEN );
07869 }
07870 
07871 void EndBattleWithUnconsciousGuysCallback( UINT8 bExitValue )
07872 {
07873       // Enter mapscreen.....
07874       CheckAndHandleUnloadingOfCurrentWorld();
07875 }
07876 
07877 
07878 void InitializeTacticalStatusAtBattleStart( void )
07879 {
07880       INT8                                      bLoop;
07881       INT32                                     cnt;
07882       SOLDIERTYPE *                 pSoldier;
07883 
07884       gTacticalStatus.ubArmyGuysKilled = 0;
07885       gTacticalStatus.bOriginalSizeOfEnemyForce = 0;
07886 
07887       gTacticalStatus.fPanicFlags = 0;
07888       gTacticalStatus.fEnemyFlags = 0;
07889       for ( bLoop = 0; bLoop < NUM_PANIC_TRIGGERS; bLoop++ )
07890       {
07891             gTacticalStatus.sPanicTriggerGridNo[ bLoop ] = NOWHERE;
07892             gTacticalStatus.bPanicTriggerIsAlarm[ bLoop ] = FALSE;
07893             gTacticalStatus.ubPanicTolerance[ bLoop ] = 0;
07894       }
07895       
07896       for( cnt = 0; cnt < MAXTEAMS; cnt++ )
07897       {
07898             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].ubLastMercToRadio = NOBODY;
07899             gTacticalStatus.Team[ cnt ].bAwareOfOpposition = FALSE;
07900       }
07901 
07902       gTacticalStatus.ubTheChosenOne      = NOBODY;
07903 
07904       ClearIntList();   
07905 
07906       // make sure none of our guys have leftover shock values etc
07907       for ( cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ 0 ].bFirstID; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ 0 ].bLastID; cnt++ )
07908       {
07909             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ];
07910             pSoldier->bShock = 0;
07911             pSoldier->bTilesMoved = 0;
07912       }
07913 
07914       // loop through everyone; clear misc flags
07915       for ( cnt = 0; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; cnt++ )
07916       {
07917             MercPtrs[ cnt ]->ubMiscSoldierFlags = 0;
07918       }
07919 
07920 }
07921 
07922 
07923 void  DoneFadeOutDemoCreatureLevel( void )
07924 {
07925       // OK, insertion data found, enter sector!
07926       SetCurrentWorldSector( 1, 16, 0 );
07927 
07928       FadeInGameScreen( );
07929 }

07934 }
07935 
07936 void HandleEndDemoInCreatureLevel( )

07940 
07941 void DeathTimerCallback( void )
07942 {
07943       if (gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bMenInSector > gTacticalStatus.Team[ ENEMY_TEAM ].bMenInSector )
07944       {
07945             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, LargeTacticalStr[ LARGESTR_NOONE_LEFT_CAPABLE_OF_BATTLE_AGAINST_CREATURES_STR ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, EndBattleWithUnconsciousGuysCallback, NULL );
07946       }
07947       else
07948       {
07949             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, LargeTacticalStr[ LARGESTR_NOONE_LEFT_CAPABLE_OF_BATTLE_STR ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, EndBattleWithUnconsciousGuysCallback, NULL );
07950       }
07951 }
07952 
07953 void CaptureTimerCallback( void )
07954 {
07955       if( gfSurrendered )
07956       {
07957             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, LargeTacticalStr[ 3 ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, EndBattleWithUnconsciousGuysCallback, NULL );
07958       }
07959       else
07960       {
07961             DoMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, LargeTacticalStr[ LARGESTR_HAVE_BEEN_CAPTURED ], GAME_SCREEN, ( UINT8 )MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, EndBattleWithUnconsciousGuysCallback, NULL );
07962       }
07963       gfSurrendered = FALSE;
07964 }
07965 
07966 void DoPOWPathChecks( void )
07967 {
07968       INT32                               iLoop;
07969       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
07970 
07971       // loop through all mercs on our team and if they are POWs in sector, do POW path check and
07972       // put on a squad if available
07973       for ( iLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; iLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; iLoop++ )
07974       {
07975             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iLoop ];
07976 
07977             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW )
07978             {
07979                   // check to see if POW has been freed!
07980                   // this will be true if a path can be made from the POW to either of 3 gridnos
07981                   // 10492 (hallway) or 10482 (outside), or 9381 (outside)
07982                   if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, 10492, 0, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
07983                   {
07984                         // drop out of if
07985                   }
07986                   else if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, 10482, 0, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
07987                   {
07988                         // drop out of if
07989                   }
07990                   else if ( FindBestPath( pSoldier, 9381, 0, WALKING, NO_COPYROUTE, PATH_THROUGH_PEOPLE ) )
07991                   {
07992                         // drop out of if
07993                   }
07994                   else
07995                   {
07996                         continue;
07997                   }
07998                   // free! free!
07999                   // put them on any available squad
08000                   pSoldier->bNeutral = FALSE;
08001                   AddCharacterToAnySquad( pSoldier );
08002                   DoMercBattleSound( pSoldier, BATTLE_SOUND_COOL1 );
08003             }
08004       }
08005 }
08006 
08007 BOOLEAN HostileCiviliansPresent( void )
08008 {
08009       INT32                               iLoop;
08010       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
08011 
08012       if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bTeamActive == FALSE )
08013       {
08014             return( FALSE );
08015       }
08016 
08017       for ( iLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; iLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; iLoop++ )
08018       {
08019             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iLoop ];
08020 
08021             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && !pSoldier->bNeutral )
08022             {
08023                   return( TRUE );
08024             }
08025       }
08026 
08027       return( FALSE );
08028 }
08029 
08030 BOOLEAN HostileCiviliansWithGunsPresent( void )
08031 {
08032       INT32                               iLoop;
08033       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
08034 
08035       if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bTeamActive == FALSE )
08036       {
08037             return( FALSE );
08038       }
08039 
08040       for ( iLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bFirstID; iLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CIV_TEAM ].bLastID; iLoop++ )
08041       {
08042             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iLoop ];
08043 
08044             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && !pSoldier->bNeutral )
08045             {
08046                   if ( FindAIUsableObjClass( pSoldier, IC_WEAPON ) == -1 )
08047                   {
08048                         return( TRUE );
08049                   }
08050 
08051             }
08052       }
08053 
08054       return( FALSE );
08055 }
08056 
08057 BOOLEAN HostileBloodcatsPresent( void )
08058 {
08059       INT32                               iLoop;
08060       SOLDIERTYPE *           pSoldier;
08061 
08062       if ( gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bTeamActive == FALSE )
08063       {
08064             return( FALSE );
08065       }
08066 
08067       for ( iLoop = gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bFirstID; iLoop <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ CREATURE_TEAM ].bLastID; iLoop++ )
08068       {
08069             pSoldier = MercPtrs[ iLoop ];
08070 
08071             //KM : Aug 11, 1999 -- Patch fix:  Removed the check for bNeutral.  Bloodcats automatically become hostile
08072             //           on site.  Because the check used to be there, it was possible to get into a 2nd battle elsewhere 
08073             //     which is BAD BAD BAD!
08074             if ( pSoldier->bActive && pSoldier->bInSector && pSoldier->bLife > 0 && pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
08075             {
08076                   return( TRUE );
08077             }
08078       }
08079 
08080       return( FALSE );
08081 }
08082 
08083 
08084 void HandleCreatureTenseQuote( )
08085 {
08086       UINT8 ubMercsInSector[ 20 ] = { 0 };
08087       UINT8 ubNumMercs = 0;
08088       UINT8 ubChosenMerc;
08089       SOLDIERTYPE *pTeamSoldier;
08090       INT32 cnt;
08091   INT32 uiTime;
08092   
08093 
08094       // Check for quote seeing creature attacks....
08095   if ( gubQuest[ QUEST_CREATURES ] != QUESTDONE )
08096   {
08097     if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & IN_CREATURE_LAIR )
08098     {
08099       if( !(gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
08100           {
08101         uiTime = GetJA2Clock( );
08102 
08103         if ( ( uiTime - gTacticalStatus.uiCreatureTenseQuoteLastUpdate ) > (UINT32)( gTacticalStatus.sCreatureTenseQuoteDelay * 1000 ) )
08104         {
08105           gTacticalStatus.uiCreatureTenseQuoteLastUpdate = uiTime;
08106 
08107               // set up soldier ptr as first element in mercptrs list
08108               cnt = gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bFirstID; 
08109 
08110               // run through list
08111               for ( pTeamSoldier = MercPtrs[ cnt ]; cnt <= gTacticalStatus.Team[ gbPlayerNum ].bLastID; cnt++,pTeamSoldier++ )
08112               {
08113                     // Add guy if he's a candidate...
08114                     if ( OK_INSECTOR_MERC( pTeamSoldier ) && !AM_AN_EPC( pTeamSoldier ) && !( pTeamSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_GASSED ) && !(AM_A_ROBOT( pTeamSoldier )) && !pTeamSoldier->fMercAsleep )
08115                     {
08116                           ubMercsInSector[ ubNumMercs ] = (UINT8)cnt;
08117                           ubNumMercs++;
08118             }
08119           }
08120         
08121               // If we are > 0
08122               if ( ubNumMercs > 0 )
08123               {
08124                     ubChosenMerc = (UINT8)Random( ubNumMercs );
08125 
08126             DoCreatureTensionQuote ( MercPtrs[ ubMercsInSector[ ubChosenMerc ] ] );
08127           }
08128 
08129           // Adjust delay....
08130           gTacticalStatus.sCreatureTenseQuoteDelay = (INT16)( 60 + Random( 60 ) );
08131 
08132         }
08133               }
08134     }
08135       }
08136 }
08137 
08138 
08139 void DoCreatureTensionQuote( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
08140 {
08141   INT32   iRandomQuote;
08142   BOOLEAN fCanDoQuote = TRUE;
08143   INT32   iQuoteToUse;
08144 
08145       // Check for playing smell quote....
08146   iRandomQuote = Random( 3 );
08147 
08148   switch( iRandomQuote )
08149   {
08150     case 0:
08151 
08152       iQuoteToUse = QUOTE_SMELLED_CREATURE;
08153                   if ( !( pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_SMELLED_CREATURE ) )
08154                   {
08155                         // set flag
08156                         pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_SMELLED_CREATURE;
08157       }
08158       else
08159       {
08160         fCanDoQuote = FALSE;
08161       }
08162       break;
08163 
08164     case 1:
08165 
08166       iQuoteToUse = QUOTE_TRACES_OF_CREATURE_ATTACK;
08167                   if ( !( pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_SPOTTING_CREATURE_ATTACK ) )
08168                   {
08169                         // set flag
08170                         pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_SPOTTING_CREATURE_ATTACK;
08171       }
08172       else
08173       {
08174         fCanDoQuote = FALSE;
08175       }
08176       break;
08177 
08178     case 2:
08179 
08180       iQuoteToUse = QUOTE_WORRIED_ABOUT_CREATURE_PRESENCE;
08181                   if ( !( pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags & SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_WORRIED_ABOUT_CREATURES ) )
08182                   {
08183                         // set flag
08184                         pSoldier->usQuoteSaidFlags |= SOLDIER_QUOTE_SAID_WORRIED_ABOUT_CREATURES;
08185       }
08186       else
08187       {
08188         fCanDoQuote = FALSE;
08189       }
08190       break;
08191   }
08192 
08193   if ( fCanDoQuote )
08194   { 
08195     TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, (INT16)iQuoteToUse );
08196   }
08197 }
08198 
08199 // Kaiden: Taken from UB to reveal all items after combat.
08200 void RevealAllDroppedEnemyItems()
08201 {
08202       UINT32 uiCnt=0;
08203 
08204       //loop through all the items
08205       for(uiCnt=0; uiCnt<guiNumWorldItems; uiCnt++ )
08206       {
08207             //if the item exists AND the item was droppped from an enemy
08208             if( gWorldItems[ uiCnt ].fExists && gWorldItems[ uiCnt ].usFlags & WORLD_ITEM_DROPPED_FROM_ENEMY )
08209             {
08210                   gWorldItems[ uiCnt ].bVisible = VISIBLE;
08211             }
08212       }
08213 
08214       // Make team look for items
08215       AllSoldiersLookforItems( TRUE );
08216 
08217 }
Generated on Sat Sep 9 13:48:45 2006 for Build by  1.4.7
